channel.title: Simulation on Game Vibe
channel.description: Recent content in Simulation on Game Vibe

item.title: Japan Stigmatized Property 2
item.description: Game Description Japan Stigmatized Property 2 is a surveillance simulator in which the main goal is to meticulously search for anomalies in Japanese properties with a bad reputation. The protagonist needs to hold out until 5 am, tracking any deviations from the norm through camera lenses. The success of the mission depends on attentiveness: missing a significant number of paranormal events or an excessive number of false alarms inevitably leads to failure.

item.title: Alchemy Factory
item.description: Game Description Alchemy Factory is a large-scale project that turns the mystical art of alchemy into a well-functioning production mechanism. A novice adept of magical sciences comes under the control of the gamer, who will have to go from a modest shop owner to the head of an entire industrial empire. The company specializes in the creation of potions, metal processing and jewelry making. The main goal is to transform manual labor into a completely self-sufficient system, operating with virtually no intervention, where all processes from grinding herbs to transmuting ore into the Philosopher’s Stone are performed automatically.

item.title: Memory Keeper
item.description: Game Description Memory Keeper is an interior design simulator whose main goal is to preserve the warmest moments of the past. The project provides a personal digital space for creativity, allowing you to materialize cherished memories, be it the sun-drenched living room of your first apartment or a cozy corner in your grandmother’s house. The whole process is focused on relaxation and creation. There are absolutely no restrictions, tasks or rushes, allowing you to completely immerse yourself in decorating your ideal rooms.

item.title: Military Logistics Simulator
item.description: Game Description Military Logistics Simulator is a first-person simulator dedicated to managing the complex support mechanisms of modern armies. The project proposes to concentrate not on front-line battles, but on rear operations, on which the outcome of any armed conflict depends. Players will have to go through professional growth from an ordinary supply chain to an experienced quartermaster, taking full responsibility for organizing and protecting supply chains in hostile territory. The main goal is not the destruction of the enemy, but the systematic restoration of the war-torn region, including the rescue of the surviving population and the revival of critical infrastructure.

item.title: I Sell Lemonade
item.description: Game Description I Sell Lemonade is a story about a 1980s summer spent on the sidewalk with a pitcher of soft drink. At the center of the story is a 10-year-old child who, after his father sells his gaming console, is forced to look for something to do on the street. An activity initially conceived as a way to pass the time gradually turns into an extended journey through childhood experiences, friendships and character formation.

item.title: The Cradle
item.description: Game Description The Cradle is a horror film with a psychological bent, the narrative of which revolves around a reporter’s investigation into the tragedy that unfolded within the walls of the Synergy Soft corporation. The main character named Alex needs to make a foray into an abandoned office complex to establish the true motives for the brutal massacre that occurred six months earlier. According to the official interpretation, the incident was caused by a collective clouding of reason, but the reality turns out to be much more frightening.

item.title: Anxiety Puppy
item.description: Game Description Anxiety Puppy is an interactive story that focuses on coming to terms with your inner state. At the center of the plot is an unusual metaphor, where anxiety takes on a physical embodiment in the form of a small puppy. This approach turns a complex psychological topic into a touching fairy tale for adults. The project is made in the original style of an illustrated book, and the entire visual range is made by hand.

item.title: Boxing Simulator
item.description: Game Description Boxing Simulator is a complex project that combines elements of a sports manager and a fighting game. The basis of the gameplay is the creation and development of your own training room, which includes the purchase of a variety of equipment, from boxing rings to weight training equipment. Management also involves recruiting new athletes every day, each with a unique set of characteristics such as health, strength and speed.

item.title: Cozyrama
item.description: Game Description Cozyrama is a meditative sandbox, the main goal of which is to create and arrange magical 3D dioramas. The creative process begins with a blank canvas, gradually turning into the creation of miniature worlds filled with life. The initially empty stage is transformed into whimsical locations with flowering plants, glowing lanterns and tiny animals roaming everywhere. The visual design is made in a stylized manner, giving each corner a special atmosphere of comfort and warmth.

item.title: Drill Rift
item.description: Game Description Drill Rift is a constant balancing act between survival and complete failure while managing a remote drilling outpost. Diving into a mysterious rift is fraught with enormous risk, as the process of drilling into ever deeper layers of rock inexorably affects the minds of the dwarves. The growing insanity serves as a kind of beacon for monsters hiding in the impenetrable darkness of the dungeons, turning every foray into a deadly undertaking.

item.title: Mamon King
item.description: Game Description Mamon King is a creature breeding simulator where the tactical depth of confrontations is determined by the unique abilities of each monster. Turn-based duels in the 1v1 format are built on a team basis, where the timely use of skills decides the outcome of the match. Activating skills requires the expenditure of special energy, and the use of the most powerful techniques can require serious sacrifices from the creatures, which adds an element of calculated risk to battles.

item.title: Farmer's Market Simulator
item.description: Game Description Farmer’s Market Simulator is a project in which the central place is given to managing your own cozy market in the countryside. The customer service process includes scanning products, packaging them and providing a high level of service to build a loyal customer base. Financial transactions at the cash register require precision when accepting payments and issuing change. Successful trade directly depends on the competent organization of display cases and attractive display of collected products.

item.title: Breadbox
item.description: Game Description Breadbox is a detailed simulator that allows you to touch the golden era of computing in the 70s and 80s. The project offers accurate emulations of such iconic machines as the Commodore 64, VIC-20 and PET 2001-8. The core of the entire process is physical interaction with old-school hardware and storage media within a sophisticated environment. Gamers will have to work with floppy disks, cassettes and cartridges, listening to the authentic sound of their operation.

item.title: Unboxathon
item.description: Game Description Unboxathon is a progressive game where the central objective is to find a sentimental relic from the past - a plush toy lost in childhood. To do this, you have to engage in the soothing opening of an endless stream of mysterious boxes. Each opened package produces a satisfying sonic feedback, and its contents range from the most mundane socks to powerful magical relics and prestigious trophies. The charming pixelated visual style and soothing theme music create a comfortable environment that encourages long-term immersion.

item.title: Light Up The Town
item.description: Game Description Light Up The Town is a cozy project, the main goal of which is to create a festive atmosphere in a small town on the eve of winter celebrations. The process of transforming the settlement provides complete freedom to realize creative ideas. Placement of multi-colored garlands is carried out with a simple mouse click, and for each decorative element detailed settings of dimensions and rotation angle are available. The protagonist is a young ferret named Bean.

item.title: Bober Bros No Means Nothing
item.description: Game Description Bober Bros No Means Nothing is about violation of personal space and silent horror born from awkward pauses and hostile glances. The narrative places the hero in an oppressive atmosphere, where a mundane work shift at the packaging turns into a test of strength due to a colleague who constantly tests other people’s boundaries. Attempts to relax at home also turn into failure due to noise from the neighboring apartment and mysterious holes in the walls.

item.title: MineMogul
item.description: Game Description MineMogul is an opportunity to design and build a giant industrial complex in the bowels of the earth, where the main task is to tame chaos. The process is constantly complicated by unpredictable failures caused by a realistic physical model, which forces us to constantly search for creative solutions to keep the mechanisms working. The action takes place in a mysterious, deserted cave system, among the ruins of abandoned mining operations.

item.title: Pawn Planet
item.description: Game Description In Pawn Planet you will plunge headlong into the crazy world of an interstellar pawn shop. Forget dusty earthly stores; it’s a galaxy filled with strange clients and even stranger objects. Here you will have to test your customer service skills by dealing with grumpy Glurgs and outrageous Zilarians who are eager to make a sale or a profitable deal. But in “Planet of Pawns” you need to do more than just bargain.

item.title: Photographer's Life Simulator
item.description: Game Description Photographers Life Simulator is about turning a dream into a successful business, where the initial capital consists only of an old camera and ambitions. The main goal is to establish the most reputable photography studio in the city, leaving its mark on history. The protagonist must find a delicate balance between creative fulfillment and commercial gain while managing all aspects of the enterprise. All processes are under full control: from fulfilling orders for portrait photography to creating thematic albums and providing printing services.

item.title: DON'T SCREAM TOGETHER
item.description: Game Description DONT SCREAM TOGETHER is a cooperative project in the horror genre, the main goal of which is the need to survive in a gloomy forest until 8 o’clock in the morning. The key mechanic of this survival simulator is based on interaction with the microphone, since any loud sound, be it a scream or even a cough, will immediately restart the session for the entire group. Alternate mode turns the troublemaker into a hunter, forcing him to pursue former allies.

item.title: Ecopunk
item.description: Game Description Ecopunk is a survival simulator in which the main goal is to restore the destroyed ecosystem of the planet through the unique mechanics of the Mother Tree. Planting ancient seeds can bring life back to devastated lands, and sacrificing defeated foes can bestow valuable blessings. The gradual healing of the climate and the rebirth of nature unlock the full power of this ancient creature, making the settlers stronger. In parallel with landscaping the territories, you will have to arrange your own settlement on the ruins of a former civilization.

item.title: Boba Tea Shop Simulator
item.description: Game Description Boba Tea Shop Simulator is an establishment management simulator, the main goal of which is to transform a modest tea shop into a world-famous brand. Achieving this ambitious goal will require smart financial investments and attention to interior details. Visitors highly value cleanliness and stylish design, so the arrangement of the premises plays a significant role. Free placement of furniture and decorative elements allows you to create a truly unique design.

item.title: Idlequarium
item.description: Game Description Idlequarium is a simulator dedicated to the creation and development of your own digital aquarium, made in a bright cybernetic style. The process of arranging the underwater world is not limited solely to the visual component. Each element of decor, from colored stones to exotic plants, directly affects the ecosystem, accelerating the experience gained for feeding and the growth rate of inhabitants. Effective management involves the timely sale of adults to make a profit.

item.title: Pocket Gecko
item.description: Game Description Pocket Gecko is about the relaxing experience of collecting and caring for a personal virtual companion. The central figure of the entire adventure is the cute gecko, whose appearance can be customized in detail to reflect his own personality. You are allowed to contact this lizard at any time, simply by observing its lively and natural movements on the screen. Gradually, the pet becomes not just a tool, but a real partner.

item.title: Wild Growth
item.description: Game Description Wild Growth is an incremental action game in which the main goal is to maintain the combat effectiveness of the squad in the harsh world of Scandinavian myths. All responsibility for the survival of the allies falls on the shoulders of the protagonist, acting as a healer. The process of restoring the health of teammates is carried out through the use of healing spells activated by mouse clicks. The outcome of any clash with the enemy directly depends on the timeliness of these actions.

item.title: Where Is Mommy
item.description: Game Description Where Is Mommy is a retro horror game in which the survival process is based on careful observation of the cyclically changing environment. With each new turn, reality undergoes greater distortions, and barely noticeable deviations from the norm penetrate into the usual scenery. The main task is to identify these anomalies, since this is the only way to break the time loop and not become part of this crazy world.

item.title: Air Defender
item.description: Game Description Air Defender is a strategic command simulator that puts full responsibility for the safety of the nation’s airspace on the user’s shoulders. Gameplay focuses on making critical decisions under time pressure when an unidentified contact appears on the radar. It is necessary to quickly determine its nature, distinguishing a civilian aircraft from a real threat, and, if necessary, issue orders for the departure of duty fighters. Every action has far-reaching consequences, and the cost of a mistake can be catastrophic for the entire country.

item.title: Barman Simulator
item.description: Game Description Barman Simulator is a simulator for managing your own establishment, where the main goal is to turn a modest bar into the most popular place in the city. Running a successful business will require gamers to not only speed and accuracy when serving customers, but also strategic thinking. An important task is scrupulous control over warehouse stocks in order to avoid shortages of ingredients for creating signature cocktails. In addition, the daily routine is complicated by unforeseen situations, such as confronting thieves and managing an establishment during peak hours, when the flow of visitors reaches its maximum.

item.title: GLONK
item.description: Game Description GLONK is an incremental project in which the entire gameplay is built around feeding the creature of the same name. The central task is to constantly provide the pet with food for its subsequent increase in size, which directly affects financial well-being. The viability and continuous growth of the ward is the only source of income, so maintaining his health becomes a paramount task for accumulating gold. Successfully nurturing one creature opens up the opportunity to have several more, thereby scaling up profits and accelerating advancement to new levels.

item.title: No, I'm not a Voenkom
item.description: Game Description No, I’m not a Voenkom is a psychological thriller whose plot revolves around a sudden invasion of personal space. A sharp knock on the door becomes a catalyst for a whole series of tense events that test the protagonist’s endurance. Every interaction with the outside world becomes a difficult choice between trying to remain safe and risking succumbing to destructive curiosity. The oppressive atmosphere of an old apartment, where the air is saturated with the smell of dust and paint, increases the feeling of isolation.

item.title: Social Soccer Champions
item.description: Game Description Sociable Soccer Champions is a fast-paced take on competitive soccer with fast-paced arcade gameplay at its core. Controls are intuitive, but mastery will require some practice. The arsenal of techniques includes powerful shots with spin on the ball, as well as acceleration and energy consumption systems. The key element is to build your own roster from an extensive database of over 14,000 licensed FIFPRO professionals. Each player card has unique attributes, allowing you to create tactically flexible teams to achieve victories.

item.title: Street Food Simulator
item.description: Game Description Street Food Simulator is a street food management simulator where you need to outperform your competitors to succeed. The confrontation unfolds with other entrepreneurs, each of whom has their own strengths and business strategies. Learning their tactics and mastering various areas of the city becomes the key to market dominance. The urban environment lives its own life: people communicate on benches, creating the feeling of a busy metropolis. An important tool in this fight is a mobile retail outlet, which can not only be equipped with improved equipment, but also visually transformed.

item.title: Ars Notoria
item.description: Game Description Ars Notoria is a world of fantasy adventure where you are free to explore open spaces and hunt powerful possessed creatures. In this survival RPG, you can defeat the baddies alone or team up with friends to create your own faction of adventurers. Start your journey as a simple poor man, but using the magical ability “Bind Souls”, take control of unique adventurers, each of whom has their own special skills and weapons.

item.title: Comic Book Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Comic Book Store Simulator is an opportunity to try on the role of a comic book store owner and go from a modest establishment to a real paradise for connoisseurs of graphic novels. The action takes place in a colorful world inspired by Japanese streets, where every day brings new challenges and surprises. The daily routine includes not only arranging goods on shelves, but also interacting with eccentric visitors.

item.title: Lonely House
item.description: Game Description Lonely House is an opportunity to transform a secluded building at a city crossroads into a unique art object. The project proposes to focus solely on the external design, giving complete control over a small isolated plot of land. Enthusiasts have at their disposal a wide range of tools for customizing the building, allowing them to change the style of the walls and adjust its height. Decoration of the facade is carried out using a variety of objects: from overgrown bushes and ventilation systems to stylish neon signs with customizable lighting.

item.title: Nano Neighbors
item.description: Game Description Nano Neighbors is a life simulator in which your computer desktop turns into a cozy home for the friendly android NANO. The project offers to take on the role of a Handler, responsible for the development and well-being of his digital companion. The small robot is constantly located at the bottom of the screen, reacting to human actions and creating a feeling of constant presence. Social interaction is an important part of the gameplay: you can invite your friends to visit NANO, visit their capsule houses, or meet in common centers for communication and joint activities.

item.title: Cowboy Life Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cowboy Life Simulator will take players to the Wild West of the 19th century and allow them to master the life of a cowboy, taking care of his family and daily fighting the dangers that the environment presents. The most powerful enemy is hunger. But the hero is not going to put up with everyday life and craves adventure. But the protagonist is not some experienced warrior or the best shooter in the Wild West, so other important farming tasks await him.

item.title: Dreaming Blue
item.description: Game Description Dreaming Blue is a romantic visual novel in which the main goal is to get rid of an ancient curse. Fate brings the main character, a young woman, with two powerful deities who can help her in this difficult task. The first of these is Zenith, the patron of good fortune, who has a playful disposition and is associated with cats. His complete opposite is Sirius, a mysterious ancient deity whose symbol is the wolf.

item.title: My Wife Threw Out My Card Collection (So I Bought a Dump to Find Them All)
item.description: Game Description My Wife Threw Out My Card Collection (So I Bought a Dump to Find Them All) tells the story of a curious and desperate undertaking to recover a missing collection, which unfolds among the garbage heaps. A spouse deprived of fate falls under the control of the player, who will have to sift through tons of rubbish at a personally acquired training ground. The main task is to discover valuable cards with pictures of funny creatures, for which you have to clear unstable piles of rotting garbage using a special bag.

item.title: Project Motor Racing
item.description: Game Description Project Motor Racing is a full-time career in the world of professional motorsport where your path to glory involves managing budgets, negotiating sponsorship deals and taking responsibility for the consequences of accidents. Every decision made both on and off the track directly affects the path to the top of the racing Olympus. The project asks you to face the harsh reality of professional racing, where one incident can ruin both the car and your entire career.

item.title: TORMENTOR
item.description: Game Description TORMENTOR takes you on a journey through the twisted mind of a maniac. Take on the role of a ruthless torturer who has taken over an abandoned prison filled with victims sentenced to death. As the game progresses, you will struggle with a developing mental illness that robs you of your memories and causes dangerous episodes of fainting. To keep your mind under control, you’ll work with an organized crime group that operates on the dark web to obtain an experimental sanity-preserving drug for you.

item.title: Sit-Back Attack
item.description: Game Description Sit-Back Attack is a strategic Idle-RPG, where the central place is given to the detailed customization of the battle group and the selection of unique combinations of skills. You take control of a squad of four heroes who must be led through battles with more than 300 types of monsters and elite bosses. The project offers enormous variety in character development, allowing access to 60 different classes and over 500 skills, creating thousands of possible builds.

item.title: Uktena 64 - Ultimate
item.description: Game Description Uktena 64 - Ultimate is a dark comedy horror game with visuals inspired by the aesthetics of the N64 console. The core of the gameplay is to track and eliminate infected fauna that are spreading an unknown deadly virus. The project offers a choice of several difficulty levels, from extremely simple to almost unbalanced. To diversify the passage, a system of unlockable cheat codes is provided that allows you to radically change the established rules.

item.title: Galaxy Princess Zorana
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Princess Zorana is a strategic life simulator, the main task of which is to conquer the throne of the Heavenly Empire after the sudden death of your father. The previously carefree life of the second heir to the throne, known for her love of beautiful shoes and pets, is changing dramatically. After the death of his mother and the betrayal of his brother, who was considered a prince, the emperor disappears under mysterious circumstances.

item.title: The Dinner
item.description: Game Description The Dinner is an immersion into a fractured mind, where the goal is not to scare, but to create a feeling of deep concern and empathy. The project offers an intimate and disturbing experience, forcing you to constantly doubt the reality of what is happening on the screen. Every action and decision taken inexorably brings us closer to the tragic outcome predetermined by the fate of the main character.

item.title: Unseen
item.description: Game Description Unseen is a psychological horror game whose main objective is to immerse yourself in an oppressive and mysterious atmosphere. The project is implemented in the format of a walking simulator, where the narration is from the first person. The gameplay is deliberately devoid of overloaded elements, concentrating on exploring locations and interacting with interactive objects. The process of exploring the environment and solving a few puzzles serve as the main tools for building suspense.

item.title: Berserk B.I.T.S
item.description: Game Description Berserk BITS is a hybrid project that invites you to take on the role of a network detective. The main goal is to uncover the conspiracy behind a series of virus attacks that are shaking cyberspace. Progress along the storyline occurs through completing tasks received from email. During the investigations, you will explore a variety of digital biomes, fighting viruses and defeating powerful bosses. A key ally in this mission is a personal digital companion named B.

item.title: Dictator Simulator: Gradnar
item.description: Game Description Dictator Simulator: Gradnar is a political simulator where the government of the fictional Eastern European state of Gradnar is associated with the constant threat of a coup. In the role of dictator Vyslan Gatskolki will have to determine the fate of an entire nation, maneuvering between the democratic vector of development and harsh autocracy. Each decision directly affects key indicators, including the economy, army loyalty and party support. Neglect of these systems inevitably leads to the overthrow of the regime.

item.title: IT Specialist Simulator
item.description: Game Description IT Specialist Simulator is a simulator where players will have to go from a beginner to a high-level administrator or IT project manager. Professional development directly depends on the decisions made, allowing you to specialize in both servicing computer equipment and organizing e-sports events. Each completed task and resolved malfunction contributes to career advancement in the corporate world of information technology, opening up new career prospects. The basis of the gameplay is managing IT infrastructure and solving real technical problems.

item.title: Organized Inside
item.description: Game Description Organized Inside is a meditative puzzle game in which the process of cleaning becomes a metaphor for personal growth and transformation. The project invites you to immerse yourself in the leisurely systematization of everyday objects, being completely devoid of timers, points or health bars. The main emphasis is on relaxation and finding harmony in the chaos of everyday life. The narrative unfolds through the stories of five strangers whose secrets must be unraveled by putting their things in order.

item.title: Prologue: Go Wayback!
item.description: Game Description Prologue: Go Wayback! is a brutal survival simulator in which players will have to guide a heroine named Lucy through tens of kilometers of wilderness. The main objective is to reach a remote weather tower located on the opposite end of the map. The path is complicated not only by changeable weather conditions, but also by the need to navigate in space without modern navigation aids. The action takes place over a vast area of ​​64 square kilometers, generated for each new playthrough using machine learning technology.

item.title: TerraForge
item.description: Game Description TerraForge invites you into a world where mining and blacksmithing are not just a profession, but a way of life. As the heir to a family of blacksmiths, your goal is clear: forge the perfect weapon and leave a legacy behind. To do this, you will have to plunge into the mysterious Abyss - a kingdom underground, filled with rare and powerful resources. Along the way, you’ll manage loot, sell crafted items, and upgrade your tools to delve deeper into the mysteries of the land.

item.title: Typhon: Bot vs Bot
item.description: Game Description Typhon: Bot vs Bot is a sci-fi tactical strategy game where you need to masterfully write Python scripts to defeat your opponents. Autonomous mechs are controlled through the creation of unique behavior algorithms that determine all actions of combat vehicles. It is the program code that becomes the main weapon responsible for navigation, combat and the execution of complex missions in real time. The main goal is to outwit your opponent by developing better and more adaptive logic for your mechanized forces on the battlefield.

item.title: Xenopurge
item.description: Game Description Xenopurge puts you in the role of a Commander, controlling an elite squad from a remote command center. The main task is to eliminate aliens through indirect orders through the interfaces of several monitors. You will plan routes for fighters, set their priorities and determine tactics before they enter the combat zone. The team’s survival depends on this strategy and preparation, as you will have few direct ways to influence events once the operation begins.

item.title: Christmas Story
item.description: Game Description Christmas Story not only creates a deceptive feeling of festive warmth, but also immerses you in a chilling story where the line between fiction and reality is rapidly blurring. The narrative is transformed under the influence of the actions and choices of the gamer himself, turning a cozy Christmas night into a real nightmare. The symbols of the holiday familiar from childhood take on sinister features, and the crackling of wood in the fireplace gives way to oppressive silence.

item.title: DECRYPTO Project
item.description: Game Description DECRYPTO Project is a simulator in which the main task is to train an advanced artificial intelligence model. The protagonist, selected by a special algorithm, must train the AI ​​to recognize various text encryption systems and better understand human language. All interaction with the system occurs under the supervision of a virtual assistant named Inky from the INKorp corporation. Over the course of one week, the operator will have to analyze encrypted messages and find keys to decrypt them using specialized software.

item.title: Winter Survival Simulator
item.description: Game Description Winter Survival Simulator is a hardcore first-person survival game that offers you to experience the severity of the winter climate. Finding yourself in the snow-capped mountains, there is nowhere to wait for help. You need to rely only on your own strength. Try to survive. Find shelter and wait for rescuers. The action takes place in the mountains of Washington State. With only limited supplies on hand, battle the cold in the wild.

item.title: Little Aviary
item.description: Game Description Little Aviary is a meditative collecting simulator where the main goal is to create the perfect aviary for dozens of bird species. The process of replenishing the collection involves breeding over 40 species of birds, each of which has many unique color variations. The project is conceived as a background companion for the desktop, allowing you to observe the life of your pets without being distracted from other tasks.

item.title: Long Drive North: Co-Op RV Simulator
item.description: Game Description Long Drive North: Co-Op RV Simulator is a brutal survival test where an old RV becomes the only refuge in the world after an unknown disaster. This vehicle requires constant attention, forcing gamers to personally repair it, search for spare parts in abandoned buildings and refuel the tank to continue driving. Every bolt found and engine fixed gives a temporary sense of security in the middle of the deserted American wilderness.

item.title: SpaceBourne 2
item.description: Game Description The events of SpaceBourne 2 begin from the end of the first part, only now the player needs to build his own space empire and develop it in all directions. However, there is no need to rush with this global task. The game world is completely open to exploration of each solar system, where the user can first become famous or, on the contrary, become an enemy, and then make it easier for themselves to establish diplomatic relations.

item.title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide
item.description: Game Description SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide is a platformer that takes players on a new ghostly adventure through a beloved underwater world. The basis of the gameplay was the ability to instantly change the controlled character, choosing between SpongeBob and Patrick, in order to jointly use their unique acrobatic talents to deal with puzzles and obstacles. Special mention goes to Patrick, whose moveset has been expanded to include the ability to burrow into the ground or cling to ledges with a grappling hook.

item.title: Abra-Cooking-Dabra
item.description: Game Description Abra-Cooking-Dabra is a cozy card simulator with puzzle and management elements, which takes place in the kitchen of a mysterious castle. The player finds himself in the role of a new chef in a fantasy land who faces severe punishment for accidentally destroying an old recipe book. This book was vital to the coming Royal Feast, and now the only way is to restore the lost formulas of outlandish British cuisine.

item.title: Dungeons and Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Dungeons and Kingdoms is a hybrid project that combines the features of a kingdom management simulator and role-playing action game with dungeon exploration. The advancement of technology and the overall prosperity of the settlement directly depend on bold forays into dangerous locations. Adventurers will have to descend into ancient ruins and temples filled with ferocious monsters. Battles with opponents, including powerful bosses, take place in third-person action format. Victory over enemies is rewarded with valuable resources necessary for the technological development of the entire kingdom, as well as for protecting roads from bandits.

item.title: Interstellar Espionage Inc.
item.description: Game Description Interstellar Espionage Inc., a strategy and management simulator, focuses on running an interstellar spy agency. The main task is to methodically ruin competing companies through industrial espionage. To do this, you need to explore a procedurally generated universe, find vulnerabilities in information security and strategically sell the obtained information to direct competitors. Each mission is designed for short sessions, allowing you to complete a full game in a relatively short period of time, which makes the gameplay accessible for regular visits.

item.title: Leaf Blower Co.
item.description: Game Description Leaf Blower Co is a meditative simulator that invites you to start your own cleaning business in a cozy town located in New England. The main task is to restore order with the help of a powerful blower, turning chaos into a peaceful landscape. The process is not limited to just blowing away autumn leaves; You will also have to deal with scattered boxes, coconuts and other debris that interfere with harmony.

item.title: Crownbound - Fantasy Kingdom Sim
item.description: Game Description Crownbound - Fantasy Kingdom Sim, whose central mechanic is the indirect control of subjects, immerses you in a world where adventurers have their own will. Warriors, mages, robbers and clerics roam the lands freely, guided by personal goals, fears and ambitions. These heroes are not faceless units; They gain experience in battles, discovering new skills and combat techniques. In their travels, they can find legendary swords and enchanted staves, but none of them are immune from permanent death.

item.title: Shelldiver
item.description: Game Description Shelldiver immerses you in exploring a vast ocean filled with unique biomes, from volcanic waters to crystalline caves. Instead of linear development, a branched skill tree is offered, which allows you to customize expeditions in detail to suit your own style of passage, focusing on the speed of collection or the depth of research. All these improvements serve one purpose - the development of an unusual business founded by an elderly turtle.

item.title: The Holiday Story
item.description: Game Description The Holiday Story is a psychological horror film with a first-person perspective. The events of the game take place on the eve of 1982, completely immersing you in a festive environment. The project meticulously recreates the retro style of the 80s, visually processed to match the characteristic aesthetics of VHS tapes. The initially welcoming and bright atmosphere of the elegantly decorated store is gradually replaced by an oppressive feeling of inexplicable anxiety.

item.title: Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite
item.description: Game Description Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite, a retro-stylized roguelike shooter that immerses you in the atmosphere of classic arcade games and invites you to take control of a spaceship to clear endless asteroid fields. The main task is to methodically destroy waves of space debris filling hostile space. Gamers will have to not only dodge countless threats, but also conduct targeted fire, turning chaotic clusters into valuable resources for further development.

item.title: Driving Life
item.description: Game Description Driving Life is a detailed simulator that offers you to master more than 40 types of transport in the setting of rural America. Players will explore a vast open world of 16 km², where they can not only complete work tasks, but also buy and sell 16 unique houses. Of particular interest is the mechanics of restoring 6 project cars, parts for which are scattered throughout the island. In addition to managing finances, it is necessary to constantly monitor the basic needs of the character: hunger, thirst, sleep and even boredom, which significantly increases the level of immersion in what is happening.

item.title: Soba's Gunpaw
item.description: Game Description Sobas Gunpaw is a dynamic action game in the style of Bullet Heaven, where survival directly depends on the constant and systematic strengthening of the protagonist. At the heart of it all is an extensive skill system that provides access to numerous character upgrades. The progression process is built on the cyclical destruction of everything on the screen, which allows you to accumulate valuable assets. It is these materials collected from defeated enemies that open new branches in the branched tree of talents.

item.title: Assetto Corsa Rally
item.description: Game Description Assetto Corsa Rally is an uncompromising simulator that challenges drivers to push powerful cars to their limits. Each track, be it the gravel roads of Wales or the asphalt serpentines of Alsace, is recreated using laser scanning technology. This approach made it possible to transfer the real width of roads, the profile of roadsides and all surface irregularities into virtual space with the highest accuracy. Each race turns into a tense test, where the slightest mistake due to the treacherous terrain can become fatal, and success depends on instant decisions and filigree driving techniques.

item.title: DEFRAG
item.description: Game Description DEFRAG becomes a real optimization test for the gamer, since the project requires a careful approach to creating an effective system. The goal is to eliminate digital viruses that have infected system sectors. To achieve success, you will have to collect the resources necessary to strengthen the nodes. Combining these elements allows you to discover new fighting styles, which adds variety to the passage. The effectiveness of weapons is customized using special modules that form the basis for unique assemblies.

item.title: Little Corners
item.description: Game Description Little Corners allows you to customize your mystical alchemist’s tower, filling it with flasks, telescopes and ancient tomes, arranged to your liking. At the heart of it all is a meditative creative process of placing stickers, turning a blank canvas into a detailed 3D diorama. There are no time limits or challenging tasks, allowing you to immerse yourself in creating without any pressure. The relaxing atmosphere is supported by an original lo-fi soundtrack that delicately accompanies every action and helps you focus on creativity.

item.title: The Salesman
item.description: Game Description The Salesman plunges you into a dark reality where your own life becomes the main commodity for sale. This psychological horror explores the depths of despair of a man faced with the sudden loss of his job. The main character, left without a livelihood, is forced to make difficult decisions in order not to drown in a debt hole. The process of survival becomes a slow sale of personal belongings, each of which holds a piece of memory and personality.

item.title: The Sushi House
item.description: Game Description The Sushi House is a first-person story-driven adventure where something unsettling and inexplicable lurks behind the façade of an ordinary sushi restaurant. A gradually growing sense of unease becomes the main driver of the narrative, involving us in unraveling the secrets of this place. The initially calm atmosphere gives way to a depressing foreboding, when routine duties begin to seem like part of an ominous mechanism. Every creaking floorboard and unusual shadow makes you doubt the reality of what is happening.

item.title: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy DX
item.description: Game Description Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends and the Secret Fairy DX offers an expanded version of the adventure, allowing you to take control of Empel and Leela in their own storyline. The events of this expanded edition take place 3 years after the finale of the first part, when the matured Raizalin Shtout goes to the capital city of Ashra-am-Berd. At the request of a friend, she takes on the task of investigating a mysterious stone, which soon turns out to be an egg.

item.title: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key DX
item.description: Game Description Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End and the Secret Key DX marks the end of the story of alchemist Raizalin Stout, who must unravel the mystery of the suddenly appeared Kark Islands. These mysterious lands threaten the stability of her home island of Kurken, forcing the girl to embark on one last great journey. A voice in her head guides Reiza to create mysterious keys that open up not only new possibilities in the synthesis of objects, but also access to previously unseen areas for exploration.

item.title: Duncrush
item.description: Game Description Duncrush is a role-playing clicker game where the depth of character development is achieved through a well-developed skill tree and unique equipment. Creating your own strategy becomes possible thanks to powerful blades, shields and accessories found in battle. All this equipment is necessary to strengthen the hero, preparing to meet stronger opponents. Exploring numerous dungeons, each with unique challenges and rewards, forms the core of the gameplay. In these dangerous journeys, the protagonist is helped by mercenaries who fight shoulder to shoulder.

item.title: Indies' Lies 2: Fire Seed
item.description: Game Description Indies' Lies 2: Fire Seed is a 2D tactical roguelike where controlling a squad of three heroes becomes a chess match in an ever-changing arena. Every turn requires careful decisions, whether it’s eliminating healers or interrupting attacks from elite opponents. Terrain becomes a full-fledged weapon, allowing you to separate enemy forces and lure bosses into traps. Success depends on the right combination of character skills, such as Qili’s positional combinations, Diego’s counterattack ambushes, or Daniel’s explosions that spread negative effects.

item.title: NASCAR 25
item.description: Game Description NASCAR 25 takes you through the challenging journey from novice to motorsport legend. His career starts in a modest home garage, where he will prepare his first car for races in the ARCA Menards series. Gradually moving up the racing hierarchy, it will be possible to conquer the NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series, Xfinity Series championships and, finally, fight for the main cup. Success depends not only on skill on the track, but also on strategic decisions: hiring personnel, finding sponsors and developing new parts for the car, building its reputation through results and communication with the press.

item.title: Tabletop Game Shop Simulator
item.description: Game Description Tabletop Game Shop Simulator immerses you in the process of creating and developing your own store for lovers of tabletop entertainment. The ultimate goal is to transform the modest shop into the main center of attraction for the entire theme community of the city. Organizing epic tournaments, hosting exclusive product launches, and attracting high-profile clients become key tools for expanding business. You not only have to manage the establishment, but also personally participate in competitions with customers, proving your skills and increasing the prestige of the store.

item.title: A Planet of Mine MasterMine Edition
item.description: Game Description A Planet of Mine MasterMine Edition is a comprehensive 4X strategy game in which the process of conquering space begins with detailed customization of the universe itself. Players are given the opportunity to set parameters for a procedurally generated star system, determining the type of sun, the number of planets and the distance to them. The path to dominance can lie through diplomacy, trade or open military clashes, and the conflict can be ended either by the complete defeat of the opponent or by signing a peace treaty.

item.title: Cyber ​​Shard Clicker
item.description: Game Description Cyber ​​Shard Clicker is an incremental project that focuses on strategic development and constant enhancement of hacking capabilities. The central element of the entire progression system is a branched skill tree, offering tactical choices between immediate improvements and permanent bonuses. The latter guarantee a significant advantage in future hacking attempts. The resource for acquiring new skills are data fragments obtained in the process of destroying geometric defense systems. Each click turns into a pulse of digital destruction, aimed at destroying enemy polygonal shields, cubic guards and triangular drones.

item.title: Ambrosia Sky
item.description: Game Description Ambrosia Sky plunges into the atmosphere of a deserted colony near the rings of Saturn, where an alien fungal infection has turned human habitation into a disaster zone. After 15 years of absence, Dalia returns here, a disaster response specialist and a member of the Scarab caste - space caretakers who see off the dead on their final journey. Her task is not only to clean up the area, but also to conduct a bioremediation ritual over the bodies of the dead, such as her old friend Gerald Parker.

item.title: HoloSeeker
item.description: Game Description HoloSeeker is a card roguelike with RPG elements, the main goal of which is to conquer the adventure map with the help of a well-built deck. Players will have to choose one of four available characters, each of which has its own fighting style. Initially, only Usada Pekora is available, using the Carrot accumulation mechanic to gain an advantage. As you progress, other talents are unlocked: Nekomata Okayu, who relies on high evasion with low defense, Takanashi Kiara, who is able to revive after death thanks to Phoenix Feathers, as well as the FuwaMoco duo, which accumulates the Mischief Stock resource to play powerful cards.

item.title: King of Bones
item.description: Game Description In King of Bones, the main goal is to dominate prehistoric arenas in battles with realistic physics. The combat system conveys the weight and power of every encounter as all bites and strikes interact with physically simulated bodies in real time. Gamers dash, stomp and headbutt in fast-paced battles where creatures fight to the last. An attacking Triceratops can throw an enemy into the air, and small raptors can grab onto larger opponents right during a fight.

item.title: Lost Paws
item.description: Game Description Lost Paws is a survival simulator in which you take on the role of a stray dog ​​named Doggo and explore a large open world faced with the mysterious disappearance of all your pets. Personalization of the protagonist is implemented through an equipment system that allows you to find and try on a variety of accessories. There are dozens of items scattered throughout the world, including hats, glasses and even shoes, which are stored in separate inventory slots.

item.title: Nitroglycerine!
item.description: Game Description Nitroglycerine! is a test where the main task is to transport a deadly substance along difficult routes. The process of controlling a heavy tractor is subject to the laws of realistic physics, and the vehicle itself is completely unsuitable for overcoming obstacles along the way. Any mistake in piloting, sharp turn or collision can lead to the detonation of nitroglycerin and instant failure of the mission. Even climbing moderately steep slopes requires precise timing, and putting too much pressure on the engine via turbocharging risks stalling the engine.

item.title: Surviving Mars: Relaunched
item.description: Game Description Surviving Mars: Relaunched invites players to lead not just a survival mission, but the process of establishing an entire civilization on a hostile planet. The key task is to form an independent Martian society, free from terrestrial influence. Through a new system called the Martian Assembly, political factions within the colony will be managed. Settlers will make their own demands and adhere to certain ideologies, which will force them to make laws and develop long-term development strategies, balancing between different interest groups.

item.title: VORON: Raven's Story
item.description: Game Description VORON: Raven’s Story tells an emotional story about life and death from an unusual perspective. The main character is a raven who is destined to become a guide to lost souls, helping them find their way to a new world. Starting his journey as a chick, he gradually turns into a mythical creature from ancient legends. However, his very first mission turns into disaster when an ancient evil awakens, disrupting the established order.

item.title: Weed Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Weed Store Simulator is an economic strategy that asks you to build a criminal empire under the guise of a legal store. The entire gameplay is built on a risky balance between the world of law and underground activities. To survive and thrive, you must build complex relationships with various factions, including the police, mafia and street gangs. Any wrong step can lead to disaster: problems with law enforcement agencies threaten raids and business closures, and refusal to cooperate with the mafia will inevitably lead to supply disruptions.

item.title: Inn Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Inn Tycoon offers relaxation. Forget about the hustle and bustle of modern life. This adventure game will take you back to simpler times, where running an inn is the main event. No stress, no deadlines, just you and your virtual business. The gameplay is focused on managing the inn. You hire staff, decorate rooms and serve clients. It’s a simple concept done with a soft touch. No complex systems or mind-blowing tasks.

item.title: Kentum
item.description: Game Description Kentum is a sci-fi adventure where the death of the protagonist is only a temporary setback thanks to cloning technology. The main task is to revive civilization, relying solely on automation and our own strength. The basis for survival is the creation of a self-regulating environment, where automated mechanisms and conveyor belts turn the shelter into a full-fledged production complex. Here, coal is produced from bones and wood, and ingots are smelted from scrap metal, gradually building a complex system to provide themselves with everything they need in a world devoid of people.

item.title: Line Clipper: Tennis Tactics
item.description: Game Description Line Clipper: Tennis Tactics is a tactical tennis simulator in which the outcome of the match is decided not by the speed of reaction, but by the depth of strategic planning. The gameplay is based on a turn-based system that encourages you to focus on analyzing your opponent’s playing style to gain a decisive advantage. A key mechanic is the ability to line up the perfect shot and pre-simulate its outcome before committing to the action on the court.

item.title: Mecha Blitz
item.description: Game Description Mecha Blitz is an anime-inspired, isometric top-down shooter where players build mechs and engage in chaotic arena battles. The process of creating your own mech, called an Arbiter, offers access to over 100 parts, internal components and weapons. In addition to extensive cosmetic options, there is an upgrade system to improve equipment, abilities and characteristics. The depth of tactical capabilities is revealed through the creation of unique builds. You can design both a mobile but vulnerable vehicle and a heavily armored fortress, which directly affects the style of combat.

item.title: My Little Spider
item.description: Game Description My Little Spider invites you to fill out Bugopedia, an extensive catalog of over 50 species of insects. To find everything from the common blue blowfly to the beautiful monarch, you’ll have to keep a close eye on the in-game clock, as many species only appear at certain times. This difficult task is performed by a charming pet spider, who has taken up residence right on your desktop. He independently weaves a web and catches beetles flying by while the gamer goes about his business.

item.title: Only Up: BRAINROT TOGETHER
item.description: Game Description Only Up: BRAINROT TOGETHER offers a surreal and chaotic adventure where the main goal is to climb to unimaginable heights. In this psychedelic world, the protagonist Tung Tung Sahur and his friends must reach the top, but their venture is constantly under threat. Every ledge and platform is haunted by bizarre creatures, including Bombardino Cocodrilo and Spijuniro Golubiro. These opponents turn every step into a test of strength, testing not only the coordination, but also the mental stability of the daredevils who decide to climb.

item.title: Reentry - An Orbital Simulator
item.description: Game Description Reentry - An Orbital Simulator will tell about the everyday life of real astronauts participating in space programs. The game presents models of real vehicles that have ever left our planet. Having created your astronaut, manage his career and each flight. Each completed task will bring experience. Among these there will be both operations already written into history, and fictional ones that are designed to give the player a feel for themselves in unprecedented circumstances.

item.title: Restaurants
item.description: Game Description Restaurats is a medieval restaurant management simulator where the main characters are a team of resourceful rats. Gamers will have to take full control over all aspects of running a business in a fantasy world. The process includes not only preparing dishes according to a variety of recipes, but also submitting orders on time, as well as maintaining order on the tables. The development of the establishment occurs gradually, opening up access to new drawings to expand the tavern and improve its functionality.

item.title: Session Notes: Route 404
item.description: Game Description Session Notes: Route 404, a first-person psychological survival horror game, follows the story of a former bus steward. His attempt to return to normal life turns into a nightmare journey, where the line between reality and illusion is erased forever. The protagonist will have to fulfill his direct responsibilities: serve passengers, solve their problems and monitor the condition of transport. However, every action takes place under the yoke of the past, because the trauma experienced constantly distorts the perception of the world around us, turning an ordinary trip into a surreal thriller with several possible endings.

item.title: Cosmic Coop
item.description: Game Description Cosmic Coop is an adventure that takes gamers to their own extraterrestrial farm, beyond which lie uncharted territories full of mysteries and strange NPCs. Descent into the mysterious mines will require courage and a faithful sword, because not only treasures await there, but also various challenges. It is in such forays that one can discover rare materials necessary to create unique items that can transform a personal farmstead and attract the attention of amazing creatures to it.

item.title: Deep Space Exploitation
item.description: Game Description Deep Space Exploitation is a space mining simulator in which pilots have to work for a dubious corporation in the distant future. The storyline, spanning a prologue and several epilogues, challenges gamers to survive under harsh corporate oppression. The main gameplay comes down to the exploration of asteroid fields, where not only courage is required, but also extreme caution to successfully extract resources. Every decision made directly affects the further development of events and the ability to secure a decent future for oneself.

item.title: Egging On
item.description: Game Description Egging On is a brutal test where every wrong move sends the fragile egg-shaped protagonist back to where he started. There’s no save system, making vertical climbing a tense test of precision and patience. To achieve the cherished freedom, you have to perfectly master difficult physics, feeling every vibration and roll of your fragile shell. Success depends on the ability to synchronize the rotation with the jump to achieve maximum height, because any mistake threatens to fall and the need to start all over again.

item.title: Electronics Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Electronics Store Simulator presents the entrepreneur with a complex task of managing a high-tech business, where it is necessary to constantly adapt to market conditions. Success directly depends on the ability to analyze demand for various product categories, from smartphones and laptops to drones. You have to balance between purchasing popular gadgets and managing inventory to avoid shortages or excess products. Setting competitive prices and providing a high level of customer service become the foundation for creating a loyal audience and, as a result, increasing the company’s profits.

item.title: Jitter
item.description: Game Description Jitter is a sci-fi simulator that immerses you in the dark atmosphere of the consequences of a catastrophe in the Main Asteroid Belt. A once-bustling mining colony lies in ruins after a mysterious incident, and the truth behind what happened must be uncovered in the rubble. The danger comes not only from the destroyed environment, but also from pirates or even unknown life forms lurking in the shadows. To survive and complete the mission, you must carefully explore abandoned mines, colossal cave systems and remote outposts scattered across the surface of a giant asteroid.

item.title: Star Ores Inc.
item.description: Game Description Star Ores Inc. — a journey into the depths of space, where you will take control of an abandoned station, turning it into the center of a mining empire. Located in the middle of an asteroid field, this complex becomes the starting point for the career of an intergalactic entrepreneur. The initial steps involve manual work, using a high-tech laser drill to cut through the asteroids yourself to extract valuable minerals.

item.title: The Last Caretaker
item.description: Game Description The Last Caretaker is a story of survival in a world where hostile mechanisms and a constant lack of resources force you to act methodically. The gameplay is based on the exploration of abandoned structures towering over the endless ocean. Each rusty tower or silent dock becomes a source of valuable materials obtained by dismantling the remains of a former civilization. Not only tools and weapons are created from the recovered scrap, but also complex energy networks.

item.title: Whiskerwood
item.description: Game Description Whiskerwood is a city-building simulator where industrious mice have to found a colony under the yoke of feline overlords. Space on the islands is limited, so the development of the settlement is directed not only in breadth, but also deep into the rocks and up to the skies. Verticality becomes a key element, forcing the construction of complex networks of conveyors, elevators and pipelines to transport resources and provide residents with everything they need.

item.title: Generation Exile
item.description: Game Description Generation Exile offers an atypical take on the city-building simulation genre. Instead of developing new territories and endless mining, we have to find a balance in a closed system. Progress is to create closed cycles where biological waste is transformed into nutrients or raw materials for bioplastics using anaerobic reactors. Each step in this step-by-step project requires careful planning of resources, since they cannot be replenished from the outside, and the goal is sustainability, not endless growth.

item.title: Starlit Stories
item.description: Game Description Starlit Stories is a unique space for creativity, completely free from any restrictions and haste. In this simulator, there is no need for resource management or meeting strict deadlines, thanks to which all gameplay concentrates solely on creation. To the sounds of soothing melodies, the player will have to build the campsite of his dreams, thinking through every detail and customizing the environment to his own taste. The process of construction and customization becomes a form of meditation, allowing you to liberate your imagination and create a unique sanctuary filled with harmony.

item.title: Strange Seed
item.description: Game Description Strange Seed is a project where survival depends not so much on reflexes, but on thoughtful mutation. Fighting enemies, including ferocious Soulslike bosses, requires creating a creature with the optimal set of body parts for a given situation. Victory is achieved not by brute force, but by a competent selection of evolutionary improvements, turning each battle into a tactical puzzle. Sophisticated strategies allow you to find vulnerabilities in even the most formidable creatures, opening up opportunities for unconventional victories.

item.title: Tavern Keeper
item.description: Game Description Tavern Keeper is a management simulator that dives into the intricacies of running a fantasy tavern. Here every little thing matters, from simulating the temperature and spoilage of food in the cellar to the likelihood of a fire from a spark from the fireplace. The success of an establishment directly depends on the ability to cope with such situations, be it a sudden illness of a cleaner or furniture breakdown in the middle of the evening.

item.title: Vivid World
item.description: Game Description Vivid World is a role-playing adventure where the souls of heroes are trapped in gems for battle in the depths of the Underworld. This demonic kingdom is ruled by the protagonist Lemuria, who has mastered the new Gems Magic to conquer procedurally generated dungeons. The basis of the gameplay is the formation of a combat squad from these crystalline creatures. Characters can be bought and sold in the jewelry store, and collecting identical gems significantly enhances their characteristics, opening up powerful combinations for tactical automatic battles.

item.title: Car Factory Empire
item.description: Game Description Car Factory Empire - testing the effectiveness of self-designed cars takes place on race tracks, where artificial intelligence acts as an opponent. However, success in the races is only part of the global struggle for market dominance. Competitors are actively fighting for control of resource-rich territories and key cities. Providing production capacity with raw materials by capturing mines and factories on the world map becomes a primary task for any aspiring industrialist.

item.title: Count Meowcula's Barbershop
item.description: Game Description Count Meowcula’s Barbershop offers an extraordinary experience where every action requires precision and quick reflexes. As the bloodlust builds, tool control is inverted, turning a routine beard trim into a tense ordeal. An unsuccessful cut or a bloody incident instantly damages the reputation of the establishment, forcing it to immediately hide any evidence. Ignoring even one spot can cost customers' trust and lead to failure. This simulator forces you to constantly be on your guard, because beauty, as you know, requires sacrifice.

item.title: Legends of Dragaea: Idle Dungeons
item.description: Game Description Legends of Dragaea Idle Dungeons is a journey through a mysterious continent, where the main character arrives, guided by a mysterious dream. Here you will have to found your own guild of adventurers and uncover the secrets of the ancient land. The main process is based on managing squads that independently explore dangerous dungeons in search of treasure and glory. The player is assigned the role of a strategist who determines the composition of the teams, their equipment and development paths.

item.title: Mall Simulator
item.description: Game Description Mall Simulator is a test of management skills where maintaining financial balance is the key to prosperity. To prevent bankruptcy, it is necessary to be sensitive to consumer trends and set thoughtful prices for goods. The satisfaction of each visitor becomes a paramount task, the solution of which directly affects the success of the entire enterprise. You have to constantly monitor the assortment, enter into partnerships with famous brands and decorate the space, creating the ideal atmosphere for shopping.

item.title: Cats and Cups
item.description: Game Description Cats and Cups is a simulator for managing your own establishment, where the path from a simple barista to a real business tycoon requires attention to every detail. The success of the establishment directly depends on the timely modernization of equipment, which allows for significantly faster service to visitors. Good business management includes not only working behind the counter, but also constantly monitoring the stock of ingredients. Thoughtful improvements to all aspects of the cafe open up access to new, more complex recipes and allow you to turn a modest coffee shop into the most popular place in town, attracting more and more furry customers.

item.title: The Boss Gangsters: Nightlife
item.description: Game Description The Boss Gangsters Nightlife is a simulator where the path to power lies through managing shady deals and ruthlessly fighting for territory. Interaction with corrupt police officers and influential officials becomes a tool for achieving goals, and the elimination of competitors becomes a severe necessity. Every decision made shapes a reputation in the criminal world, opening up access to new opportunities or provoking brutal raids on a business. Risky black market activities, such as arms trafficking, promise quick profits, but can lead to the loss of everything.

item.title: Cooking Clash
item.description: Game Description Cooking Clash invites you to try on the role of a chef and owner of a noisy diner in virtual reality format. The main task becomes not only masterful cooking, but also managing real chaos. The establishment attracts the most bizarre visitors, among whom there are not only people, but also various animals with their own strange requests. In addition, you have to constantly be on guard, because some guests are not averse to stealing other people’s tips.

item.title: Ramona
item.description: Game Description Ramona takes a young journalist named Samuel on a frightening journey where reality and hallucination merge. The events take place in the 1970s inside an old house, the walls of which are saturated with old secrets and deep remorse. The hero will have to plunge into the claustrophobic atmosphere of psychological horror, making the transition between light and darkness in search of truth. Each room of this ominous place becomes an arena for exploration, forcing the protagonist to confront someone else’s disturbing memories that should have been buried long ago.

item.title: Super Movie Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Super Movie Tycoon gives you the opportunity to create a unique cinematic world where every aspect of filmmaking is under your control. Creating a highly efficient film production pipeline begins with careful planning of professional departments and the development of new land. As director, screenwriter and producer, you personally create all the details of the future masterpiece, using your boundless imagination to conquer Hollywood heights. The entire process, from the initial idea to the end credits, becomes the embodiment of your creative vision.

item.title: Leaf it Alone
item.description: Game Description Leaf it Alone is a simulator where completely clearing each individual area of ​​the yard is rewarded with permanent upgrades, such as running faster or being able to tie bags faster. The arsenal for tidying up includes a rake and a powerful blower, as well as the ability to collect leaves manually. It’s especially fun to work with the rake, which allows you to pull down large piles in one smooth motion thanks to the sticking effect at high pumping levels.

item.title: Ultimate Theater Simulator
item.description: Game Description Ultimate Theater Simulator is a simulator for running your own movie theater, where success depends on every detail. Getting into the business starts with solving immediate problems, from restocking snack displays to setting up projectors before each show. It is necessary to personally monitor order in the halls, because some visitors may disturb others by using phones or even trying to illegally record a film. Over time, routine tasks are delegated to hired personnel, which allows you to focus on the strategic development of your business.

item.title: Dark Moon
item.description: Game Description Dark Moon is about a near and bleak future. This time, things have become very bad for humanity, not thanks to aliens or nuclear war, but because of the Sun. A storm is raging on the star, which has disabled all equipment on Earth and provoked unrest there. On the Moon, things are even worse: the sun’s rays destroy any objects on the earth’s satellite that they manage to reach.

item.title: Truth Universally Acknowledged
item.description: Game Description Truth Universally Acknowledged is a short dating sim where players experience a few days in the life of a typical high school student. The main character is a young man named Talai, whose daily life is filled with study and communication with friends. The narrative revolves around non-linear choices that determine which of four potential partners the protagonist will become romantically involved with. The key feature of the project is the decision-making mechanics: instead of standard text lines, you need to choose Talai’s facial expressions and emotions.

item.title: 1998: The Toll Keeper Story
item.description: Game Description 1998 The Toll Keeper Story - a simulator in which every day at the workplace turns into a test of the strength of moral principles. As Devi, a pregnant toll checkpoint guard, you must make life-changing decisions that determine who gets to travel further and who gets left behind. Document checks and vehicle inspections take place against the backdrop of general chaos engulfing the fictional country of Janapa. Society collapses under the yoke of a financial crisis, protests erupt in the streets, and trust in government evaporates, turning routine work into a series of moral dilemmas.

item.title: Master of Command
item.description: Game Description Master of Command is a project in which command of the armies of the Seven Years' War is presented as a harsh struggle for survival. Resource management is becoming as important as tactical superiority on the battlefield. A commander on a procedurally generated map hidden in the fog of war is constantly faced with a dilemma: make a rapid forced march, risking running out of supplies, or make a stop to replenish supplies, giving the enemy precious time to regroup.

item.title: Outbreak Island
item.description: Game Description Outbreak Island takes place on Erlsen Island. A mysterious virus that came out of nowhere began to drive the inhabitants of a small region crazy. The governments of nearby countries agreed on a secret operation so as not to expose the disaster. The territory was isolated from the rest of the world. The main character, Howard Chapman, secretly arrives on the island to find out the true reasons for the incident.

item.title: Space Chef
item.description: Game Description Space Chef is a thrilling open-world adventure where you must hunt down strange alien creatures and plants to cook them into delicious dishes and deliver them to the most dangerous corners of the galaxy in your homemade spaceship. In this unique combination of exploration, action and cooking, you will use your culinary skills and weapons to overcome challenges and become the best chef in the entire galaxy. Your kitchen just exploded, ruining all your hard work and hopes, but don’t despair!

item.title: BoneField: Bodycam Horror
item.description: Game Description BoneField Bodycam Horror is a story in which the only way to see supernatural creatures is through the use of a special ghost light. This tool allows you not only to illuminate the space, but also to expose paranormal entities hidden from the naked eye. Each flash of this mystical light can reveal a threat lurking in the darkness, turning exploration of locations into a tense confrontation with the unknown.

item.title: Escape Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Escape Simulator 2 is a continuation of the popular quest room simulator, offering immersion in solving puzzles from a first-person view. The project provides the opportunity to explore various locations both alone and in the company of friends. Locked in themed rooms, participants must use their wits and powers of observation to find a way out. The environment is fully interactive: almost any item can be picked up, examined, or used to interact with other objects, which creates the feeling of actually being in an escape room.

item.title: Zombie God
item.description: Game Description An unusual hybrid of real-time strategy and god simulator with roguelike elements, Zombie God offers you to take control of legions of the undead. The main task is to control hordes of zombies who will have to break through the desperate defenses of the survivors. Players take on the role of an ominous deity, directing unstoppable streams of the walking dead to destroy the remnants of civilization. Each mission turns into an ironic test, where the divine will is manifested through the hungry roar of reanimated corpses, ready to crush everything in their path.

item.title: 9 Souls
item.description: Game Description 9 Souls takes you on an atmospheric journey on the edge between madness and reality, where every step requires utmost care. The gameplay is based on constant choice: in each section, three paths open to the protagonist, but only one of them is free from anomalies. The slightest details in the environment, barely noticeable distortions of familiar objects, become the key to advancement. The right decision saves the lost soul, bringing it closer to the solution, but the price of a mistake is immersion in even greater chaos and uncertainty, forcing you to doubt your own perception.

item.title: Chicken Run: Eggstraction
item.description: Game Description Chicken Run: Eggstraction is a team-based adventure that pits familiar heroes, including Rocky and Ginger, on daring forays into high-tech farms. Events pick up after the finale of the animated film Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget, offering a new chapter in the story of the feathered resistance. The main task is to penetrate five carefully guarded facilities to save their relatives from the clutches of the villainous industry.

item.title: Death Frame
item.description: Game Description Death Frame is a psychological horror game in which the protagonist, the estranged child of a notorious serial killer, returns to the mansion he inherited. Inside the dilapidated walls of this estate are hidden paintings that can draw the hero into surreal worlds, woven from fragments of memories and nightmares. Each dive reveals new details about the father’s madness, shedding light on the fate of his victims and, perhaps, on the protagonist’s own bloody legacy.

item.title: Love Craft
item.description: Game Description Love Craft is a dating simulator where the search for a soulmate is based on the principle of selection within a creative circle. Events take place within the walls of Cubiversity University, where the protagonist arrives as a new student. The central element of the story is joining the prestigious Handicraft Club. Here you will have to form a working group of 5 candidates, choosing them from 15 available classmates.

item.title: Midnight Heist
item.description: Game Description Midnight Heist is a unique blend of co-op horror and heist genres that transports players to a dystopian city teeming with intrigue and danger. In this digital realm, hackers find work in a variety of organizations, performing tasks that involve stealing data, breaking into systems, and exposing closely guarded secrets. Whether flying solo or working with up to three teammates, each heist offers its own objectives, challenges and dangerous encounters.

item.title: MISERY
item.description: Game Description MISERY throws up to 15 players into a cooperative survival scenario in a nuclear disaster zone. The characters take on the roles of PMCs guarding a research institute in the Republic of Zaslavie before the conflict escalated into nuclear war.
