A siren sounds, signaling an incoming bomb and providing a 60-second window to grab supplies before retreating to the bunker. After the strike, the daily routine consists of forays into the procedurally generated Exclusion Zone to collect resources from ruined cities and abandoned military bases.

item.title: Slots and Daggers
item.description: Game Description Slots and Daggers is a retro fantasy adventure wrapped in slot machine mechanics, where each spin determines the fate of the hero in dangerous lands. The gameplay is based on the rotation of reels, the symbols on which correspond to actions in battle: attacks, the use of potions or spells. Defeating eccentric opponents that include Kul Knights and Hammer-wielding Goblins will require not only quick reflexes and luck, but also strategic thinking.

item.title: Super Fantasy Kingdom
item.description: Game Description Super Fantasy Kingdom is an exciting and addictive game where gamers will experience an exciting adventure filled with strategic gameplay and endless possibilities. With a randomly generated map and a hero at your disposal, you embark on each journey with the goal of protecting your kingdom from the relentless hordes of monsters. This survival roguelike offers a huge amount of options, allowing you to recruit over 100 different units, each with unique abilities and synergies.

item.title: Tattoo Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Tattoo Tycoon is a management simulator in which you will revive the tattoo culture in the city of Tattooga Bay, which was once its center. The protagonist, whose appearance and backstory can be created independently, gets the last remaining salon. The main task is to turn a modest studio into a thriving chain of establishments, returning the city to its former glory. This will require not only skillfully applying designs to the skin, but also building relationships with a variety of residents, among whom there are eccentric clients and problematic artists, as well as an influential businessman known as the Tycoon.

item.title: The Bench
item.description: Game Description The Bench is the story of an elderly retiree who, tired of the rules of a nursing home, decides to run away. Armed with a cane and an endless supply of bread, he sets out on a journey through a colorful world, moving from one bench to another. An ever-growing flock of pigeons becomes his faithful companions and assistants in this adventure. Feathered friends not only accompany the protagonist, but also carry out his instructions, helping to solve puzzles and obtain useful items necessary for advancement.

item.title: UltraGirl Alters
item.description: Game Description UltraGirl Alters is a tactical project in which the gamer controls a group of virtual idols, Alters, fighting the creations of corporate algorithms. Five girls, dressed in tokusatsu-style battle suits, confront monsters on live-streamed battlefields. The outcome of each clash is determined not only by the competent use of the heroines’ unique abilities, but also by the reaction of the audience to the actions of the commander. Accumulating SP points gives you access to ultimate attacks that can destroy entire squads of enemies or deal devastating damage to bosses.

item.title: VEIN
item.description: Game Description VEIN is a journey into a world that has experienced the collapse of civilization, where survival depends on the ability to adapt to constantly changing conditions. The change of seasons and random global events continuously transform the landscape and influence tactics. Here, every sound matters, as opponents controlled by artificial intelligence are able to track down survivors, relying on sight, hearing and smell. This forces you to be constantly on alert, because even abandoned buildings can harbor a mortal threat in the form of mutated zombies.

item.title: oneway.exe: Module 1.0
item.description: Game Description oneway.exe: Module 1.0 places the gamer in a corrupted and unfinished video game. The setting for the investigation of her past is UNTITLED.exe - a declining digital space. The main goal is to uncover the story of its three creators and find out the circumstances that destroyed their working relationship. Gamers reconstruct the narrative by exploring the remains of an abandoned project, tormented by virtual decay and fragmented memories.

item.title: The Jackbox Party Pack 11
item.description: Game Description The Jackbox Party Pack 11 is a collection of five unique party experiences that offer a fresh take on familiar formats. For the first time in the history of the series, the collection consists entirely of original concepts, abandoning the continuations of popular hits like Quiplash or Fibbage. Players will be immersed in a variety of activities, from creating absurd sound effects in Hear Say to collaborating on slaying monsters using erudition in Legends of Trivia.

item.title: House Builder 2
item.description: Game Description House Builder 2 is a simulation game in which the building process begins with careful planning and preparation. Before laying the first stone in the foundation, you have to go to the warehouse to get the necessary tools and materials. After loading everything onto his truck, the player goes anywhere in the vast open world to begin fulfilling the order. The developers have focused on advanced construction mechanics, which provide high precision and control over every stage of work, from the construction of walls to the smallest interior details.

item.title: Refate: Echoes of Desire
item.description: Game Description Refate Echoes of Desire is a cinematic adventure where the protagonist’s consciousness returns to the neon streets of Tokyo, and the memory of the past is completely erased. Finding himself in the midst of a violent conflict between powerful Yakuza clans and police forces, the protagonist is forced to survive without any money or allies. The only way to restore his lost identity is to build relationships with eight completely different women, each of whom holds a piece of the puzzle of his past.

item.title: Fantasy Maiden Wars - DREAM OF THE STRAY DREAMER -
item.description: Game Description Fantasy Maiden Wars DREAM OF THE STRAY DREAMER is a tactical role-playing project, the events of which take place in a world called Genshokyo, where gods, people and supernatural creatures youkai exist together. The story begins with a series of mysterious incidents that upset the fragile balance of this region. To understand the causes of the growing chaos, two heroines, the priestess Reimu Hakurei and the sorceress Marisa Kirisame, set off on a long journey.

item.title: Hoop Land
item.description: Game Description Hoop Land is a detailed simulator that takes you from a young athlete to the greatest player of all time. The main task is to build your own basketball dynasty, where every decision affects your rise to glory. The path to greatness begins not in the professional arena, but in school. In Career Mode, your character develops as a young prospect who must choose a college, build relationships with teammates, and ultimately enter the draft to earn honors and recognition in the professional league.

item.title: Gamestonk Simulator: Gone Rogue
item.description: Game Description Gamestonk Simulator: Gone Rogue is a roguelite store simulator. Gamers will have to manage the last video game store in town, solving everyday problems in a changing market. Every morning you need to order new game licenses, consoles and peripherals to replenish the assortment. During the day, you will be required to stock shelves and work behind the cash register to process payments. The goal is to support the business through strategic purchasing and effective sales.

item.title: HyperBlade 2050 - Dystopian Sports Manager
item.description: Game Description HyperBlade 2050 - Dystopian Sports Manager is a text-based sports management simulator that immerses you in the gloomy atmosphere of a dystopian Future Earth. Here, against the background of the decline of civilization, brutal sports competitions became the main entertainment for the masses, requiring incredible endurance from the participants. The gameplay is based on the fictional discipline Hyperblade, which is a hybrid of hockey, handball and roller derby. The concept for this brutal competition draws heavily from the classic 1975 film Rollerball, offering an elaborate story about life in an alternate 2050s.

item.title: Lessaria: Fantasy Kingdom Sim
item.description: Game Description Lessaria Fantasy Kingdom Sim - offers you to lead a fantasy kingdom, where wayward heroes live their own lives, often ignoring the direct instructions of the ruler. Instead of direct command of troops, all the power of the monarch is reduced to indirect influence on the actions of adventurers. Adventurers decide for themselves whether to explore ancient ruins, fight goblins, or simply hang out in a tavern. Their behavior, based on their unique character traits, makes government a challenging task that requires strategic thinking and the ability to adapt to the ever-changing circumstances in the lands of Lessaria.

item.title: Go To Sleep
item.description: Game Description Go To Sleep is a psychological horror that plunges the protagonist into a nightmare from which there seems to be no way out. Events unfold within the confines of one room, where a young teenager finds himself locked with his fears, embodied in the form of a ruthless demon. This creature, born of guilt and regret, tirelessly pursues the hero, trying to plunge him into eternal sleep forever. The only salvation is a paradoxical action - close your eyes and fall asleep in order to speed up the passage of time until the saving sound of the alarm clock.

item.title: Skinfreak
item.description: Game Description Skinfreak is the story of a creepy night during which a serial killer known as Skinfreak goes on the hunt for his next victim. His terrifying goal is to add human skin to his collection, and this time his gaze falls on Belle, an employee of one of the city’s companies. A girl finds herself in a deadly trap when a mundane work task turns into a desperate fight for survival.

item.title: Zaccaria Pinball
item.description: Game Description Zaccaria Pinball is the digital incarnation of pinball machines, offering an extensive collection of tables divided into several categories. Enthusiasts have access to both classic electro-mechanical (EM) devices, like Nautilus or Universe, and more modern solid-state (SS) versions, including Time Machine and Devil Riders. In addition to authentic recreations, the project includes completely redesigned tables such as Space Shuttle 2016 and Farfalla 2017, as well as unique themed designs presented in the Award category, where you can find The Mummy and Aliens.

item.title: Bad Janitor
item.description: Game Description Bad Janitor is a clever eviction operation disguised as routine cleaning of premises. The main character, acting undercover, must quietly create unbearable living conditions in order to force people to leave their apartments. Penetrating into other people’s apartments in the absence of the owners, the protagonist uses household items to organize minor dirty tricks. Every action, from turning on the radio at full volume to ruining the taps, must look like an accident, maintaining the cover of a secret agent.

item.title: Choco Kiosk Simulator
item.description: Game Description Choco Kiosk Simulator is an enterprise in which managing a small retail outlet becomes a test of strength in the face of growing urban absurdity. In this world, the survival of the confectionery business depends not only on the timely purchase of milk chocolate from the wholesaler, but also on the ability to withstand zombie outbreaks on weekends. The entrepreneur has to make a choice: develop a legal chocolate empire, attracting passers-by, or take a risky path, fulfilling orders for alien clients.

item.title: ScreenWolf
item.description: Game Description ScreenWolf is a creative platform that lets you bring your computer desktop to life with unique virtual companions. The basis of the project is a special toolkit ScreenWolf Pet Packager, which allows users to independently create and share pets. Thanks to the open structure, anyone can design their own creatures, giving them unique animations, sound effects and style of interaction with the environment, turning the desktop into a personal interactive space.

item.title: Undusted: Letters from the Past
item.description: Game Description Undusted Letters from the Past is a touching story about a girl named Jane who, after moving into her late grandmother’s house, discovers an abandoned workshop full of dusty and broken objects. Every item, be it an old camera or a music box, requires careful restoration. The process of dusting and repairing the mechanisms reveals hidden letters and memories, gradually revealing a secret love story from her family’s past.

item.title: Spacenap
item.description: Game Description Spacenap is a journey into the depths of space, where the main task is to create unique constellations from a variety of stellar bodies. Players will have to discover hidden celestial patterns and expand their collections by receiving passive bonuses or selling creations for gold coins. The whole process is tied to the search and collection of stars, for which special assistants are involved: scout owls discover star fields, and collector owls help to obtain them.

item.title: Before Exit: Gas Station
item.description: Game Description Before Exit: Gas Station is a tense test where a strict boss does not forgive mistakes. Just two missteps separate an employee from being fired, followed by a restart of the entire seven-day work week. This roguelike element turns an ordinary shift into a test of attention to the smallest details, forcing you to constantly be on your guard. Every action has weight, and the cost of inattention is having to start all over again, which creates a unique pressure throughout the entire playthrough.

item.title: Football Pitch Simulator
item.description: Game Description Football Pitch Simulator is a project in which the entrepreneur is responsible for the complete management of his own complex of football fields. Taking care of your business starts with the very basics: it is necessary to promptly repair worn-out surfaces, renew floors and refresh paint to maintain the establishment’s reputation at a high level. The success of an enterprise directly depends on customer satisfaction, which requires informed strategic decisions.

item.title: ACRES
item.description: Game Description ACRES, a strategic simulation game centered on crop production and market needs, offers a unique and engaging farming experience. Here you set out on a journey to build a successful farm, one acre at a time, by responding to market orders, upgrading equipment, and optimizing yields under time pressure. The project challenges you to thrive in an ever-evolving agricultural market. The key is to grow crops in a targeted manner.

item.title: Last Term
item.description: Game Description Last Term is a plunge into an endless nightmare, where a mysterious deity imprisoned the protagonist within the walls of a school. The main task is to escape from this time loop, for which you need to go down to the ground floor of the building. The way out of the vicious circle of repeating locations lies through attention to detail and the ability to distinguish the norm from the terrible deviations embedded in the familiar environment.

item.title: Pocket Boss
item.description: Game Description Pocket Boss puts the player in the role of a remote employee whose main task is to manipulate business schedules. The central goal is to achieve a promotion in one week by adjusting data to meet the demands of superiors. These activities include inflating performance metrics, increasing shareholder value, and hiding financial losses in reports. Each task requires you to find a convincing solution to an information puzzle while taking into account the whims of your boss.

item.title: The Legacy
item.description: Game Description The Legacy is a co-op survival horror game set in a dark tale of a family curse in a deserted town. Events unfold years after in 1990, Grandfather Molfar, a local sorcerer, refused to sacrifice one of his descendants to the dark forces of the forest. To save his grandchildren, he sent them from their hometown of Svetlograd to Kyiv, but this act doomed the entire area to death and desolation.

item.title: EMOTIONLESS: The Last Ticket
item.description: Game Description In EMOTIONLESS: The Last Ticket, James Anderson returns to the abandoned amusement park built by his missing father. The hero’s search for answers leads him into a surreal world that turns familiar locations into alarming dead ends. The structure of the environment defies logic: every corridor and tunnel opens up a new layer of unreal reality. The main mystery lies in uncovering the frightening story of the strange transformation of the park and discovering what lurks in its empty spaces.

item.title: Little Rocket Lab
item.description: Game Description Little Rocket Lab tells the story of aspiring engineer Morgan, who returns to her home to complete her family dream of building a rocket. The girl discovers that the city of Saint-Ambroise has changed a lot, and now her experience is needed to help local residents and revive the region. Through research and creation of ingenious devices and factories, Morgan directs his efforts to solving the problems of the community.

item.title: Seafarer: The Ship Sim
item.description: Game Description Seafarer: The Ship Sim puts gamers at the helm of a variety of ships on a spacious open-world map. The environment, inspired by northern European landscapes, includes many harbors and towns to navigate. The career path is determined through interaction with factions that offer unique missions and goals. Activities range from transporting goods between ports and fighting fires on the high seas to rescuing lost cargo. Gradually, it is necessary to expand the personal fleet, replenishing it with both small tugboats and huge dry cargo ships to carry out new tasks.

item.title: Erannorth Renaissance
item.description: Game Description Erannorth Renaissance is an RPG where every decision shapes the unfolding journey. Users move around a vast world, freely creating their own path, participating in turn-based battles and interacting with a number of unique heroes. The title combines tabletop mechanics and expansive storytelling, offering a variety of possibilities in a Renaissance-inspired setting. The characters evolve based on the choices made throughout their journey, affecting not only their personal growth, but also the world around them.

item.title: Cargo Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cargo Simulator starts with managing one logistics warehouse. The main task is to process incoming goods, selecting the most suitable packaging box in terms of size, shape and fragility. Correctly packaged and addressed parcels become the basis of the company’s activities. Accurate and timely fulfillment of orders lays the foundation for business growth and creates a reputation in the local market, allowing you to expand later from a small start.

item.title: Beatblock
item.description: Game Description In Beatblock, the player controls a platform located in the center of a circular arena. As the character Cranky, you need to intercept blocks that appear in time with the melody. This action requires constant rotation to meet targets that appear around the perimeter. Gameplay is complicated by the introduction of four different types of blocks, each requiring a different approach to eliminate. Each track is a self-contained level with a unique visual style, in which the main goal is to score points.

item.title: Car Dealership Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Car Dealership Simulator 2 puts the player in charge of a growing car trade. The main occupation is exploring the open city in search of cars to buy at various markets and from other dealers. You can purchase both new and used vehicles, each of which opens up the opportunity to make a profit. Through a continuous cycle of strategic purchasing and effective sales, you will expand the business and achieve a dominant position in the car market, turning the initial enterprise into a large business.

item.title: Mars First Logistics
item.description: Game Description Mars First Logistics physics and transportation simulator with an open world to explore. The game was invented so that the player could feel like a delivery driver of various cargo items with a capricious shape. To deliver the cargo that the game provides, you need to take a vehicle. You can make a car or a vehicle on wheels yourself from various mechanisms offered by the game. To promote and develop your mechanical creation, you need to receive virtual currency called credits.

item.title: STARIO: Haven Tower
item.description: Game Description STARIO: Haven Tower challenges survivors to escape a sand apocalypse by building a vertical kingdom. Led by prophecy, they strive to leave the wasteland and build a tower up to the clouds. Each new tier symbolizes progress away from the harsh Sand Zone. This structure is inhabited by settlers, whose fate directly depends on the successful expansion of the structure upward. Proper management of resources becomes the key to the survival of a community during an upswing.

item.title: Slime Rancher 2
item.description: Game Description Slime Rancher 2 continues the adventure of Beatrix LeBeau, who travels to Rainbow Island, making her way through a host of obstacles to create a slug farm. The platformer with construction elements features an open world where the user is invited to encounter a mass of slimes that must be collected using a special blaster-vacuum cleaner. Here you will also discover new species of slugs, explore a mysterious world, and build a greenhouse, placing it on a paradise island.

item.title: Banker Simulator
item.description: Game Description Banker Simulator tasks the player with reviving a bankrupt bank. The main goal is to return profitability to the financial structure through competent management and strategic investments, overcoming economic difficulties to restore market positions. The process requires a balance between active actions and passive income, forcing you to take into account both customer needs and long-term risks. Success depends on the ability to lift an organization from the abyss and secure its place in the industry.

item.title: Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith
item.description: Game Description Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith puts you in the role of a skilled blacksmith in a medieval fantasy world. It revolves around crafting weapons and armor, but there’s more to it than just forging tools. The user will have to dive into mining, explore the mines to find ore and gems, and then create items from these resources. As a blacksmith, you are constantly faced with an influx of orders from various villagers who require different equipment for their needs.

item.title: Witchy Business
item.description: Game Description Witchy Business offers you to run your own witchcraft shop. The main task is to prepare potions for a continuous flow of customers. Daily activities include fulfilling special orders, crafting magical items, and growing your enterprise. You also need to deal with troubles, for example, casting spells on thieves trying to steal coins. The ultimate goal is to successfully manage the establishment and achieve its prosperity through high-quality service and streamlined production.

item.title: Call to Arms: Panzer Elite
item.description: Game Description Call to Arms: Panzer Elite puts a World War II era tank platoon under the player’s command. In the role of a German officer in 1944, you have to stop the advancing enemy forces on French territory. Players form their own armored units and lead them into battle. Control occurs from both a third and a first person to assess the situation and direct control. Gameplay focuses on platoon-level tactics during historical battles, requiring coordinated action to defeat the enemy.

item.title: I Hate My Waifu Streamer
item.description: Game Description In I Hate My Waifu Streamer, the gamer will have to capture the attention of the streamer before other viewers. The main goal is to interact with a girl named Mio during her live broadcasts. Communication is based on writing chat messages and sending donations to stand out among other subscribers. This competition for recognition forms the basis of the gameplay, and financial support becomes a key way to develop relationships and attract Mio’s interest.

item.title: Antivirus PROTOCOL
item.description: Game Description Antivirus PROTOCOL opens up a digital world captured by the ubiquitous Virus, and the gamer is given the role of counter-program. The main task is the methodical extermination of hostile elements that have filled the system. The first steps involve eliminating small pests to obtain their internal components, represented by code fragments and raw data. This process of gathering resources becomes the basis for achieving the main goal - complete cleanup of the infected network.

item.title: Town to City
item.description: Game Description Town to City challenges the player to transform a 19th-century Mediterranean settlement into a thriving metropolis. Construction without reference to a grid allows you to freely place all structures and natural elements. This way you can create both orderly areas with straight avenues and organically growing towns connected by winding paths. The placement of residential buildings, shops and infrastructure shapes the layout and functionality of a growing city.

item.title: eXoSpace Combat Engineer
item.description: Game Description eXoSpace Combat Engineer is a journey into the depths of a procedurally generated galaxy, where survival depends solely on engineering savvy and piloting skill. In the role of a bounty hunter, you will have to chart a course through unexplored sectors of space, each hyperjump in which promises unpredictable events. Fate can lead you to a research station in distress, throw you into the thick of a battle with pirates, or force you to face a moral choice - to provide assistance or engage in robbery.

item.title: Little Witch in the Woods
item.description: Game Description Little Witch in the Woods allows you to plunge into the life of a girl - an apprentice witch who goes to explore a strange forest, helping its inhabitants. The adventure game has a deep storyline, pixel graphics, a variety of activities and the opportunity to spend interesting leisure time. The heroine is Ellie, who learns magic. The young protagonist lives in the Witch House, in the world of LUCEREIN ORTU.

item.title: Mars Attracts
item.description: Game Description Mars Attracts is about managing a theme park in which gamers take on the role of Martians from the Mars Attacks universe. The goal is to create a successful amusement park on Mars, attracting Martian visitors with thrilling rides, human exhibits, and other unique attractions. To make it more interesting, people are abducted from different periods of history to serve as central exhibits, while managing the park’s finances and maintaining order.

item.title: Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream
item.description: Game Description In Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream, the story takes place in South Jakarta two years after the ending of the original game. The plot follows the intertwined destinies of the Parakacuk gang and the music group Beyond Dream as they pursue their own ambitions. The central conflict revolves around uncovering secrets surrounding drugs and conspiracies affecting the city’s youth. This game’s narrative combines action with elements of comedy, emotional drama and investigation.

item.title: Professional Fishing 2
item.description: Game Description Players in Professional Fishing 2 begin their journey as novice anglers with simple equipment. The starter kit includes an old fishing rod, a reel from the 1980s, and bait bread. The landing net helps you catch prey, and the tent allows you to rest and create a save point anywhere. With the accumulation of experience and increasing levels comes progress. Selling the fish you catch earns you the currency you need to purchase upgraded equipment, which gives you access to various techniques such as float fishing, spinning and feeder methods, as well as special baits and sonar for tracking down large prey.

item.title: Touhou Farming ~ Minoriko's Homestead Harvest
item.description: Game Description Touhou Farming ~ Minoriko’s Homestead Harvest challenges the harvest goddess Minoriko Aki to increase the number of her followers. In the world of Gensokyo, there is high competition among deities, so the heroine strives to provide food for the growing Human Settlement. Her main goal is to accumulate faith, which serves as a measure of popularity, by growing various crops, including a special sweet potato. All of these activities are carried out in conjunction with the Moriya Shrine to take advantage of the changes in the region.

item.title: Kemono Teatime
item.description: Game Description Kemono Teatime invites the player to lead a cafe in the world of Melodius, which has become a refuge for visitors with animal ears. The main task is to prepare signature tea blends for a diverse clientele, where each guest has their own history and preferences. Communication with these characters is central to the narrative, as their visits are temporary and serve as a prelude to their eventual fate.

item.title: Pompiers Simulator
item.description: Game Description Pompiers Simulator is a simulation in which the effectiveness of actions directly depends on the correct distribution of points and an accurate assessment of the condition of the victims. The project, created with the participation of active firefighters, invites you to immerse yourself in the world of emergency assistance, where each manipulation is based on real protocols of the French rescue services. The gameplay is built around interacting with the interface using the mouse, allowing for inspection, dialogue and tracking the vital signs of victims in static images.

item.title: STORY OF SEASONS: Grand Bazaar
item.description: Game Description STORY OF SEASONS: Grand Bazaar immerses you in a new life in the town of Zephyr Town, with a focus on cultivating fields and raising livestock. The settlement’s central marketplace, once a global commercial hub, has fallen into disrepair. The key challenge is to restore this market square to its former glory. You have to collect the fruits of labor and create rare delicacies for sale at your own retail outlet, which directly contributes to the economic revival of Zephyr Town.

item.title: Parisian Brasserie Simulator
item.description: Game Description Parisian Brasserie Simulator begins gameplay on a Parisian avenue: setting up tables, ordering ingredients, and creating a menu for the grand opening. The owner needs to set up the space in preparation for the first day, including developing seasonal menus based on French cuisine. Once preparations are complete, the doors open to welcome the first customers. The main task is to turn a small establishment into a recognized city institution.

item.title: Waterpark Simulator
item.description: Game Description Waterpark Simulator invites the player to build unique attractions and manage the water complex from the first person. At first, all duties are performed manually: from selling tickets and preparing food to rescuing drowning visitors. Operational chaos also affects the maintenance of infrastructure, including repairing broken slides, cleaning the area and removing debris from swimming pools. Every aspect of the establishment’s layout and design is subject to direct instructions.

item.title: Ways of Alchemy
item.description: Game Description In Ways of Alchemy, the player begins his journey in a secluded hut, where he uses card mechanics to create powerful elixirs from many ingredients. The final goal is to build an entire alchemical empire on the basis of a modest shack, using intelligence and tactical thinking. To do this, you will have to look for ancient recipes and recruit adventurers, constantly avoiding the close attention of the Inquisition.

item.title: Stone Simulator - Just Be a Rock
item.description: Game Description Stone Simulator - Just Be a Rock offers you to live the life of one motionless boulder over huge periods of time. The key is to simply exist, observing the evolving world in a continuous cycle of days, nights and changing seasons. The stationary facility endures dynamic weather events, from summer heat and spring rains to severe winter snowstorms. This unique gaming experience unfolds from a static third-person perspective, emphasizing passive contemplation rather than direct action.

item.title: Returns Outlet Simulator
item.description: Game Description Returns Outlet Simulator invites the player to start by ordering return pallets through the in-game computer system. Incoming shipments contain products that require unpacking and subsequent sorting. The assortment is then stored in the warehouse before being transferred to the sales floor for customers. This basic acquisition and replenishment cycle forms the core of the entire process, challenging the user to control the continuous flow of products from delivery to display.

item.title: Wagotabi: A Japanese Journey
item.description: Game Description Wagotabi: A Japanese Journey is a role-playing game designed to teach the Japanese language. The project offers speech acquisition through interactive dialogues and puzzle solving in a digital analogue of Japan. Progress is achieved through interaction with the environment and its inhabitants. The curriculum introduces hiragana, katakana, and kanji sequentially as vocabulary expands. This structure integrates language practice directly into gameplay, linking progression to linguistic understanding. In Wagotabi: A Japanese Journey, learning focuses on the practical application of vocabulary.

item.title: Noble Legacy
item.description: Game Description Noble Legacy begins in the aftermath of the war, with the player taking over the inherited and neglected kingdom of Greenwood. The task is to manage these lands from a third party, personally controlling the process of revival in its streets and fields. All buildings, from ordinary halls to fortress walls, are erected under the personal control of the gamer. The process involves recruiting skilled settlers, furnishing their homes and meeting their needs to maintain high morale.

item.title: Yield! Fall of Rome
item.description: Game Description Yield! Fall of Rome is a turn-based 4X strategy game that places gamers at the crossroads of history, specifically during the decline of the Roman Empire. Here you have to lead one of eight unique factions, each of which has its own advantages and weaknesses. These factions vary in style, requiring users to adapt to different tactical and strategic approaches. As a result, no two sessions are the same.

item.title: SLACKJAW
item.description: Game Description In SLACKJAW, the player awakens in the basement of a serial killer, becoming his next intended victim. Survival depends on exploring confined spaces and using the resources you find to solve interconnected puzzles. Each action must be performed with caution, since the maniac is at the top and reacts to sounds. The main task is to organize an escape from captivity before being discovered, navigating in a world recreated from an eyewitness account of real events.

item.title: MakeRoom
item.description: Game Description MakeRoom provides the player with a sandbox to create personalized dioramas from an isometric perspective. You will have to construct scenes in three different settings: an interior room, an open-air garden or a camper. To arrange locations, a catalog of more than 1000 objects is used. In addition, special tools allow you to create unique furnishings from scratch, significantly expanding the inventory available for any project. The mechanics of MakeRoom are introduced through a series of educational design tasks on a special island.

item.title: Parking World: Build and Manage
item.description: Game Description Parking World: Build and Manage takes gamers into the realm of parking management, offering a combination of strategy and creativity. In this simulation game, users take on the role of parking lot managers who are responsible for constructing, managing, and expanding their own parking lots. The core gameplay revolves around creating efficient parking solutions while solving various logistics problems. Thanks to the many modes, users can freely play the game on their own terms.

item.title: Tiny Bookshop
item.description: Game Description Tiny Bookshop places the player in the role of an owner who moves to a coastal town to run a mobile bookstall. The gameplay involves managing a second-hand book business, which involves purchasing a variety of literature and other items for sale. The gamer chooses various locations throughout the city to place his store, attracting new types of customers with each change of location. Success depends on understanding the reading habits of local people and building relationships with them.

item.title: Warnament
item.description: Game Description Warnament is a turn-based global strategy game that puts the player in charge of the fate of an entire nation. Progress is achieved through the conquest of new territories and steady development in the military, technological, cultural or political spheres. You have the opportunity to take part in historical scenarios or create completely original worlds using the built-in editor. This approach opens the way to campaigns based on real events, or to alternative universes of your own design, where each province is governed separately.

item.title: Grand Empire 2: Portals Apart
item.description: Game Description Grand Emprise 2: Portals Apart is a survival and crafting experience built around traversing magical portals. As a sequel to Grand Emprise: Time Travel, this project develops the concept of a directed adventure. The journey takes the player through a series of fantasy worlds, where each portal opens up access to new resources. Development follows a linear technology path, forming a structured single-player campaign instead of an open-world sandbox where the gamer determines his own goals.

item.title: Bum: Revenge
item.description: Game Description Bum: Revenge is a first-person crime simulator centered on the life of a homeless person. The plot begins after the protagonist is beaten by his wife’s lover, Dennis. Waking up in the hospital with divorce papers, the hero spends 6 months on the street, becoming addicted to alcohol and drugs. Players enter this world with nothing, exploring the squalid environment of the city’s back streets. The main goal is to survive in new conditions and take revenge.

item.title: Gold Gold Adventure Gold
item.description: Game Description Gold Gold Adventure Gold will put the player in charge of a developing settlement, where currency is the main instrument of power. It is necessary to build a city and establish an economy to attract individuals hungry for profit. These adventurers take on assignments for reward, completing tasks that lead to the accumulation of funds to achieve your goals. In parallel with the management of the settlement, the giant creature needs care, feeding and training, gradually developing into a powerful force.

item.title: Orbi Universo 2
item.description: Game Description Orbi Universo 2 puts the player at the helm of a civilization’s journey through history. It is necessary to lead society from its Neolithic origins to the development of atomic energy. The project operates on a system of nodes that links each component of the nation together. The actions taken produce cascading effects, changing the structure and future of the entire society. This network includes food production, trade, belief systems and conflict.

item.title: Tower Networking Inc.
item.description: Game Description Tower Networking Inc. puts the player at the head of an Internet provider operating in a single, constantly growing structure. The main task is to design and build network infrastructure for new clients as the tower randomly generates additional floors. Players physically connect equipment, connecting cables between switches, routers, and data risers to establish communications. Each new level introduces unique residential or office spaces, introducing varied service requirements that require constant adaptation to the tower’s growth.

item.title: Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of The Rings Game
item.description: Game Description Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game invites gamers to travel to the world of the Shire, a famous location from the Lord of the Rings universe. With a focus on simplicity and community, the title allows gamers to create a hobbit avatar and engage in the various daily activities that make up the humble lives of these beloved characters. From building houses to maintaining gardens, there is no shortage of ways to personalize the Shire and make it feel like home.

item.title: Ascent of Ashes
item.description: Game Description Ascent of Ashes is an immersion in a post-apocalyptic colony where your task is to build and defend a base, survive and explore a world teeming with dangers. Here you will find real-time battles with raiders, aliens and other factions, where you need to use stealth tactics and outwit the enemy. But the base itself also requires attention: grow crops, tame alien creatures, introduce technologies and strengthen walls against enemies.

item.title: Flower in Us
item.description: Game Description Flower in Us features a narrative where the protagonist wakes up in a basement after a brutal attack that erases all personal memory. Nearby is a tied up young woman, in whose gaze one can read a familiar feeling that is unrequited for the player character. She recognizes the main character, but this recognition is not mutual, which immediately creates tension in a closed space. The first goal is to navigate this harsh environment and assess the current situation.

item.title: Prison Escape Simulator: Dig Out
item.description: Game Description Prison Escape Simulator: Dig Out puts the player in the role of a prisoner searching for a path to freedom. The main task is to create a tunnel, a project that starts with a teaspoon hidden under the carpet. This covert operation requires constant attention from the patrolling guards, whose inspections can shut down the enterprise at any time. It is also necessary to solve the logistical problem of disposing of the dug sand by flushing the evidence in the cell toilet.

item.title: Miami Hotel Simulator
item.description: Game Description Miami Hotel Simulator gives the player control of the hotel complex. The task is to turn an old establishment into a profitable business through direct management and renovation. Gamers can decorate the interior of the building and expand its capabilities to attract more visitors. In multiplayer mode, friends work together to manage business, sharing responsibilities for operation and development. Together they improve the hotel and increase its income, coordinating their actions for well-coordinated teamwork.

item.title: Twisted Gallery
item.description: Game Description Twisted Gallery immerses you in a chilling atmosphere of anxious loneliness in the sterile halls of contemporary art. The protagonist finds himself trapped in a space with white walls and polished black floors, where each exhibit is arranged with impeccable precision. However, this apparent calm is constantly disrupted by subtle changes in the environment. The horror here lies not in the screamers, but in the oppressive silence and growing tension that makes you doubt your own perception of reality.

item.title: and Roger
item.description: Game Description and Roger is an interactive novel that begins in the morning, deviating from the usual routine for the main character. Waking up, she discovers her father missing from their home. Instead, a man previously unknown to her is sleeping on the sofa in the living room. When he comes to, the stranger speaks in broken sentences and tells the girl to take medicine, showing sadness in his voice and ignoring her confusion.

item.title: WolfQuest: Anniversary Edition
item.description: Game Description WolfQuest is a wolf simulator. For it they give you a chance to run around Yellowstone National Park in the USA. He will visit Mount Amestist, Slough Creek and the Lamar Valley. The user starts the game in the northern part of the famous nature reserve. The area of ​​the open world reaches 50 square kilometers. There is a change in time of day, seasons and weather conditions.

item.title: Console Shop Simulator
item.description: Game Description Console Shop Simulator puts the player in the role of the owner of a gaming store. Primary activities include conducting day-to-day operations, from arranging titles on shelves to maintaining the cleanliness of the retail space. Gamers interact with customers to fulfill orders and track their satisfaction levels. Strategic product placement and inventory control are central to the operation of a retail outlet. The goal is to effectively manage the project while meeting the needs of customers entering the establishment.

item.title: Gold Miner: Classic Edition
item.description: Game Description Gold Miner: Classic Edition puts the player in control of a miner operating an underground winch with a 2D side-scroller perspective. The main task is to launch the swinging gripper in a timely manner to intercept and retrieve gold nuggets, precious stones and other valuables from the ground. Each level offers a new arrangement of resources under a strict time limit, requiring efficient mining of items to complete a financial goal.

item.title: Digger: Galactic Treasures
item.description: Game Description Digger: Galactic Treasures puts the player in the role of a worker in a distant future where humanity has spread throughout space. This expansion was driven by the search for minerals, but habitable planets remain a rarity. The entire galaxy is controlled by the megacorporation GRAVEX Inc., which exploits the labor of miners and treasure hunters. The story begins with the inheritance of a decommissioned, half-disassembled ship and a notebook from his grandfather, who once worked as a researcher in a corporation.

item.title: Magical Girl Witch Trials
item.description: Game Description Magical Girl Witch Trials opens with high school student Emma awakening in a gloomy prison cell. She turns out to be one of 13 girls forcibly brought to a complex on a remote island. An owl appears and declares that a witch is hiding among them and must be found. The captives are told that they will spend the rest of their lives here if they fail to expose the culprit in a formal trial.

item.title: Who's at the door?
item.description: Game Description Who’s at the door? puts the player in the shoes of a man locked in a house and suffering from psychosis with amnesia. The protagonist, being a psychiatric patient, has no memories of the beginning of his condition, but experiences headaches and hallucinations. The main task is to survive for 8 days, for which you need to receive medicine from visitors. This requires carefully examining your surroundings, because the boundary between perception and reality has begun to disappear.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Studio
item.description: Game Description Bridge Constructor Studio is a series of physics-based construction puzzles. The player’s task is to design structures in animated 3D mini-dioramas. The goal is to apply engineering principles to construct functional span crossings. Once the work is completed, a simulation is run to test the structural integrity of the creation under the influence of physical forces. This process determines the stability and success of the building under the load of passing traffic, summing up the test of the architect’s intent.

item.title: Voxel Eras
item.description: Game Description Voxel Eras presents a 3D world made up of voxels for collection, crafting and automation. The player will have to start with a basic workshop, using only his own hands, to lay the foundation for the future industry. The main task is to develop your production, leading it through various eras of technological progress through the design, construction and expansion of systems. This entire process takes place in a procedurally generated, borderless environment that provides a unique landscape for each endeavor and allows for large-scale construction projects to be implemented.

item.title: Saloon Simulator
item.description: Game Description Saloon Simulator puts the player in the shoes of a man who lost everything in poker to a certain Mr. Locke. The consequence of this defeat is the need to restore and take control of the abandoned establishment. It is necessary to learn how to prepare drinks and dishes to serve the flow of customers. Carrying out these duties within the walls of the saloon advances the plot by revealing the stories of the people who visit it.

item.title: Kaizen: A Factory Story
item.description: Game Description Kaizen: A Factory Story introduces David Sugimoto, a South Bend, Indiana native who moves to Japan in 1986 to pursue a career at Matsuzawa Manufacturing. He arrives with an eye on an executive position in international sales, an opportunity available during the country’s economic expansion. Those hopes are dashed when he is sent not to the corporate office, but to one of the company’s old factories on the outskirts of Tokyo.

item.title: Ground of Aces
item.description: Game Description Ground of Aces puts you in charge of a remote airbase during World War II. The main task of the player is to build and organize the operation of a functional military facility, having complete freedom in planning each building, from individual walls to large-scale hangars. This airfield serves as a home for aircraft and personnel. You are responsible for developing infrastructure to support the war effort, directly impacting the operational capabilities of the complex.

item.title: ISLANDERS: New Shores
item.description: Game Description ISLANDERS: New Shores is a game that revolves around building settlements on a series of randomly generated islands. This project develops the city-building framework, focusing on simplicity, but adding more mechanics and content. Players will have to choose between two formats: High Score, which rewards strategic efficiency, and Sandbox, which removes score limits for free creativity. The main activity is the correct placement of buildings to accumulate points, which opens up access to more advanced structures from the inventory.

item.title: Plastic Battlegrounds
item.description: Game Description Plastic Battlegrounds is a virtual reality combat simulator based on toy soldier warfare. Players construct the battlefield, deploying units, vehicles, and stationary fortifications from a growing list to create a unique tactical environment. The project offers a dual perspective, allowing the user to either directly participate in the battle as a soldier, or observe a miniature conflict in the form of a life-size figure. Tools for creating the perfect battle in Plastic Battlegrounds:

item.title: Bakery Cafe Simulator
item.description: Game Description Bakery Cafe Simulator provides a first-person view of creating and managing a cafe business from its initial state. The key gameplay is focused on the manual preparation of baked goods, interior design of the establishment and direct service to the flow of visitors. The gamer has the right to conduct business alone or team up with three others to play together online. The main task is to gradually expand the bakery, turning a modest beginning into a significant enterprise through systematic action and attention to detail.

item.title: Dealer Simulator
item.description: Game Description Dealer Simulator is a title where gamers find themselves in the role of a warehouse manager, where to achieve success they need to navigate the intricacies of logistics, sales and negotiations. The title starts with a simple premise: start small, sell products, and reinvest the profits to expand your operation. This is a world where business acumen and quick thinking are key: every decision, from what to sell to how to negotiate, matters.

item.title: My Tiny Room
item.description: Game Description My Tiny Room immerses you in the meditative process of creating cozy, confined spaces where there are no timers or bad decisions. The only goal is to achieve harmony and comfort in a miniature home, turning it into an island of calm. The entire gameplay is based on the thoughtful placement of interior items, which appear in the inventory three at a time. The main rule is to avoid clutter, not allowing objects to intersect with each other.

item.title: CRUFT
item.description: Game Description CRUFT is a pixel simulator, the main concept of which is based on the process of creation and the accompanying accumulation of waste. Any activity to create objects inevitably leads to the appearance of waste that requires disposal or proper storage. The gamer is faced with a choice: maintain perfect cleanliness in his area or completely plunge into chaos, turning the territory into a real landfill. The economic component allows you to interact with merchants through a mobile phone to buy and sell various things, as well as go to the city to sell what you have accumulated.

item.title: Road Food Simulator
item.description: Game Description Road Food Simulator puts the player directly in charge of running a roadside pizzeria - a task that can be completed independently or with partners in online co-op mode. Activities are focused on preparing pizza and processing customer orders within tight deadlines; The retention of visitors and the volume of new contracts depend on this. The funds earned go directly to the development and improvement of the establishment, including its equipment.

item.title: After Inc: Revival
item.description: Game Description After Inc: Revival puts players in charge of humanity’s survivors decades after the Necroa virus event. People find themselves in a world that has been taken over by nature, and must establish a settlement to begin the revival. The main process consists of building housing, farms and sawmills, as well as extracting resources from the ruins of the past world. The main task is to lead this nascent community through a period of recovery in post-apocalyptic Britain.

item.title: Crime Simulator
item.description: Game Description Crime Simulator allows you to quit your nine-to-five job and dive into a virtual life of crime. In this open-world sandbox, you’ll dive headfirst into the dirty underbelly of illegal activities. From petty thefts to sophisticated heists, Crime Simulator offers a buffet of criminal adventures. Start your journey from the very bottom of the food chain, completing small assignments to climb the criminal ladder. As your reputation grows, new opportunities open up.

item.title: Desktop Fishing
item.description: Game Description Desktop Fishing is an idle game designed to run in a small window on the screen and run in parallel with other tasks on the computer. In it, the frog character fishes on his own, finds new clothes for himself and discovers a series of different fishing spots. The main conflict is the spread of algae, which threatens the fish population in the project world. Consequently, the main goal for the player becomes to rescue as many fish as possible from these increasingly polluted waters.

item.title: Fish to Dish: Idle Sushi
item.description: Game Description Fish to Dish: Idle Sushi is an idle fishing game designed to run on the player’s desktop, taking up part of the screen. The boat floats on digital waves, a line is cast, and a variety of marine life is caught from various bays and islands. The gameplay combines collecting creatures with managing a food establishment. The mechanism deploys as the vessel crosses the water, automatically pulling out the prey at a preset speed.

item.title: Rooftops & Alleys: The Parkour Game
item.description: Game Description Rooftops & Alleys: The Parkour Game is not your average button-mashing parkour game. Forget about quick events and scripted sequences. Instead, the responsibility is placed on you, the gamer, to master the complex art of movement. Imagine navigating a sprawling cityscape, turning rooftops and alleys into your own personal parkour playground. Every jump, leap and wall climb requires precision and split-second decision making. Beauty lies in variety. This project offers you a variety of conditions, each of which poses unique challenges.

item.title: Train Valley Origins
item.description: Game Description Train Valley Origins challenges players to manage train systems in numerous scenarios. The project requires switching switches and diverting trains along different tracks to ensure continuity of traffic flow. Gamers will have to control the delivery of goods through different historical eras, observing the development from steam engines to modern rail technology. The result depends on the well-coordinated operation of the network, the delivery of goods on time to the required stations and the avoidance of collisions between locomotives.

item.title: Bank Simulator
item.description: Game Description Bank Simulator is a simulator dedicated to creating from scratch and then managing a banking organization. The player takes on the primary role in managing all operational aspects, starting with the initial construction of the facility. Key responsibilities include selecting and supervising personnel to perform required functions. This management extends to maintaining customer accounts and making strategic decisions that influence the bank’s development trajectory. The goal is to guide the company through the various stages of its growth.

item.title: Pro Cycling Manager 25
item.description: Game Description Pro Cycling Manager 25 puts players in the role of team managers guiding the riders. The range of tasks includes selecting partners, recruiting cyclists and leading races on the tracks. The performance of these functions during the competitive season affects the final performance of the team. This project provides a framework for leading a professional cycling club with sporting goals. In Pro Cycling Manager 25, attracting funding involves taking into account the criteria put forward by the funding parties.

item.title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
item.description: Game Description Zombie Graveyard Simulator features a dual operation cycle: during the day, players handle burials and cremations, tend to graves, satisfy visitor requests, and tend to crops. As night falls, attention turns entirely to defense against the attacks of the walking dead, which requires the erection of barriers to preserve the results of the day’s work and one’s own salvation. This change of activity forms the core of the process.

item.title: Paradise Beach Simulator
item.description: Game Description Paradise Beach Simulator is a first-person management simulator centered on an abandoned island. The player’s goal is to clear the area of ​​garbage and dilapidated buildings to create a functioning business. Initial activities include ordering equipment via the express boat and preparing the beach area for the first visitors. Guests arrive by ferry and their satisfaction levels increase as their requests are fulfilled, and all equipment requires regular maintenance to remain operational.

item.title: Guilty as Sock!
item.description: Game Description Guilty as Sock! is a game that immerses gamers in a digital courtroom, where cloth characters embody lawyers, prosecutors and judges. The figures present objects as evidence, construct intricate arguments, and reach verdicts in this online setting. Key interactions require improvisation along with strategic maneuvering as the entire process aims to influence proceedings and achieve results through active exchanges. In Guilty as Sock! the prosecutor initiates the case by making claims against the opponent.

item.title: Kabuto Park
item.description: Game Description Kabuto Park immerses players in the summer atmosphere of collecting collectibles and competitions. The heroine, Hana, spends her holidays aiming for the Bug Fighting Championship. This task requires locating various insects, increasing their individual powers, and forming teams for structured meetings. This project allows us to observe a diverse population of these creatures in a specific natural environment. Kabuto Park includes a collection system for over 40 different species of fauna such as beetles, butterflies, bees and dragonflies.

item.title: Small Spaces
item.description: Game Description Small Spaces is a simulator focused on the construction and arrangement of compact residential buildings. This project encourages creative expression by allowing players to transform a minimalist Tokyo apartment into a multi-level New York loft with industrial elements. The main limitation of this system is the physical limitation of each area, which determines the boundaries of design and equipment. Within these parameters, each planning challenge encourages the search for inventive solutions that maximize the functionality and appearance of the selected location.

item.title: Alien Market Simulator
item.description: Game Description Alien Market Simulator begins with the player tasked with running a market on a space station in a remote location, as a direct result of a connection with the Intergalactic Police. Restoring freedom depends on the success of the enterprise, requiring daily reports to authorities through the complex’s system. The main task is to develop the facility, which requires modernization, into a point with a large volume of trading operations for alien buyers.

item.title: Auto Rogue
item.description: Game Description Auto Rogue immerses the gamer in a process where all decisions are made before the fight begins. The outcome is determined by how skills, relics, and activation conditions are configured in advance. No manual control is required - after preparation, the battle scene unfolds completely automatically. Characters act in accordance with a predetermined logic, built on clear connections of conditions and effects. Each playthrough of Auto Rogue is different due to new combinations of skills, non-standard enemies and randomly dropped items.

item.title: JDM: Japanese Drift Master
item.description: Game Description JDM: Japanese Drift Master is a colorful car simulator that will take you into the exciting world of drifting on the streets of Japan. A huge open world with varied landscapes, from serene lakes to bustling city areas, offers endless opportunities for exploration, racing and, of course, the art of drifting itself. What sets the game apart is the freedom it gives players to customize their cars, allowing them to truly make it their own.

item.title: Pieces of me
item.description: Game Description Pieces of me begins with Grisha’s return to his hometown in 2009. He is going to visit his younger sister, but does not find her or any signs of his usual life on the spot. The streets look familiar, but there is no movement in them. There is silence all around and rare traces, as if someone left them on purpose, trying to convey something. The school building, in which the most difficult and memorable years passed, is greeted with the absence of sounds and a strange feeling, as if something was left unfinished here.

item.title: Tales of Seikyu
item.description: Game Description Tales of Seikyu places players on an island retreat far from human lands and filled with magic. Yokai live here and can take on human form. In their homeland, gamers develop the land, contribute to the development of the city, and discover information about the island, as well as a long-lost family. The character uses transformation abilities to help manage the farm and explore the world around him.

item.title: Hotel Architect
item.description: Game Description Hotel Architect is an exciting management simulation game where you take control of various hotels and serve a diverse clientele around the world. Building and designing the hotel of your dreams from scratch is the essence of the project. It is possible to choose which events will take place in different areas of your hotel. Decorate everything with amenities, decor and decorate the interior with wallpaper and flooring. Make it unique and attractive to your guests.

item.title: Better Mart
item.description: Game Description Better Mart will put the gamer in charge of managing a supermarket from a first-person perspective. This project requires organizing product layout, controlling inventory, and analyzing customer behavior. Success depends on proper product placement and pricing, as well as ensuring free flow of visitors through departments. Each decision affects the operation of the store and the flow of customers. At Better Mart, customization covers not only the design of the sales area, but also the selection of personnel.

item.title: Grandfather's Bakery
item.description: Game Description Grandfather’s Bakery is a management simulator in which a difficult mission falls on the shoulders of the protagonist. Having inherited an old stone bakery in a small town from his grandfather, he is faced with the need to restore the establishment to its former glory. This task is complicated by accumulated debts that require immediate repayment. Reviving the family business will require strategic thinking and hard work, as every decision will determine whether the bakery will once again become the pride of the local community.

item.title: MALL MANAGER SIMULATOR
item.description: Game Description MALL MANAGER SIMULATOR gives gamers the opportunity to manage the creation and development of a shopping complex. This project offers tools for the construction and expansion of commercial properties. Every operational decision made impacts revenue generation, site footfall and customer satisfaction. Inside the MALL MANAGER SIMULATOR, players manage individual retail premises, oversee advertising campaigns, improve the presentation of the property and maintain cleanliness to stand out from competitors. This supervision involves determining the cost of goods, observing how customers respond to those prices, and making necessary adjustments.

item.title: Of Life and Land
item.description: Game Description Of Life and Land provides users with the opportunity to try themselves in the colonization of lands, creating small settlements. Gamers will be engaged in expanding their own regions and trading with neighboring factions. A full-fledged simulation is taking place in the world, where it is necessary to erect buildings and provide the villagers with work, gradually putting the town in order. It is necessary to extract valuable resources in order to erect the desired buildings and improve the quality of life for the subordinate people.

item.title: Maltese's Fluffy Onsen
item.description: Game Description Maltese’s Fluffy Onsen is a simulation where players manage a fauna establishment. This gameplay takes place at the bottom of the screen, allowing you to do other things at the same time. The main task is to provide a service to these animal visitors, facilitating their transition to a state of rest. Gamers are installing customizable temperature baths and dedicated relaxation areas for a diverse clientele. Inside the Animal Spa game, you have to organize a bathing area to satisfy the needs of animal guests.

item.title: Deck of Haunts
item.description: Game Description Deck of Haunts puts the player in control of a sentient structure that functions as a haunted abode. The main challenge is to attract curious people to its pre-planned premises. Once these individuals are inside, the player influences the environment and initiates certain incidents in order to systematically undermine the peace of mind of the visitors. This allows the essence of the house to absorb the energy they release to increase their size and spread influence in the surrounding area.

item.title: The Monster Breeder
item.description: Game Description The Monster Breeder puts under player control an establishment that specializes in breeding combat creatures. This strategic simulation involves overseeing the production of hybrids for gladiator matches. Income and fame are achieved by training creatures that can operate effectively in the arena. The game instructs the gamer to lead a creature breeding house under the auspices of the Empire. This position opens up access to tools for shaping the properties of creatures before sending them into battle.

item.title: Codename: Ocean Keeper
item.description: Game Description Codename: Ocean Keeper - this survival role-playing adventure game plunges users into the mysterious depths of an underwater planet, where space pirates explore the secrets hidden under the waves. The mechanics take inspiration from games like Dome Keeper and Vampire Survivors, while the atmospheric elements echo StarCraft, Stormgate and Project Entropy. In Codename: Ocean Keeper, gamers control a crab-like robot tasked with exploration, mining, and combat. The game takes place in three separate cycles.

item.title: G-MODE ARMORED CORE MOBILE MISSION
item.description: Game Description G-MODE ARMORED CORE MOBILE MISSION is a top-down tactical action game that immerses you in the world of combat robot battles. The basis of the gameplay is a cycle of completing tasks, for which the pilot receives a reward in the form of currency and new components. These resources are directed towards the deep modernization of our own fur, allowing us to constantly strengthen it to withstand growing threats.

item.title: gogh: Focus with Your Avatar
item.description: Game Description Gogh: Focus with Your Avatar combines focus tools and simulation gameplay mechanics, allowing you to create a character and design a location. Gamers interact with a virtual hero and a companion creature in a variable room. This project includes time management tools in addition to customization capabilities. The main task is to help with work sessions through a combination of these elements of the simulation game. In gogh: Focus with Your Avatar, a person arranges his own room by arranging furniture, choosing decor and choosing a palette.

item.title: Approaching Infinity
item.description: Game Description Approaching Infinity offers a fast-paced, never-ending adventure through space. The title is built on the basis of a huge procedurally generated universe, which gives users the freedom to create their own path. Gamers can do a variety of things: conduct tactical battles, mine asteroids, trade goods, create items and explore mysterious alien worlds. At its core, Approaching Infinity allows for endless development, each time offering a new challenge.

item.title: Subway Sim 2
item.description: Game Description SubwaySim 2 is a public transport simulator focusing on the German subway systems. Gamers drive trains on 3 specific routes: U1 and U3 in Berlin, and the U3 line in Hamburg. The project immerses users directly into the urban environment of these two German cities. First- and third-person views are available to control squads and observe the environment in this single-player title; gaming perspectives are varied. The simulation supports controller control and allows modifications.

item.title: Kingdom's Deck
item.description: Game Description Kingdom’s Deck presents a card-based experience that combines city building with nightly repelling attacks. Gamers will become rulers of the lands, faced with the task of expanding their personal possessions and at the same time ensuring the safety of the inhabitants from enemy attacks. Gameplay focuses on deck building and the strategic placement of these assets to control and develop a power. The main actions alternate between the construction of structures during daylight hours and the organization of the defense of fortifications at nightfall.

item.title: Hydroponics Farm and Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Hydroponics Farm and Store Simulator invites gamers into the world of soilless farming, where they can design and manage their own hydroponics system. This adventure game offers an interactive platform for experimenting with various plants and fish. Gamers customize their settings, balancing the delicate relationships between aquatic life and vegetation to ensure both thrive. The mechanics of growing and caring for plants are thought out to the smallest detail, which gives users the opportunity to learn about nutrition and even crossing.

item.title: Amerzone - The Explorer's Legacy
item.description: Game Description Amerzone - The Explorer’s Legacy takes you on a journey to the Great White Birds, who live in a secluded land full of many secrets. The player takes on the role of a young journalist fulfilling the last wishes of a deceased researcher and embarking on a mission across the globe. The destination is the forgotten Latin American country of Amerzon, a place where outsiders rarely set foot.

item.title: Dinkum
item.description: Game Description Dinkum is a life and farming simulator made on the Unity engine. It has a change of seasons and temperatures. The player ends up on the island of Choc-A-Bloc. In the story, the character he created gets tired of his old city and moves to live in the Australian wild. At first, only the camp is available to the protagonist. Gradually he turns it into a small village. And then, with his participation, the settlement grows into a small town.

item.title: Oppidum
item.description: Game Description Oppidum takes the player to the island of Insul, where they will have to master the mechanics of survival alone or in a team of up to four people. The characters find themselves in a land of widespread decline due to a deep-rooted corruption that has fractured the local society. Key gameplay elements include setting up a central camp, systematically gathering supplies scattered throughout Insul, and navigating its varied zones.

item.title: Havendock
item.description: Game Description Havendock offers an exciting adventure of survival and resource management. In this cozy colony simulator, you’ll find yourself in the middle of the ocean, where you’ll have to build a thriving city to stay afloat. But don’t worry, you won’t be alone in this challenge. You will bring your comrades aboard the ship and manage their needs while trying to satisfy your own. Create your character and live your best life on the ocean.

item.title: Neongarten
item.description: Game Description Neongarten features a single-player experience that combines strategy, simulation and city building within a roglite mechanics. Gamers engage in turn-based action, placing elements in a cyberpunk environment to expand their influence. The main activity involves constructing buildings and managing the placement of units on the generated terrain. This process requires forethought, since each placement affects the overall development of the gamer’s digital area. Obtaining resources directly depends on these building decisions.

item.title: Outworld Station
item.description: Game Description Outworld Station invites players to take on the role of a station commander tasked with developing resources in the alien TAU star system. The central task is to build a large-scale space industrial complex covering entire planets. Materials must be collected and production lines established to build starships and expand station operations in this unexplored region of space. Successful advancement depends on the development of increasingly sophisticated production capabilities to control the environment.

item.title: Sunset Motel
item.description: Game Description Sunset Motel invites you to take on the challenge of running a small but busy hotel business. This is not just a game about cleaning rooms, it is about creating an atmosphere where guests can feel at home. In this world, you are responsible for transforming outdated spaces into a welcoming space. Each renovation choice is a step toward creating a unique motel that your guests will return to again and again.

item.title: Wizdom Academy
item.description: Game Description Wizdom Academy puts the player in the shoes of the director, responsible for the construction and operation of a school for wizards. The process begins with the construction of the institution’s buildings, creating the foundation for learning. The key task is to attract people as students, as well as recruit staff to become teachers in the academy, shaping the composition of the school from the very beginning. The initial stage of construction prepares the ground for subsequent expansion and choice of specialization.

item.title: Medieval Blacksmith
item.description: Game Description Medieval Blacksmith is a title where gamers are thrown into the heart of a medieval fantasy world, where they take on the role of a blacksmith. In a kingdom where the feudal system, magic and steel reign, the title revolves around the creation of weapons, each of which plays a role in shaping not only the user’s future, but also the lives of the characters with whom he interacts.

item.title: Football Life Simulator
item.description: Game Description Football Life Simulator offers a simulation where gamers are immersed in the existence of a professional football athlete. The experience covers both activities related directly to the sport and aspects of personal life off the field. Characters participate in training, compete in matches, and advance through their careers while managing social interactions and finances. This structure requires a balance between athletic development and personal matters, including communication and money decisions.

item.title: Used Cars Simulator
item.description: Game Description In Used Cars Simulator you will plunge headlong into the world of buying, selling and everything in between. You’ll search for cars, from shiny, barely used to salvaged, salvaged ones, trying to estimate their value before they land on your lot. Every decision you make matters - will you sell this car to make a quick buck, or restore it to its former glory to make a bigger profit?

item.title: Junkyard Builder
item.description: Game Description Junkyard Builder puts gamers in charge of an abandoned junkyard full of potential. The key is to transform unwanted items into valuable resources with your own hands. You will have to travel to different locations and inspect the area in search of materials suitable for restoration and sometimes unique finds. The process revolves around the restoration, systematic waste disposal and day-to-day management required to operate a waste sorting facility to eventually build a large scrap metal business.

item.title: Lyca
