You play as a hero who knows how to fight with melee and long-range weapons, as well as magical abilities. There are three classes to choose from: Warrior, Ranger and Wizard. The gameplay is adapted for virtual reality helmets Valve Index, HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Windows Mixed Reality. The gameplay is based on body physics and fair hitboxes.

item.title: Go-Go Town!
item.description: Game Description In Go-Go Town! you’ll find yourself in the hot seat—literally, if the sun beating down on your precocious metropolis is anything to go by. You are the mayor, given the reins (and budget, we hope) of a city that is going through hard times. Your task is to breathe new life into it, turning it from the city center into a tourist destination. Think Sim City meets Animal Crossing, with a whimsical twist thrown in for good measure.

item.title: Ad Fundum
item.description: Game Description Ad Fundum takes you deep into the world of dieselpunk, where exploration, resource gathering and survival are the key to success. In the title, you control a massive mech tasked with digging through layers of rock to discover valuable minerals and hidden secrets. However, the journey will not be easy. Each step requires close attention to the condition of the ‘Mech, as overheating, lack of fuel or even falling debris can lead to an abrupt end to the expedition.

item.title: Grocery Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Grocery Store Simulator puts you in the shoes of a grocery store manager. Give up fashionable suits and briefcases, smart shoes - this is the new move of power. This first-person simulator from FEKK Games lets you run your own store. You control everything from stocking the shelves to setting prices. Do you want to play alone or team up with friends in four-player co-op? Grocery Store Simulator will satisfy both the lone wolf and those who like to work together.

item.title: Bodycam
item.description: Game Description Bodycam throws you headlong into a hyper-realistic multiplayer battlefield. Powered by Unreal Engine 5, this all-new shooter promises a next-gen experience that will redefine your expectations. Teamwork is key here. Every bullet counts, and the victory or defeat of your squad depends on your every decision. Forget playing Rambo. Bodycam requires strategic thinking and coordinated attacks. Team up with your teammates, map out a plan of action, and use your arsenal to outmaneuver your opponents.

item.title: Empires of the Undergrowth
item.description: Game Description Empires of the Undergrowth is a simulation and real-time strategy game with unique mechanics. In the game you will have to manage a colony of ants. Starting to play as one ant, you will hunt, manage builders, and create a unique hive. The design of your hive will determine whether your colony can survive in this harsh world. Why harsh? Throughout the game you will face various obstacles. First of all, these are your enemies!

item.title: Bloody Knuckles Street Boxing
item.description: Game Description Bloody Knuckles Street Boxing challenges those looking for shallow arcade-style fights, focusing solely on skill. The project deliberately creates a deep gap in the level of training of fighters, abandoning any auxiliary systems. There is no room for easy victories here, because every aspect of the battle is under complete control. Thanks to pressure-sensitive controls, the fighter becomes an accurate reflection of the gamer’s actions, requiring tactical understanding and lightning-fast reactions.

item.title: Chains of Judgment
item.description: Game Description Chains of Judgment is a dark detective story set against the backdrop of a series of brutal crimes. The city is rocked by the so-called Chain Murders, where each victim is found shackled with a mysterious symbol carved into their skin. The investigation becomes more complicated for homicide veteran Ralph when, at the epicenter of these events, his best friend and partner Nathan, with whom he worked for 5 years, disappears without a trace.

item.title: Taora: Survival
item.description: Game Description Taora: Survival throws you headlong into a huge open world. Forget about sightseeing, this is pure survival. You’ll navigate a treacherous landscape, dodging threats around every corner. Building a defensible base and managing resources are your top priorities, a harsh reality check, right? But the problems go beyond the elements. This world is teeming with nasty enemies, so you’ll need sharp tactics to both fight and strengthen your defenses.

item.title: WARNO
item.description: Game Description Tactical battles inWARNO take place in real time, where users will be able to take control of modern combat vehicles and go to the front, plunging into the Third World War. The game is made in the genre of strategy and army command simulator, where you need to think through the movement of units and observe the events taking place. The storyline is about a coup that occurs after Gorbachev leaves, creating a tense conflict between states in 1989.

item.title: Archean
item.description: Game Description Archean immerses gamers in a sandbox atmosphere created during the Archean eon, approximately 3 billion years ago. It is a unique environment in which the user is free to explore and create without the constraints of a predetermined storyline. The title revolves around the concept of engineering and construction, allowing users to create a wide range of structures, vehicles and even entire space stations. These creations are made possible by the use of modular blocks that provide flexibility and variety in design.

item.title: Aeruta
item.description: Game Description Aeruta begins after an explosion caused by the main character, Chaya, which leads to her commitment to rebuild the bakery. Set in a deserted town, she works with shop owner Effie in a world where baking is all but forgotten. The smell from the oven helps rediscover this delicacy, starting the process of revitalizing the settlement. To achieve this goal, the player sets out to explore the world, fight monsters and obtain ingredients, using them to transform the city.

item.title: Homeworld 3
item.description: Game Description Homeworld 3 is a new part of the famous space battle franchise, which is a sequel and continues the storyline. Nevertheless, the game is also suitable for those who are not familiar with the universe, if you only dive into the mode of multiplayer confrontations on ships. Now abandoned galactic stations are scattered across the universe, which have turned into arenas where you can feel the battle with a random user.

item.title: Little Kitty, Big City
item.description: Game Description Little Kitty, Big City will help you learn about all the difficulties that street cats face. Despite the fact that animals seem to people to be foolish and unable to live without humans, they have their own hierarchy, connections, and they support communication between species. Often, even dogs and cats team up for common survival or give advice to new recruits. The main character is a teenage black kitten who got lost in a big city and now has to urgently find his way home.

item.title: Manor Lords
item.description: Game Description Manor Lords is a strategy game set in the Middle Ages. The game mechanics center on the realistic process of constructing buildings and intense fights with the enemy army. The building element is based on historical data about cities and villages. All buildings presented in Manor Lords are as authentic as possible. Landscapes and types of terrain influence the process of settlement formation. Create trade routes, establish market relations with neighboring cities and promote the economic prosperity of the settlement.

item.title: Rusty's Retirement
item.description: Game Description Rusty’s Retirement allows players to experience farming on the go. Designed as a project for idlers, it allows you to manage a virtual farm while doing other things. Gamers take on the role of Rusty, a retired robot who tends to his crops. The game develops automatically: Rusty plants, waters and harvests crops without constant player interaction. As you progress, you can discover new cultures, adding variety to your virtual fields.

item.title: Minicology
item.description: Game Description Minicology drops you into a universe of tiny planets after a crash landing. This interstellar survival sandbox features crafting, combat, and automation. Travel through a procedurally generated universe, visiting a variety of planetary clusters with unique biomes. Build a base, defend against invaders, and even change the planets themselves using terraforming. Minicology encourages creative problem solving, from growing crops to fighting enemies. Gather resources, automate processes, and protect your water source.

item.title: Bellwright
item.description: Game Description Bellwright throws you into a world of rebellion and intrigue. Finding yourself in prison for a heinous crime, you must not only clear your name, but also organize a revolution against a tyrannical ruler. Build and manage settlements, collect resources and recruit villagers into your ranks. Each new adept brings valuable skills, strengthening your rebellion and unlocking new technologies for your cities. Combat is based on skill and focus.

item.title: OUTMINER
item.description: Game Description OUTMINER is a survival story where, after a spaceship crashes on a hostile and uncharted planet, all responsibility for the fate of the crew falls on the shoulders of the captain. In a harsh and ruthless environment, the protagonist will have to lead his team, fighting for each new day. The fate of all crew members rests entirely with his decisions and ability to adapt to the deadly threats of this lost world.

item.title: Lifecraft
item.description: Game Description Lifecraft is a management and construction simulator. The video game can also be classified as a sandbox and strategy game. It has elements of survival. The indie project has two-dimensional pixel graphics. The camera is located at the top and at an angle. This title differs from other similar games in its concept. Instead of managing a factory, you need to control the life support of the cell. The player is asked to organize the work of all its vital functions.

item.title: Infection Free Zone
item.description: Game Description Infection Free Zone is a strategic survival game where the player will be responsible for the last remnants of humanity and try to return them to power, at least over the city. All resources are very limited and population expansion is both good and catastrophic, since the consumption of all food increases significantly, which means it is necessary to expand territories and increase production. All the rooms around can be used for your own purposes, restored for comfort, or inventing new uses for them.

item.title: Spirit City: Lofi Sessions
item.description: Game Description Spirit City: Lofi Sessions is not an ordinary adventure game. It combines game elements and practical tools to improve focus and reduce stress. You will find yourself in a virtual world filled with a variety of activities, the essence of which comes down to collecting and interacting with spirits. These aren’t just pretty additions to your virtual homes - they play an important role in achieving the goal of making you more productive.

item.title: The Lost Village
item.description: Game Description InThe Lost Village you have to restore a once great sect. You take on the role of the heir to a leader who has returned to an abandoned mountain and is tasked with restoring it to its former glory. The game combines a management simulator with roguelike elements. Gamers will guide students by collecting resources, building structures and cultivating the land. Students have unique personalities and talents, allowing assignments to be specialized.

item.title: Buckshot Roulette
item.description: Game Description Two enter, one leaves. That’s the motto ofBuckshot Roulette, a horror game that takes the classic game of Russian Roulette and turns it into a high-stakes shotgun game. Immerse yourself in the dark atmosphere of an underground nightclub, where metal railings beat to the beat of forgotten drum kits and the stakes couldn’t be higher. This is not Russian roulette. This is where you swap the revolver for a 12 gauge shotgun, because shotguns are just better, right?

item.title: SILENT BREATH
item.description: Game Description SILENT BREATH is a new survival game that takes gamers into a mysterious forest. Here, the unknown lurks around every corner, making exploration a tense and uncertain experience. Users take on the role of search engines tasked with finding missing people in this mysterious forest. The journey will not be a cakewalk; it requires strategic thinking and nerves of steel to overcome the challenges that lurk among the trees.

item.title: Aquarist
item.description: Game Description Aquarist is an immersive simulator that allows you to enter the world of aquariums. Build your aquarium empire by stocking up on shelving, quality glass, rare fish species and much more. Constantly update and improve your store, attracting visitors. Watch the development of the fish, cross species, feed them and make sure they don’t get sick. Aquarist allows you to build your own personal aquarium paradise! If the fish dies, pick up a net and remove the dead body so as not to infect other cold-blooded fish in the aquarium.

item.title: Knowledge, or know Lady
item.description: Game Description Knowledge, or know Lady throws you into the heart of a unique dating simulator. As the only guy at an all-girl university, you’ll find yourself caught up in a whirlwind of romance and college life. Will you succumb to the charms of the beauties around you or forge your own path to become a campus legend? Ladies School Prince unfolds through your eyes, offering a first-person perspective. Your

item.title: Under The Yoke
item.description: Game Description Under The Yoke tasks the player with taking the Serf family through 250 years of Norman England history, starting in 1085. Characters are endowed with traits of Mind, Body and Spirit that determine their talents and social compatibility. Control covers all aspects of life, from cultivating an acre of land to providing food, rest and communication. Rod begins with minimal supplies and a modest hut, making survival the primary and constant goal.

item.title: AutoForge
item.description: Game Description In AutoForge, you will find yourself in the shoes of Otto, a magical golem awakened in a desert world. Your former masters have left, leaving you with a big question mark and a vast, unexplored land. But don’t be afraid, Otto! This is not just a sandbox adventure. AutoForge will allow you to unleash your inner factory master. Build a humming network of mana-eating machines, automate your production process, and mine resources at breakneck speed.

item.title: Rise of Gun
item.description: Game Description Rise of Gun invites gamers to immerse themselves in a post-apocalyptic world where survival depends not only on finding food or fighting zombies, but also on the ability to create weapons from garbage. After a global epidemic turns most of humanity into mindless undead, the protagonist, having lost everything, sets off on a journey to find other survivors. Along the way, he stumbles upon a settlement in which there is hope for the restoration of civilization.

item.title: Lightyear Frontier
item.description: Game Description Lightyear Frontier offers farming in a completely open world. In the farmer simulator, you are asked to explore the planet, create your own home, upgrade your transport, growing various non-standard types of plants in order to provide yourself with resources. Multiplayer is implemented here with a capacity of up to 4 gamers. The game has a well-developed storyline, where you will learn about the mysterious past of the world by studying the ruins of buildings created by unknown creatures.

item.title: Dune: Imperium
item.description: Game Description Combining deckbuilding and worker management, Dune: Imperium takes you into the intricacies of Frank Herbert’s famous universe. In this tabletop strategy game, players take on the role of leaders of various factions vying for power over the desert planet Arrakis. The latter is the only repository of the coveted spice melange, a substance that gives psychic abilities and longevity, plays a key role in interstellar travel and the stability of the galactic empire.

item.title: Between the Stars
item.description: Game Description In Between the Stars, a space simulator, the gamer discovers new territories, fights with numerous opponents and upgrades his own ship. The hero’s goal is to save the Interstellar Republic. The game has procedural generation of the environment, enemies and stations. The protagonist’s universe is suffering from attacks from the Children of the Sun clan. Enemy representatives have appeared from other worlds and are trying to capture these spaces.

item.title: KeepUp Survival
item.description: Game Description KeepUp Survival is a realistic survival simulator set on a long-abandoned island. The main characters, brother and sister, traveled with the crew on a large ship transporting containers. As a result of a storm, the ship is in distress and the protagonists are thrown ashore, after which they lose consciousness. Then one of them disappears, and the second must be found. But the task is not so simple, because the island is teeming with dangers.

item.title: KeeperRL
item.description: Game Description KeeperRL is a simulator with roguelike elements in which you have to build an underground base and develop a society. You play as a powerful wizard learning black magic. Train minions in military affairs, forcing them to attack civilians in settlements, taking their belongings and burning houses to the ground. Build dungeons, set traps and build up your military power to attack the pitiful people. Be prepared for human heroes to decide to attack back.

item.title: Sons of the Forest
item.description: Game Description Sons of The Forest is a first-person multiplayer horror game with survival elements. The game is a sequel to the acclaimed hit The Forest. As in the previous part, you need to explore a mysterious forest inhabited by bloodthirsty monsters. Survive by hiding from enemies and carefully study the surrounding areas. Arm yourself with powerful weapons to face numerous opponents. The story centers on a special forces soldier with a Fight Demons tattoo.

item.title: Pacific Drive
item.description: Game Description Pacific Drive is an atmospheric car survival adventure in the Olympic Exclusion Zone. Here you will not find the usual racing tracks, but there will be supernatural dangers waiting for you that will make you very tense. The only chance of salvation is your car, which will have to be strengthened and improved throughout the game. You will have to look for resources in abandoned laboratories, set up a base in the garage, research new spare parts and construct new stations.

item.title: Rail Route
item.description: Game Description Rail Route is an economic simulator in which the user will encounter railway dispatching. Training will help you understand difficult mechanics and terms. The passage begins with a small railway system with limited terrain. The player will have to expand the paths, increase profits by creating new roads, shortening them and using different chips. To improve business, you can accept new train contracts, modernize trains and modify the railway network.

item.title: Supermarket Simulator
item.description: Game Description Supermarket Simulator puts you in the shoes of a retailer tasked with reviving abandoned grocery stores. Roll up your sleeves and get ready to breathe new life into forgotten stalls. First of all, assess the damage. Broken freezers? Leaky windows? Collapsing shelves? Throw away what’s irreparable and develop a repair strategy for the rest. Imagine a bright future filled with colorful products - this will become the basis of your renovation plan.

item.title: Balatro
item.description: Game Description Balatro - the word “poker” crackles with energy, whispering promises of high stakes and cunning deals. This poker roguelike beckons players into a deck-building odyssey where bluffing becomes the spell and chips become your lifeblood. Forget about limping into pots with low pairs. Here you create powerful synergies by weaving intricate combinations that unleash explosive power. Valid poker hands dance with unique wild cards, their abilities changing the course of the game like a magician.

item.title: Furnish Master
item.description: Game Description Furnish Master’s gameplay focuses on furnishing apartments, furnishing houses, and improving other commercial properties. The player is even able to take care of the local areas, installing on them the objects he wishes. The project allows you to realize any designer’s dreams thanks to hundreds of objects and things. The user will purchase real estate, which will gradually generate profit. Money is needed in order to expand your own business and buy furniture to place inside your home.

item.title: News Tower
item.description: Game Description News Tower transports gamers to the bustling streets of 1930s New York, where the world of newspaper publishing becomes the stage for a complex game of strategy and decision-making. The action takes place at a time when the country was experiencing major social and political changes, and users are asked to take on the role of a newspaper publisher. The challenge is to manage a successful operation while balancing the rapidly changing demands of the media industry and navigating the complexities of the era.

item.title: Dungeon Dreams 2
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Dreams 2 invites gamers into an expansive world full of adventure, choice and relationships. The action takes place in the magical city of Kalmarus, and you find yourself in the place of the young heir of the legendary hero. From the very beginning, you shape your character by choosing parents, determining appearance and choosing a class. Whether you decide to become a fighter, a hunter, a trickster, an apprentice mage, or a wild mage, your path will evolve as you complete various challenges and quests.

item.title: WitchHand
item.description: Game Description In WitchHand, you take on the role of a powerful witch leading her coven to gain a foothold in the pristine Ninth Kingdom. Use cards to build your empire, strategically manage resources to ensure growth, and choose your path - forge alliances, defeat rivals, or delve into the secrets of the Ninth Realm. Each witch boasts unique spells, buildings, and units to suit different playstyles. The Celestial Sorceress boosts village production, the Chaos Witch crushes enemies with brute force, and the Witch Chef prepares delicious dishes that boost your coven’s stats.

item.title: Chushpan simulator
item.description: Game Description The chushpan simulator puts you in the place of an ordinary guy in Uryupinsk. It’s not a life of luxury - you start out squalid in a shabby apartment and forced to hustle to make ends meet. But you are determined to climb the social ladder, one way or another. The game unfolds through a branching quest line that takes you through various locations. Every choice you make - moral or not - determines your destiny.

item.title: Stargate: Timekeepers
item.description: Game Description The events of the Stargate: Timekeepers project take place within a separate universe called SG-1. It all begins with the Battle of Antarctica, where Commander Eve McKine leads the battle against Anubis' fleet. After this, the user will be able to take control of a squad subordinate to this very Eve in order to penetrate behind enemy lines and complete a number of dangerous tasks. The outcome of the war depends on this, so no one has the right to make a mistake.

item.title: The Universim
item.description: Game Description A simulator of city construction, the development of an entire planet and a ward civilization -The Universim is a short sand strategy in which you have to try on the role of God. The game begins with the fact that you settle several people on one of the planets, give them food, indicate what needs to be done - set priorities. And then watch how people develop on their own, without your help.

item.title: All Quiet in the Trenches
item.description: Game Description In All Quiet in the Trenches, gamers find themselves in the complex environment of the First World War. The title revolves around managing a group of soldiers during a war, balancing the harsh realities of the battlefield with the personal needs of the men under your command. Users take on the role of a German non-commissioned officer, a non-commissioned officer, and control a unit in the trenches. Combining tactical decisions and human interaction, the title unfolds through a series of decisions that affect the fate of soldiers.

item.title: New Cycle
item.description: Game Description New Cycle is a dark city building sim and colony management simulator. This project is made in a post-apocalyptic setting. It takes place in the near future, where people are divided into tribes. In the story, after a powerful solar flare, the planet plunged into chaos. The player is offered to create a new civilization on the ruins of the old one and restore the unity of humanity. The user leads a group of survivors.

item.title: House Builder
item.description: Game Description House Builder begins with a monologue about how a person must do three things in life: plant a tree, conceive a son, and build a house. In the gameplay you cannot grow plants and have children, but the main character is able to build countless houses, mansions or other establishments. The player will play the role of a builder and will build houses: typical African huts or ultra-modern architectural wonders.

item.title: KinitoPET
item.description: Game Description KinitoPET promises a world of endless fun and communication with your virtual assistant Kinito. This early 2000s wonder can walk, talk, browse, adapt, and play games, making him a friend like no other. But beneath the surface of this seemingly perfect companion lies a disturbing truth. Step into “Eternal Fun!”, and Kinito will become your personal assistant, ready to fulfill your every request. Its cutting-edge technology promises a “truly unique experience” designed just for you.

item.title: Winter Memories
item.description: Game Description Winter Memories invites players to once again join Yui, Rio and Miyuki, the trio who created unforgettable summer moments just six months ago. As the seasons change and the snow melts, a new chapter opens in your story. Rediscover a serene coastal village and reconnect with loved ones during this cold season. The past gives rise to the present, but what new experiences await you this winter? Winter Memories is the sequel to the 2020 game Summer Memories, developed by Dojin Otome.

item.title: House Flipper 2
item.description: Game Description House Flipper 2 is a real gift for those who like to improve and create something new! Forget about boring and monotonous tasks - here you will find many new mechanics and features. Buy an abandoned building and give it a new life! Or maybe you prefer to build your ideal home from scratch? Everything is possible here, and they will show you how it’s done! Get back to your favorite tools - hammer, paint roller, squeegee, and let’s get to work!

item.title: SeaOrama: World of Shipping
item.description: Game Description SeaOrama: World of Shipping is a game that puts you in the captain’s chair of your own growing maritime empire. Forget romantic notions of rolling waves and salty sunsets; it’s a game of hard hats and spreadsheets where strategic instinct reigns supreme. Start with the only reliable tug - your gateway to a global network of 90 ports, each a microcosm of supply and demand. Analyze the ebb and flow of trade winds, not only marine, but also economic and political.

item.title: Against the Storm
item.description: Game Description Against the Storm combines two genres. This is a city planning simulator and part-time roguelike. In this game, the gamer becomes a scout and mayor of different cities. The player is transported to a fantasy world where the rain never stops. The settlements are inhabited by people and humanoid intelligent animals: beavers and lizards. In Against the Storm, the user, being the queen’s deputy and pioneer, builds and develops colonies in various biomes, and also satisfies the needs of the population.

item.title: Revive and Prosper
item.description: Game Description Revive and Prosper combines the challenge of building a factory with the tension of surviving in a post-apocalyptic world. Users find themselves at the head of a mission to restore civilization after a catastrophe that changed the world. With limited resources and a barren landscape, the game requires careful planning, strategy, and a fair amount of resilience. As gamers progress, they must build automated factories to manage major production lines, keeping their new world functioning in the face of natural disasters and ever-changing environmental conditions.

item.title: Soulash 2
item.description: Game Description Soulash 2 is an intriguing RPG in which you step into the shoes of an exiled god seeking revenge. The expansive procedurally generated world is a playground replete with simulated history, a dynamic economy, and a huge number of races, factions, and creatures just waiting to be interacted with. The power to conquer and rebuild this world lies in the hands of the player, who wields divine powers and abilities.

item.title: The Kindeman Remedy
item.description: Game Description A management game unlike any other, The Kindeman Remedy plunges you into the realm of sacrilege and madness. In this diabolical creation, you step into the shoes of Dr. Carl Kindeman, a man who has lost everything - his reputation tarnished by the medical community’s disdain for his unorthodox methods. To regain his honor, he takes a grim position in a nightmarish prison, where he hopes to restore his lost authority through unspeakable deeds.

item.title: Arma Reforger
item.description: Game Description Arma Reforger is an action game that places great emphasis on the realism of what is happening and allows you to fight on a huge territory of 51 square kilometers. The action takes place during the Cold War. Players can create their own unique scenarios in Game Master mode. The shooter allows you to return to Everon - a microstate with Cold War Assault. Essentially, Arma Reforger acts as a modifiable platform, inviting participants to create their own stories and combat scenarios.

item.title: Cuisineer
item.description: Game Description Cuisineer is a delightful mix of dungeon crawling, cooking, and restaurant management that takes you into the captivating story of Pom, an energetic adventurer who must save her family’s diner in Paella. Armed with her culinary skills, she travels beyond her hometown, engaging in culinary battles with monsters and collecting ingredients to prepare delicious dishes for her visitors. Offering a variety of culinary adventures with an extensive repertoire of over 100 recipes spanning the globe, from savory Popiah rolls to sweet Kaya jam and crispy chicken delicacies.

item.title: Stronghold: Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Stronghold: Definitive Edition brings medieval England to life in a strategic and addictive game. In this classic real-time strategy, gamers will have to restore a destroyed kingdom, unite disparate forces and fight the insidious villains - the Rat, the Pig, the Snake and the Wolf. The story takes place on a war-torn frontier where the king has been betrayed and the kingdom is on the brink of collapse. The user will have to go through a series of missions - from lifting sieges and capturing enemy castles to building grandiose fortresses and defending against continuous assaults.

item.title: Living Cell
item.description: Game Description Living Cell is a dark adventure game with survival elements that immerses you in the atmosphere of Samosbor - a dystopian world where residents live in endless apartment buildings called “Gigahrushchevkas”. In this exciting story, you will take the place of the liquidator, who is entrusted with the responsibility of maintaining order and security in the quarter. At the beginning of the story, players find themselves the only survivors in block G-326 after a mysterious incident.

item.title: DON'T SCREAM
item.description: Game Description DON’T SCREAM is a thrilling indie horror game that plunges you into the heart of an eerie forest with a nerve-wracking twist: silence is the key to survival. The basic concept is simple, but fiendishly difficult: survive in a creepy forest for 18 minutes without letting out a single scream. An integral component of the game is a functional microphone, and any flash, scream or loud noise will result in the character’s untimely demise, causing an unfortunate restart.

item.title: Buildement
item.description: Game Description Builderment is a fun factory-building game that puts you in a world on the verge of running out of resources. In this virtual world, your mission is clear: go to a distant planet, collect vital materials and build a modern factory capable of teleporting these resources to Earth, thereby saving our precious planet. Automation and craftsmanship are at the heart of the project. You start by extracting valuable resources and gradually move on to creating complex items.

item.title: Slay the Princess
item.description: Game Description Slay the Princess is a dark and daring adventure that will put your skills to the ultimate test, combining the genres of psychological horror and dating simulator. Your mission is simple: kill the princess and save the world from destruction. But don’t be fooled by her charms and promises. She will stop at nothing to stop you from completing your task. Make your way through the dense forest and find the hut at the end of the path.

item.title: Hexarchy
item.description: Game Description Hexarchy is a turn-based strategy game that combines elements of battle royale and TCG. You are given only an hour of real time to build a new civilization and lead it to greatness. The gameplay is based on classic 4X mechanics. Train your army to destroy your enemies. Engage in trade and build wonders of the world. Both single-player and multiplayer modes are available. In online battles, it can host up to 10 people at the same time.

item.title: Mosa Lina
item.description: Game Description Mosa Lina challenges the established rules of the immersive sim genre, where the tools often directly correspond to the obstacles. This title uses deliberate randomization, meaning there is no predetermined way to progress through the hand-crafted stages. Gamers move through these locations with the task of collecting fruit, which opens a portal to the exit, but the means of achieving the goal are not predetermined. The gameplay forces improvisation, relying on unpredictable elements and physical interactions.

item.title: Sumerians
item.description: Game Description The gameplay of Sumerians is based on the story of 3000 BC in Mesopotamia, a time of rapid settlement growth and the development of Sumerian cities. The player will play the role of a ruler and will build his own city, manage resources, plan future infrastructure and try to cope with the economy. In the process you only have to improve the city, build and manage the economy, there are no wars or attacks, but there will be numerous obstacles created by the population or nature.

item.title: Quasimorph
item.description: Game Description Quasimorph, an immersive, dark turn-based RPG with loot elements, puts you in the shoes of a seasoned PMC fighter embarking on an arduous journey. In this project, your main goal is to unravel the sinister mystery that threatens all life, and you will do this by accumulating the corpses of your clones. Set in a future where space has been privatized and corporations seek control of the solar system and beyond, the game delves into a world of corporate warfare and dark secrets.

item.title: EA SPORTS FC 24
item.description: Game Description EA SPORTS FC 24 is designed to revolutionize virtual football. With an impressive roster of over 19,000 licensed athletes, over 30 leagues, and recreations of over 100 iconic stadiums, it’s a fan’s dream. At the heart of FIFA 24 is HyperMotion V, a revolutionary technology that uses volumetric data collected from cameras strategically placed around stadiums during more than 180 top-tier matches. Thanks to this technology, an unreal level of realism is achieved.

item.title: Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos
item.description: Game Description Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos invites you to embark on an exciting journey through the enchanting world of Anthos. From the very beginning, you’ll be introduced to the quirky inventor Doc Jr. and a host of other characters who will become your companions on this adventure. What is your task? Revive the dormant Harvest Goddess and the Harvest Sprites, and reunite the scattered villages of Antos. Antos was once a tranquil kingdom under the watchful eye of the benevolent Goddess of the Harvest and her faithful Sprites.

item.title: InfraSpace
item.description: Game Description InfraSpace gives users the opportunity to become mayors of the cities of the future. This city-planning simulator uses a sci-fi setting. Users manage Martian colonies. Gradually, these settlements grow into megacities. The indie title offers relaxing gameplay. In InfraSpace, gamers mine resources, build buildings, and satisfy the needs of the population. There is training and sandbox mode. You can place residential buildings, set up concrete steel mills and other factories, and build roads.

item.title: Moonstone Island
item.description: Game Description Moonstone Island is a life-sim with collecting creatures, immersing you in a huge open world full of adventures. The game has 100 islands to explore, promising an exciting journey like no other. As someone who has visited this enchanting world, I can say that Moonstone Island offers a truly unique and exciting experience. You step into the shoes of a novice alchemist, following village traditions. Your task is to undergo alchemy training on a floating island in the sky.

item.title: Galaxy Pass Station
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Pass Station, a comical space station colony simulation, takes players on a whimsical journey into the bustling world of intergalactic hospitality. We will take on the role of the first stationmaster, who will provide excellent service and build the most wonderful center in the galaxy for a variety of alien guests. Here are 13 alien races, each of which has its own quirks and characteristics: the mysterious Tintukians, funny Zubenoids, curious Martians, mischievous Slu, incomprehensible Grays and many others.

item.title: ABRISS - build to destroy
item.description: Game Description ABRISS - build to destroy is a simulator based on physical laws. The gameplay is focused on building an atmospheric layer that destroys physics. The user has access to many designs that can crash into specified targets and destroy them. The story campaign gradually opens up access to new details, which will allow you to destroy large creations and observe entropy in digital and futuristic landscapes. Opportunities in construction and destruction:

item.title: BOOK OF HOURS
item.description: Game Description BOOK OF HOURS is a role-playing game with point-n-click elements, the events of which take place in an occult library. The ancient building is located right on the seashore. Sitting within its walls you can hear the sound of the surf and the rain hitting the roof. For five centuries, the Hush House Library has been a center of knowledge. But one day there was a terrible fire. Many books burned, and the librarian himself died under a huge rubble of shelves with books.

item.title: Sengoku Dynasty
item.description: Game Description Sengoku Dynasty tells the story of difficult life in feudal Japan. To convey everything with maximum accuracy, the developers consulted with a historical group, which provided valuable advice and confirmed records with information about the life of that period. The player will have to become the leader of one of the villages and lead it to prosperity and expansion in one of the ways. The player will have one, almost abandoned settlement at his disposal, which he will have to restore and provide the inhabitants with everything they need.

item.title: VIDEOVERSE
item.description: Game Description VIDEOVERSE invites gamers into a nostalgic digital realm that echoes the early days of online social networking. Set in the fictional online community Videoverse, it follows Emmett, a young gamer and aspiring artist. Gamers navigate a landscape rich with interactions, choices, and character development that are central to the unfolding narrative. Emmett’s journey isn’t just a game; it explores the intricacies of friendship and the weight of decisions. Each choice can lead to different consequences, allowing users to shape the story in different ways.

item.title: Cornucopia
item.description: Game Description Cornucopia is a 2.5D farm life RPG that uniquely combines pet combat, animal breeding, and lush cropping. With over 49 NPCs to interact with and 200+ recipes to master, there’s never a dull moment. You’ll be able to form lasting relationships, master exciting mini-games, and enjoy holiday celebrations as you uncover the fascinating secrets of this dynamic world. By focusing on love, family, and agriculture, you can find true love, create a thriving family, and grow a variety of vegetables, fruit trees, and berry bushes.

item.title: Street Legal 1: REVision
item.description: Game Description Street Legal 1: REVision is a racing game that focuses on car customization and realistic damage simulation. This is a re-release of the 2002 game Street Legal with numerous improvements and fixes. The game allows you to start with a regular street car and turn it into a race car by purchasing, changing, repairing and tuning over 1,000 unique parts. The game features 16 highly detailed cars based on real-life models, ranging from economy cars to muscle-bound V8s and exotic V10 supercars.

item.title: Supreme Ruler 2030
item.description: Game Description Supreme Ruler 2030 is a political simulator in which you take on the role of the ruler of any modern country and manage its diplomacy, espionage, economy and military forces. Optimize your military and generate additional income by researching, producing, buying and selling military equipment. Assemble combined battle groups to counter enemy tactics and deploy your naval battle groups as fleets to defend your sea borders from enemy invasion.

item.title: Music Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Music Store Simulator allows you to become the head of a musical instrument manufacturing company. From assembly to painting and tuning, you’ll be creating dream instruments for customers around the world. Customers need to be satisfied on time, budget and quality in order to receive new orders and increase profits. The more clients, the more opportunities for your business to grow. There is an opportunity to expand your studio and improve the quality of your tools by purchasing new equipment and training courses.

item.title: Punch Club 2: Fast Forward
item.description: Game Description Punch Club 2: Fast Forward is a 2D action fighting game for real fighters who are not afraid of difficulties and are ready to fight their way through life’s challenges. You, as the main character, have spent 20 long years patiently waiting for your moment in your mother’s cramped garage, dreaming of a better life and searching for your missing father. But life doesn’t give you anything for nothing, and there will be many obstacles and troubles on your way.

item.title: Techtonica
item.description: Game Description Techtonica is a factory construction and management simulator. Compared to many other similar games, this title stands out in that all actions here must be carried out from a first-person view. The second feature is that the plant itself is underground. Unlike most sandboxes, there is an end goal. There is also end-game content. Here you need to extract resources, build and move objects, stretch conveyor belts, automate production, craft improved tools to be able to go even deeper.

item.title: Xenonauts 2
item.description: Game Description Xenonauts 2 is a continuation of the game of the same name, developed based on X-COM: UFO Defense. Events take place in an alternate universe during the Cold War. Xenonauts 2 is not a direct sequel and tells its own story. Stylistically, the game is made in the genres of turn-based strategy and tactical RPG. The player will take control of a multinational team of soldiers opposing the invasion of an alien race.

item.title: Sticky Business
item.description: Game Description Sticky Business immerses users in the art of running a sticker store, where creativity and organization intertwine. Gamers are immersed in the daily work of creating original sticker designs and fulfilling customer orders. The title presents many options for combining elements, which allows users to focus on different tastes and preferences. From whimsical illustrations to fashionable motifs, the potential for creativity is at the forefront. Players quickly realize that creating something attractive is just the beginning; running a store requires careful planning and resource management.

item.title: Brick Rigs
item.description: Game Description Brick Rigs is a sandbox that allows you to create a variety of vehicles, and then enjoy realistic driving and destruction physics. You need to build cars using various blocks. The Brick Rings toolkit allows you to create a dragster, a fire truck, a forklift, a helicopter, an airplane or even a tank - it all depends on your imagination and skill. Gameplay Brick Rigs is a full-fledged construction set with which you can create any type of transport.

item.title: Shadows of Forbidden Gods
item.description: Game Description Shadows of Forbidden Gods invites the player to become a Dark Elder God and lead skilled agents. The task of the subjects is to cause an apocalypse in a fantasy world. You have to lead your own minions and help them with your own powerful abilities. Working in the shadows will require you to avoid heroes trying to stop the oncoming threat. The gameplay is presented in the form of a strategy, and the user receives the only task - to arrange an apocalypse on a mysterious planet.

item.title: Dave The Diver
item.description: Game Description Dave The Diver - a sea adventure about a diver named Dave. Events take place in a mysterious place called the Blue Hole. During the day, the protagonist explores the ocean, diving to the very bottom in search of treasures, and at night he manages a sushi restaurant. Dave is partnered with 3 charismatic friends to help him on his adventures. Each character has an individual character, introducing dynamics into the relationships between the characters.

item.title: Life Not Supported
item.description: Game Description Life Not Supported is a survival simulator for the brave and courageous! You are the only survivor, stuck in vast empty space orbiting a mysterious planet that could become your new home. However, things don’t go as planned, and you’re tied to what’s left of your ship. With limited resources and time running out, you must scavenge nearby debris and assemble a makeshift vessel to escape the dangers of space and uncover the truth behind the ship’s malfunction.

item.title: The Pegasus Expedition
item.description: Game Description The Pegasus Expedition is a 4X strategy game in a sci-fi setting in which humanity is faced with the threat of extermination. The action takes place in the world of an alternative future, in which people unintentionally started an intergalactic war and they are unlikely to emerge victorious from it. Civilization must leave its home and go to the constellation Pegasus, where they will not be reached by numerous opponents from among intelligent alien races.

item.title: It's Only Money
item.description: Game Description It’s Only Money will immerse gamers in the realistic story of a resident of the underworld, who, by order of the mayor of Rockhaven, was thrown into a huge pit. But don’t despair! Together with other inhabitants of the underground, you can return to the surface and begin your path to wealth and power. You must steal from the rich, fight tycoons, and regain control of the city block by block.

item.title: Space Reign
item.description: Game Description Space Reign is an exciting project that combines several colorful formats. In addition to the main storyline, there is a sandbox mode in which you can freely explore the universe and engage in open-ended gameplay. Here you need to try different strategies, experiment with the configuration of ships, discover hidden secrets and rare resources. One of the product’s strengths is its attention to detail and immersion. The universe feels alive - bustling space stations, bustling trade routes, clashes with friendly and hostile factions.

item.title: Tale of Immortal
item.description: Game Description Tale of Immortal, an open-world sandbox deeply rooted in Chinese mythology and cultivation, invites players into an immersive experience where the path to immortality is paved through strategic choices and the conquest of mythical monsters from the Classic of Mountains and Seasons. Your journey as a novice Qi Refinement Stage cultivator begins in Yukong Village. A world filled with unpredictable monsters, mystical kingdoms and treasures waiting in the wings will open before you.

item.title: Elypse
item.description: Game Description Elypse is an atmospheric metroidvania, which is a mixture of classic platformer and 2D action. The action takes place in the very depths of hell. The plot tells how every 10 years it is necessary to sacrifice people to the Abyss in order to protect oneself from the mystical Abyss - an otherworldly force with destructive power. Unfortunately, the main character was chosen to become a victim. There is always a chance of salvation: if you manage to pass all the tests that the Abyss has prepared, then you can continue your life.

item.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2
item.description: Game Description Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 takes you to a war-torn world where they take on the role of a group of children going through dangerous adventures. Their vehicle? A colossal tank named Tarasque. This turn-based RPG features revamped combat, an innovative event system, and a gripping storyline that will tug at your heartstrings and test your moral compass. The story takes place a year after the events of its predecessor, in which the children successfully stopped the war and saved their families, but peace proves to be a fleeting concept.

item.title: Occupy Mars: The Game
item.description: Game Description Colonizing a planet in Occupy Mars is a challenging but fun task. Here the player will have to build his own base, explore the expanses of the red desert, extract water, grow food and find new ways to obtain oxygen. An open world with great sandbox potential will allow you to seriously immerse yourself in the role of a pioneer on Mars. Using advanced technologies, Occupy Mars will create a developed network of buildings.

item.title: Voidtrain
item.description: Game Description In the fairy-tale world of Voidtrain, you need to survive by train. Here the player awaits a journey between unique worlds filled with dangers and adventures. The main characters were mechanics who were sorting out the rubble of a war-torn laboratory in Koenigsberg. Here they find secret Nazi documents pointing to strange research. They lead the mechanics to a portal to the Interworld - a parallel reality filled with wonders.

item.title: Age of Wonders 4
item.description: Game Description Age of Wonders 4 is a turn-based strategy with tactical battles that takes the player to a magical kingdom where they have to lead their empire to greatness. You will need to collect magic books to unlock new abilities and possibilities. Together with your army, you must enter into the final battle for the existence of the world. You need to create your own unique society, defining the appearance of its inhabitants, choosing their culture and magical abilities.

item.title: TasteMaker: Restaurant Simulator
item.description: Game Description TasteMaker: Restaurant Simulator is a management simulator for a small restaurant that is constantly growing under the strict guidance of the player. The user will have to correctly distribute the available money in the account in order not to turn the food establishment into an unprofitable business that will be forced to close. The game from an indie developer, for whom this brainchild is a debut in the video game industry, gives the gamer full and extensive rights to manage this place, which obliges him to organize all the processes required for normal functioning independently.

item.title: Volcano Princess
item.description: Game Description Volcano Princess is a charming RPG that puts you in the role of a single parent raising a daughter in a kingdom blessed by a powerful goddess. But your daughter’s fate is in your hands, and you must make the right choices to prepare her for her future role as the country’s next monarch. After your wife left, you became the sole guardian of your child. Now you need to provide her with everything she needs to be happy and successful in school and everyday life.

item.title: Shardpunk
item.description: Game Description Shardpunk is an isometric game whose gameplay is a mixture of XCOM and Darkest Dungeon. The setting is made in steampunk style. In the Capitol of the Empire, where the action takes place, a plague epidemic began and the streets were filled with rats. You take control of a survivor trying to escape the city. On your way you will meet survivors whom you can save. It is necessary not only to go through the entire Capitol, but also to defeat a huge number of mutated creatures, explore locations, collect useful resources and try to survive in this nightmare.

item.title: DREDGE
item.description: Game Description The single-player adventure DREDGE invites the player to travel through the depths and gradually uncover their secrets while fishing. As you progress, the main character will have to improve his ship and explore the bottom more thoroughly in order to obtain long-buried secrets. The event takes place in the middle of a mysterious archipelago of islands, where many mysteries and dangers are hidden. The protagonist begins his journey by taking the helm of a fishing trawler and setting sail.

item.title: Sun Haven
item.description: Game Description Sun Haven mixes role-playing game and farming simulator together. The game has two-dimensional graphics made in the style of pixel art. The camera is located on top. The indie project has a single player mode and co-op mode. Online multiplayer supports up to 8 people. Events take place in a medieval fantasy world. The main action takes place in the village of Sun Haven and its surroundings. There is also the elven settlement of Nel’Vari and the monster city of Withergate.

item.title: The Pale Beyond
item.description: Game Description The Pale Beyond is a survival visual novel where every choice has a solution. The Arctic is harsh and cruel to anyone who decides to enter its territory, and explorers must always be prepared for unforeseen circumstances. But even they can be broken by some kind of misfortune and being on the verge of death from lack of food and terrible cold. Several years ago, the ship Viscount set out in search of the absolute South, but failed and never returned.

item.title: My Dream Setup
item.description: Game Description My Dream Setup is a simulator for building a room for gaming, streaming, and just relaxing. The project uses 2D graphics and an isometric view. The camera can be rotated left and right. Controls are designed for mouse and keyboard. The video game allows users to build the room of their dreams. It provides players with many opportunities for self-expression. You can even change weather conditions and time of day.

item.title: Ages of Conflict: World War Simulator
item.description: Game Description Ages of Conflict: World War Simulator is a unique map simulation game where gamers will witness epic battles between self-created or random AI-controlled nations. Here you can control the chosen powers, adjust world events to your preferences and follow their struggle for dominance in an infinite number of worlds. Get the unique experience of watching your own or random nations fight for control of the world. Players will face massive battles, uprisings and political upheavals, and only they will be able to determine who will be the great winner.

item.title: Plains of Pain
item.description: Game Description Plains of Pain is a dark, post-apocalyptic multiplayer action game that takes you into a world of survival where hope has faded and all that remains is the ultimate end of days. This is no ordinary game - it’s a journey into a sun-scorched dystopian world that will push you to the brink of your sanity. The backstory is chillingly real. When the planet was engulfed by monstrous solar flares, Earth’s wealthiest people fled Earth as part of a secret government initiative, leaving the remaining population to fend for itself.

item.title: GameDev LiTuber Simulator
item.description: Game Description GameDev LiTuber Simulator is a simulator that invites you to immerse yourself in the complex world of digital creativity, where success depends on the ability to combine two demanding professions. The protagonist will have to go from an unknown enthusiast to a famous developer and popular streamer. Creating your own projects requires focus and talent, while broadcasting is aimed at attracting and retaining an audience. Harmonious development in these two directions becomes the main challenge that determines the ascent to glory.

item.title: The Last Starship
item.description: Game Description The Last Starship is a simulator for controlling a spaceship and its crew with strategy elements. Set in a sci-fi setting, the indie project uses a top-down view and 2D graphics in the style of pixel art. Here the player is offered to build his own huge aircraft and go on a journey through the galaxy. It is also possible to take one of several ready-made options, previously invented by the developers.

item.title: DR LIVESEY ROM AND DEATH EDITION
item.description: Game Description DR LIVESEY ROM AND DEATH EDITION is an adventure game set in fictional territories. The plot centers on Doctor Livesey and his popular squad. He goes on a journey with them, wanting to unravel the many mysteries on Treasure Island. However, behind the back of the main character, a conspiracy occurred that began right on the ship. They want to kill some members of the team and the Doctor himself.

item.title: Spectator
item.description: Game Description Spectator can please fans of Internet folklore. This game is inspired by popular urban legends. Here you can go Backstage, visit Slenderman’s habitat and visit other locations. It’s full of all kinds of references. The video game is a representative of the point-and-click survival horror genre. The indie title uses a first-person perspective. Before you start, you can choose one of 3 difficulty types: normal, hard and nightmare. There are 6 levels (days) in total.

item.title: Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game
item.description: Game Description Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game lives up to its name. This is an indie survival horror. The project was made in the setting of the First World War. It uses the first-person view familiar to the genre. If you turn the camera down, the protagonist’s legs and arms will be displayed on the screen. The events take place in 1917. In Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game you will play as soldier James.

item.title: Warsim: The Realm of Aslona
item.description: Game Description Warsim: The Realm of Aslona is a kingdom management simulator. The indie game combines elements of roguelike, adventure and strategy. The project uses a fantasy setting and ASCII graphics. A world consisting of 100 locations are created randomly. As well as the races inhabiting it and the events taking place in it. Procedural generation is capable of producing 94887852 variations of creatures. Among them are fire orcs, eyeless elves, trench dwarves and others.

item.title: Voor De Kroon
item.description: Game Description Historical battles in Voor De Kroon take place during the Dark Middle Ages, where knights with bladed weapons ruled. The game is a tactical slasher game where users will be able to engage in large-scale battles and at the same time control the coordination and movement of troops by giving orders. The main task is to seize the throne in order to conquer the Dutch kingdom in the 13th century.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress
item.description: Game Description Dwarf Fortress is a strategy game with a complex open world simulation. You control a race of dwarves whose goal is to build their own fortress. To collect resources, you need to go explore the huge open world. Territories are generated randomly and contain many dangers. Don’t let your civilization fall into decay! Mechanics are represented by combat skills, physical properties of materials, pain, nausea, various poisoning effects, etc.

item.title: Cafe Owner Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cafe Owner Simulator is a restaurateur simulator that allows you to open the cafeteria of your dreams. By renting a building, you can create unique interiors and exteriors. It is necessary to personally conduct interviews and recruit staff, including baristas, waiters, cooks, hostesses and cleaners. The task is extremely prosaic - to create the most comfortable place where people can relax and unwind. Ideally, do everything possible to keep them coming back.

item.title: Retro Gadgets
item.description: Game Description Retro Gadgets is an engineer and programmer simulator with a first-person view and two-dimensional pixel graphics. This title can also be classified as a sandbox. The video game allows you to create outdated devices. For example: drum machines, portable game consoles of previous generations, radios, small weather stations, and so on. To achieve this, an ever-increasing range of buttons, speakers, ICs, LCDs, printed circuit boards, LEDs, sensors, indicators, joysticks and other components are available.

item.title: Floodland
item.description: Game Description Floodland is a city builder with survival, strategy and roguelike elements. With each new playthrough, the map is generated randomly. Events are also generated randomly. This increases replayability. The project uses a post-apocalyptic setting. The user can choose one of the clans. Each faction has its own unique perks. You can be friends or fight with other factions. The player is asked to build buildings, improve buildings, extract resources, find food, look for lost technologies, explore islands, take care of his charges and train them into specialists, help other survivors or deal with competitors.

item.title: Pixel Gangsters: Mafia Manager
item.description: Game Description Pixel Gangsters: Mafia Manager is a sandbox crime simulator created by an independent developer. Are you ready to become a cool mafioso and conquer the city? Build your mafia empire from scratch - attract loyal henchmen, strengthen them with guns and cars, plan robberies, organize contract killings and extort protection payments from businessmen. Here any means are acceptable to achieve the goal. But don’t forget that you are not alone - other bandits also dream of becoming the king of the underworld.

item.title: ZERO Sievert
item.description: Game Description Plunging intoZERO Sievert, you will have to go on dangerous journeys through the post-apocalyptic expanses of a dying world, taking you to the terrain of a desolate alternative race. Taking control of one of the characters, you have to go on dangerous adventures, delving into creepy and gloomy places filled with strange phenomena and creatures that live beyond the limits of human vision. Adventures in ZERO Sievert immerse you in an atmosphere of loneliness and independent survival in wild conditions, full of unexplored places and unexplored locations through which the protagonist will have to wander and look for useful items for life support.

item.title: We Who Are About To Die
item.description: Game Description We Who Are About To Die takes the gamer back to the times of Ancient Rome and allows you to enter the arena as a gladiator. These magnificent fighters were mostly slaves and were forced to fight for their master in the hope of gaining glory on the sand and hoping for a chance to eventually become free, but only a few achieved this goal. Offers multiplayer content, thanks to which the gamer will fight against other real users in difficult battles.

item.title: The Exorcist's Story
item.description: Game Description The Exorcist’s Story is an atmospheric 2D adventure game in which you will find yourself in the shoes of a young priest, Antonio, who had experience in performing exorcism rituals. But one day everything went wrong and a girl died during the ceremony. You escaped prison, but you promised yourself never to perform such rituals again. But a few years later, strange things begin to happen in your small town and Asmodeus, the demon you once encountered, challenges you again.

item.title: Silver Nornir
item.description: Game Description Silver Nornir invites gamers to plunge into an exciting world where the fate of the entire world is at stake. This is an exciting old school RPG in a fantasy setting. Survivors of two disasters are ready to fight to the end to stop the end of the world. But they need your help! Exciting adventures and exciting battles using magical gems and combo techniques with friends and allies await you.

item.title: Out of Ore
item.description: Game Description In Out of Ore, gamers have to take control of a variety of heavy equipment, with the help of which they can mine ore, move earth, dig holes, build or repair buildings, and much more. You have to try yourself as a driver of construction equipment, which is designed for a variety of purposes. The main character goes according to the plot to the very north of the country, where a small base from the Company Mining Corp.

item.title: Mount and Blade 2: Bannerlord
item.description: Game Description Mount and Blade 2 Bannerlord is a role-playing game with elements of medieval wars, the action of which takes place 200 years before the start of Part 1. In this sequel you will find an improved combat system and an enlarged game world - Calradia. Fight with hundreds of troops under your command and take direct part in the battles as one of the soldiers. You can storm enemy fortresses and destroy fortifications with siege weapons in Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord.

item.title: Cat Saves Halloween
item.description: Game Description Cat Saves Halloween is a game where a magical cat has to face an invasion of monsters on the eve of All Hallows' Day. The furry hero has the right to fight this threat or simply cause chaos in the city. His arsenal of skills includes both ordinary cat habits such as running and climbing, and supernatural skills, including witchcraft and control over people. The protagonist is also able to use hairballs, which creates another level of interaction with the world and its inhabitants.

item.title: LEGO Bricktales
item.description: Game Description LEGO Bricktales is a puzzle game designed in the now popular LEGO style. This means the entire virtual universe is built from the toy blocks that make up the construction set. The characters also look quite funny - they have cute limbs and boxy bodies. This fascinating story revolves around the fate of a once popular amusement park. Now he is going through far from the best times. It is owned by a kind old man, who will suddenly lose everything he has built throughout his life.

item.title: Stardeus
item.description: Game Description The city-planning simulator Stardeus will plunge you into a cosmic world where there are no familiar objects, and, of course, there are robotic systems, spaceships, and advanced artificial intelligence that helps with everything. The main character, in the role of AI, is called upon to restore order on a large space cruiser, simultaneously building his own colony and introducing automation into the spheres of life of the newly built city.

item.title: Card Survival: Tropical Island
item.description: Game Description Card Survival: Tropical Island – takes you into the atmosphere of tropical islands, on which the protagonist will have to survive and settle down. Players gain experience managing the time and resources available to build the structures and tools needed to live a solitary life in the wild. Being in an area filled with various materials and natural objects of the environment, you will have to search and collect useful elements that allow you to live in an area unfavorable for humans.

item.title: CHEMISTS: Area of ​​infection
item.description: Game Description CHEMISTS: Area of ​​Infection is a 3rd person shooter that will take you to an alternate reality full of dangers and mysteries. Years have passed since a global catastrophe, and you wake up in a hospital, remembering nothing from the past. Now your task is to survive in this harsh world and find out what happened. Players will have to rely on their experience and navigate the environment, remembering every corner so as not to get lost.

item.title: Spirit of the Island
item.description: Game Description Life simulator Spirit of the Island places the player on a tropical island, offering to grow crops, take care of pets, help the locals and much more. Spirit of the Island will require turning the deserted Archipelago into a populated tourist center. However, this requires a lot of effort and a thorny path from a small farm to a noisy city. The danger comes from pirates who are also hunting for treasure and exploring the tropical paradise.

item.title: Regiments
item.description: Game Description Regiments is a real-time strategy game where the Cold War escalated into World War III. Events will unfold in Germany in 1989, which became the main battlefield between NATO armies and the Warsaw Pact. Here the player will be able to become the commander-in-chief of the army: control platoons, call for artillery strikes or air support. Both regular infantry and tanks with fighters will be under control. Squads can be formed and changed directly during battle.

item.title: Rollerdrome
item.description: Game Description The Rollerdrome shooter combines dynamic and vibrant battles, smooth graphics, third-person view and tactical mechanics that allow you to influence the outcome of the battle even with lower chances of winning. The player will have to participate in fierce battles with a variety of opponents. By killing opponents, the main character restores health and replenishes ammunition. During the fight, you can perform spectacular tricks, dodges, or use various tactical movements to eliminate opponents.

item.title: Civitatem
item.description: Game Description Civitatem is a single-player city-planning simulator with a top-down view and a medieval setting, expressed in the architecture of the buildings available for construction, the clothing of the population and the technologies present. The gamer helps civilians find a place to live to replace the old one, which was destroyed during an attack by bandits. By correctly distributing human resources to all areas of activity under the player’s control, one can achieve immediate growth of the settlement and the discovery of technologies that make life much easier.

item.title: Bear and Breakfast
item.description: Game Description In Bear and Breakfast, the good-natured witch opens his own hotel, which is located in the thicket of the forest, where he plans to serve delicious dishes. Soon in the manager simulator it turns out that there is some dangerous secret behind the building that the user needs to reveal. Here you are asked to independently build a hotel, selecting the location of rooms, furniture and decor, as well as attract customers, complete tasks, which allows you to advance through the plot, and collect the necessary items.

item.title: PowerWash Simulator
item.description: Game Description In thePowerWash Simulator you need to clean surfaces from dirt, plaque, rust and much more. The calming and peaceful gameplay of PowerWash Simulator is designed for those who love the noise of dishwashers and love cleanliness. You will have a water pump in your hands that can clean absolutely any surface. Wash away all the dirt from the city and show society who the real professional is here! Do your job carefully and earn reputation points.

item.title: Rune Factory 5
item.description: Game Description Rune Factory 5, like previous parts of the series, crosses a role-playing game with a farm simulator. The events take place in the border town of Rigbart and its surroundings. At the very beginning, you can choose a girl named Alice or a guy named Ares to play the role of the main character. This sequel uses the amnesia plot twist. The protagonist loses his memory and joins the SEED organization.

item.title: Placid Plastic Duck Simulator
item.description: Game Description Placid Plastic Duck Simulator is an opportunity to immerse yourself in the funny adventures of a little rubber duck, who must move through a variety of colorful locations. Users will be able to enjoy elaborate graphics and visual effects, as well as selected meditative music. The project aims to physically interact with an interactive environment in a three-dimensional space, where you need to try yourself in the role of one of the toy ducks that swim in the pool.

item.title: Raft
item.description: Game Description Raft is a first-person survival sandbox in which the player will have to survive on a small raft and explore new lands. The main character will begin his journey by waking up hungry and dehydrated on a small wreck of a ship. Get food and drink by catching garbage floating past the hero on the waves. To catch the item, you can use the hook. Find useful items and materials to craft a mug, light a fire, and filter sea water.

item.title: Attack at Dawn: North Africa
item.description: Game Description Attack at Dawn North Africa is a military-strategic project that takes participants into the conditions of the North African campaign during the Second World War. Players will lead the Axis or Allied forces, taking command of battalions, divisions and air forces across the vast expanses of Libya and Egypt. Set across a vast map stretching from the Gulf of Sirte to the Suez Canal, the action spans the period 1940 to 1943.

item.title: Dorfromantik
item.description: Game Description Dorfromantik - strategy in low-poly style. The game encourages you not to think about military strategies and operations. enjoy peaceful buildings and development of your lands. Game mechanics of Dorfromantic combine classic RTS and puzzle. Create a village, developing and expanding, building new buildings on hexagonal tiles. Explore a procedurally generated world filled with diverse and colorful biomes. Complete tasks to fill locations with new life and create truly unique worlds.

item.title: Kapital: Sparks of Revolution
item.description: Game Description Kapital: Sparks of Revolution is a city planning simulator that allows you to deal with all economic issues in managing the capital. Events start at a time when European countries find themselves in a deep systemic crisis. There is a class struggle and it becomes difficult to avoid a social explosion. The player finds himself in such conditions. What price must be paid to save Europe from anarchy?

item.title: Teardown
item.description: Game Description Teardown is a robbery simulator in a variety of conditions prepared by indie developers from Tuxedo Labs. Stylistically, the project was made using a voxel graphic component. This solution made it possible to implement complete destructibility of all available objects in the location. This freedom opens up the possibility of performing operations in a variety of ways, improvising on the fly. The gamer will have at his disposal explosives and a sledgehammer for destroying all kinds of surfaces to penetrate the territory, as well as several types of vehicles of different sizes for loading valuables and other things that need to be stolen according to the terms of a particular task.

item.title: Dummynation
item.description: Game Description Gamers in Dummynation will have to try themselves as a world invader, expanding their influence on the planet. The game is a geopolitical simulator where you need to develop your own strategy to improve your political position on the planet. Users will select one of the states to begin gradually expanding their borders. It is necessary to carry out military occupations, declare annexation of selected territories, and much more.

item.title: Stacklands
item.description: Game Description InStacklands you have to build a village, completing various levels in the style of a deck-building battler. Users will collect food, build buildings and fight monsters on a special field using ability cards. It will be possible to use combinations of cards. For example, when you move a “village dweller” to a “berry bush”, “berries” will appear, which the city dweller will consume as food and get a chance to survive.

item.title: Shredders
item.description: Game Description Shredders is a snowboarding simulator. The indie project contains a large number of references for fans of this sport and related media products. You can play it alone or with other users online. For single-player fans, there is a single-player story mode. The plot begins with the protagonist and best friend Scotty trying to make entertaining videos about winter extreme sports. A representative of one of the brands named Lisa contacts them and offers sponsorship along with participation in the championship.

item.title: Wobbledogs
item.description: Game Description Wobbledogs is a bright sandbox with simulation elements, based on funny physics and funny ragdoll. The gameplay is a pet simulator. Take care and raise fancy dogs. They can change shape and mutate. Acid colors, funny style and cute animals are the basis of such an unusual project. Wobbledogs helps you learn how to take care of your pets. At the beginning of their life, dogs behave relatively calmly and normally.

item.title: Distant Worlds 2
