item.description: Game Description Distant Worlds 2 continues the 4x strategy of the same name, but on a new 64-bit engine, with updated 3D graphics and a sophisticated interface. Here the user will have to start his own story in a vast world, acting in real time. The game focuses on multiplayer, where at the start you are asked to choose a side in the conflict, and then start customizing and setting up the Universe, thanks to the built-in editor.

item.title: Iron Lung
item.description: Game Description Gamers in Iron Lung will plunge into dark adventures aboard the Iron Lung submarine. The game is designed as a horror adventure where players need to make their way through the ocean on the surface of an alien moon. Users will move as a first-person character through various locations, represented by corridors and rooms on the ship. You will have to navigate the environment using the central window, as well as monitoring the data on the dashboard.

item.title: Milling Machine Simulator 3D
item.description: Game Description Milling Machine Simulator 3D allows players to try themselves in the role of a master who will work at a milling machine. He will go out to drill, grind, cut and mill in a small hut where the protagonist’s private workshop is located. The game performs a training function, made in the form of a simulator of working at a machine in three-dimensional space, where realistic physics and the ability to carefully inspect components and equipment are implemented.

item.title: Black One Blood Brothers
item.description: Game Description Black One Blood Brothers is a full-fledged immersion in combat operations, where users will take control of a special forces squad. The game is made in the genre of tactical sandbox shooter, designed for one player. Gameplay mechanics are made in the style of the Rainbow six and Ghost Recon projects. Users will perform secret missions (JSO), where the protagonist has to move from a first-person perspective, taking on the role of a French naval officer serving in the Marine Corps.

item.title: Ship Simulator Realistic
item.description: Game Description Ship Simulator Realistic, as the name suggests, is a maritime simulator. The game gives you the opportunity to sail on different ships in the waters of Greece. There are 7 islands available with a day and night cycle. The indie project contains a single-player free-swimming mode and multiplayer available via the Internet. There is also a level editor. This title has realistic physics. The engine can realistically simulate sea waves and foam when moving vehicles.

item.title: Mon Bazou
item.description: Game Description While repairing a car inMon Bazou, players have to deal with a variety of everyday problems that affect the life of the main character. The protagonist is a guy who dreams of turning his old car into a racing car that can compete with professional drivers and reach great speed. The game is made in the form of a simulator, where users have to take on the role of a novice racer who will live the everyday routine and do simple things, trying to earn a living.

item.title: Savage Lands
item.description: Game Description Savage Lands is a fantasy survival game on PC in a medieval setting. Before starting the game, you are invited to customize your character a little: hair, skin color, face, tattoos. Next, you appear on the shore of the island. The wreckage of a boat is visible in the water. The only thought in my head is: “What am I doing here?” The interface is very simple: in the right corner of the screen there is a guide or tasks that you can complete.

item.title: Noble Fates
item.description: Game Description The fantasy world of Noble Fates immerses you in adventures taking place in a fairy-tale kingdom. A group of gods oversee the plane of human material existence while mortals vie for control over territories and new lands. The main character is Contra, who is a demigod and capable of influencing people and other inhabitants of the planet. It will be possible to manage entire colonies of settlers in order to achieve prosperity for the future great civilization.

item.title: SGS Operation Hawaii
item.description: Game Description SGS Operation Hawaii features a scenario covering the events following the attack on Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941. This game explores the possible consequences of the situation if a Japanese air raid were followed by a ground invasion of Oahu. The focus is on a theoretical operation involving specially trained Marines and Army units secretly brought in with the main strike force. The idea differs from the real story, where a similar landing, although discussed by the Imperial Japanese Navy, was rejected due to supply difficulties.

item.title: Thrive
item.description: Game Description Thrive users will try themselves as an observer, which will track the natural evolution of cells living on an alien planet. The game is a simulator where you have to survive in a dangerous environment with competing species that are fighting for resources. Players will take control of an organism that emerged from the last universal ancestor called LUCA. The main goal for the hero is survival and adaptation to new mutations.

item.title: Urge
item.description: Game Description Urge is an exciting and addictive game that immerses you in a post-apocalyptic environment where users take on the role of a car accident survivor. The plot revolves around a mysterious drug called fog that has corrupted the world. This substance reacts to actions, shaping the environment and influencing the behavior of enemies encountered. The game mechanics offer a fun experience while allowing you to make strategic choices. Making short work of enemies by shooting them in the head may seem like a viable option, but it comes with consequences.

item.title: Forza Horizon 5
item.description: Game Description Forza Horizon 5 is a racing game that focuses on multiplayer racing and free-roaming in an open world. This project includes many aspects from Forza’s previous games. More than 200 original cars from real-life companies are presented, with realistic driving and clutch physics. There are high-quality graphics, effects and other elements that completely immerse users in a believable environment. While riding around the world, the player is able to collide with other gamers or ordinary cars controlled by artificial intelligence.

item.title: Logic World
item.description: Game Description Logic World can captivate engineers and science enthusiasts, or serve as a teaching tool. The puzzle game asks you to assemble various digital circuits. The simulation of their work is as close as possible to the real world. With their help you can solve various mathematical problems. In addition to solving puzzles, players can build everything from scratch. Logic World allows you not only to assemble virtual hardware, but also to program it.

item.title: Escape Simulator
item.description: Game Description Escape Simulator is a first-person puzzle game aimed at cooperative play. The gameplay is a quest room in which you need to solve all the puzzles and successfully leave the room. Quests, tasks and item locations are randomly generated, thereby increasing the replayability of the project. The environment is completely interactive. You can interact with any objects, picking them up and rotating them in any plane. You can inspect objects, move furniture, break, destroy fragile vases and much more.

item.title: The Riftbreaker
item.description: Game Description The Riftbreaker is a survival adventure role-playing game that has some mechanics taken straight from real-time strategy and action games. The project has dynamic gameplay, using an isometric camera to create the most convenient and complete view around the female protagonist named Ashley Novak. She has a powerful invention of mankind - a combat mech named “Mr. Riggs”, which helps to most effectively fight the various monsters that inhabit the planet Galatea-37, where the single-player campaign takes place, designed for dozens of hours of gameplay.

item.title: Junkyard Simulator
item.description: Game Description Explore open environments in Junkyard Simulator in search of trash that can be used to upgrade and create cars. The main character’s business is searching for junk, purchasing parts and creating cars. The whole world is a dump, full of scrap metal and useful items. In the nooks and crannies of landfills, the character will find the best items. Found items are sold for good money, but they are also used in the workshop.

item.title: Urban Tale
item.description: Game Description The immersion in Urban Tale is made in the form of a role-playing adventure, where you have to go to conquer a big city. The game creates a life simulation where the main character tries to succeed in life. The user’s choices and decisions made along the way will determine what area the protagonist will go into to develop. You have to start from scratch, trying to find your way from the possible options.

item.title: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya
item.description: Game Description Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya takes gamers to a fictional Japanese town called Gensoke, where the young and very charming owner of the local night izakaya lives. This term usually refers to a night drinking establishment where people gather, usually after a night shift, and drink alcoholic beverages. The protagonist is the beautiful Mistia Lorelei, who has a dream to make the entire establishment the most popular in the city.

item.title: Medieval Dynasty
item.description: Game Description Medieval Dynasty is an adventure in medieval Europe, where nobles and clergy rule. The country conducts active trade with its neighbors and is prospering. You will become a poor man who lives by hunting and farming. Go from a loner to the head of a community. Set up a small camp and turn it into your own settlement. Find food by chasing wild animals, including deer, wild boar and rabbits.

item.title: Virtual Surfing
item.description: Game Description Virtual Surfing may be suitable for fans of sports games. The title offers to harness the sea and ocean waves. The project lives up to its name. This is an arcade surfing simulator. It boasts well-developed water physics. It has different weather conditions and several locations. At the very beginning, the gamer is asked to enter a name. And then the user is offered to customize the appearance of his surfer (there is a choice of gender) and customize the board.

item.title: Cookie Clicker
item.description: Game Description Cookie Clicker lives up to its name. This is a clicker about earning cookies. The title is considered one of the first such games. The project developed and popularized an entire genre. Initially it was a browser. Here is an improved version of Cookie Clicker. The re-release boasts an achievement system with 500 achievements, 600 improvements, the ability to exchange some goodies for others, and receiving constant upgrades. There are also mini-games here.

item.title: Sprocket
item.description: Game Description Sprocket will give gamers an unusual experience, because here they will create their own designs and models of tanks. Here you can not only manipulate the type of hull and guns, but also study the specifics of armor to make your model more practical. Variations from different periods are available here, from the early stages of the First World War to the last years of the Second World War.

item.title: HUMANKIND
item.description: Game Description In the 4X strategy HUMANKIND, the player will have to lead his own civilization through all eras of human development. You have to develop cities, create an army and manage units, participating in battles on land and sea. The fictional planet is procedurally generated and includes multiple regions. At the start of the passage, they are not occupied by anyone, but gradually new rulers appear and territories are captured by other factions.

item.title: Carrier Command 2
item.description: Game Description Carrier Command 2 is a modern continuation of the strategy that came out back in the eighties. Compared to other titles, the sequel stands out due to its gameplay features. This is not only an RTS, but also a simulator of an aircraft carrier commander. The gamer’s task: to liberate the Telos colony located on the archipelago from the terrorists who captured it. In Carrier Command 2, the user controls a huge warship.

item.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel
item.description: Game Description Fuga: Melodies of Steel is a role-playing adventure centered around children with various unique abilities. Players need to choose their heroes to place them behind tanks, gun turrets, etc. Assembling your squad of brave heroes, Fuga: Melodies of Steel requires you to fight against numerous enemies. Children interact with each other and show emotions. As they get closer, new abilities and upgrade branches open up. A powerful, mysterious weapon called the Taranis is available in Fuga.

item.title: F1 2021
item.description: Game Description F1 2021 is a racing car simulator. The new part of the series provides an opportunity to take part in the 2021 season of the Formula 1 championship. Thanks to the official license, the product contains real teams, drivers and tracks. There is a choice of difficulty. Here you can configure the aggressiveness of artificial intelligence, the severity of the rules, and the driving assistance system. Casual users will be able to make the gameplay more arcade-like, and hardcore users will be able to add realism to the gameplay.

item.title: Ancient Life
item.description: Game Description Ancient Life is a simulator in which the main goal is to live an eventful life in the vastness of ancient China, where the ending of one generation serves as the starting point for a new one. The project invites you to immerse yourself in a detailed reconstruction of the era, offering a wide range of activities from farming and handicrafts to hunting or a career as a government official.

item.title: PULSAR: Lost Colony
item.description: Game Description PULSAR: Lost Colony is a cooperative space simulator in which you will control a star shuttle and explore outer space. Players take on a specific role on the ship: captain, pilot, scientist, weapons specialist, or engineer. Only coordinated work will lead to victory over the enemy. While traveling through the universe, you need to scan the planets for life or useful resources. There will always be dangers along the way, so it is possible to launch a warp jump to avoid a collision and escape from the upcoming battle.

item.title: Cruelty Squad
item.description: Game Description Cruelty Squad is an immersive simulator that includes elements of stealth and first-person shooter. You will need to penetrate the depths of a high-tech corporation to stop its atrocities. A huge arsenal of weapons is available, including shotguns, darts, pistols, launchers and much more. The difficulty increases with each new stage. It is necessary to take part in intense firefights with a huge number of different enemies. It is possible to emerge victorious from a fight without death.

item.title: Rise Eterna
item.description: Game Description The story of Rise Eterna follows Lua as she attempts to uncover the secrets of her own origins. The gameplay combines tactical elements and RPG in a Japanese animated style. The user will assemble a squad of characters with special skills and characteristics. A squad can have up to 14 wards. The heroes will go through brutal battles, dungeons and boss encounters. As the player progresses, he discovers a dark and mature story centered around the relationship between two lost souls.

item.title: Truck Driver
item.description: Game Description Truck Driver is a simulator in which you have to build a career as a truck driver. At the beginning of the game, select your character, be it a man or a woman, and get behind the wheel of a truck. Your task is to transport various goods and cargo. The better you cope with tasks, the higher the level of reputation you will have among employers. Starting from the very bottom with a simple truck, you will gradually improve your transport by buying spare parts or buy a whole fleet of trucks.

item.title: Vivid Knight
item.description: Game Description Vivid Knight is an anime roguelike where you have to save your friends from being turned into gems. Helping out your comrades, you need to combine their abilities to create your own invincible team of powerful fighters. While exploring the generated dungeons, you need to fight funny enemies, gain experience and upgrade the skills of your heroes. Due to randomness, the gameplay is never repeated twice, generating unique situations and scenes.

item.title: Imagine Earth
item.description: Game Description Imagine Earth is a sandbox strategy where the goal is to create your own race and further develop it. Humanity needs a lot of different resources for a normal life, but it will always want more. The map is three-dimensional, made in the form of a globe, rather than a flat surface, this allows you to observe your planet from any angle. A special feature will be the realistic modulation of all kinds of disasters, both those that occurred due to human influence and due to nature.

item.title: First Feudal
item.description: Game Description First Feudal takes the gamer to the classic Middle Ages and invites you to become a feudal lord (landowner and lord). The game does not have a plot - users face a classic sandbox with endless gameplay. Initially it will be difficult, because a small village is vulnerable and a small landowner is not able to protect it. But try to make good money and gather your own army so that no one tries to take the resources.

item.title: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
item.description: Game Description Totally Accurate Battle Simulator is a crazy tactical war game, heavily tied to physics. The battles take place in real time using weapons from different eras. The game is built on the laws of physics, so you can witness the most incredible combat in the history of video games! One of the main features of the game is its caricature and the creation of the most insane atmosphere of battles.

item.title: Endzone - A World Apart
item.description: Game Description Endzone - A World Apart is a post-apocalyptic mayor simulator, where under your strict guidance there will be a small settlement in need of a competent leader capable of developing a small commune that has survived a nuclear war. The plot tells how in 2021 one terrorist group carried out a nuclear bombing of all known states, as a result of which the planet systematically plunged into global chaos.

item.title: Forza Horizon 4
item.description: Game Description Forza Horizon 4 is a realistic racing simulator with an open game world, where the player is given the opportunity to explore many cities, participate in various races and interact with other players. Drive along the tracks of Great Britain, unlock new cars, and take part in tournaments and races. The gameplay is focused on interaction between players. To participate in certain races, you will need to find a suitable area, as well as gather all participants in one lobby.

item.title: Asdivine Cross
item.description: Game Description Asdivine Cross is a Japanese role-playing game with 2D anime-style pixel graphics. The project was ported to computers from smartphones. In the PC version, the developers adapted the controls for a keyboard and mouse and added an achievement system. The title emulates an old school JRPG. In keeping with the tradition of the genre, this video game features random encounters and turn-based combat. The order of moves of all participants in the battle is displayed on the screen, and you can influence it.

item.title: War on the Sea
item.description: Game Description War on the Sea is a single-player tactical simulator of combat operations that take place in the oceanic space. The gamer will have control of not only 50 types of warships for various purposes, including submarines, but also realistic copies of real aircraft. The setting of the project is the era of the Second World War; the year 1942 has recently arrived on the planet. The location of all available battles in the single-player campaign is the Pacific Ocean, and more specifically, locations near the Solomon Islands, which represent a strategically important point for both sides of the conflict.

item.title: Dyson Sphere Program
item.description: Game Description Dyson Sphere Program is a space simulator that allows you to develop your base and explore the galaxy. Go into the vastness of outer space to colonize distant planets. Build an intergalactic factory using the power of the stars. Design and plan production chains. Collect resources and develop your base. Start your journey as a small workshop and progress to the Dyson Sphere - a megastructure that orbits the stars.

item.title: Ship Handling Simulator
item.description: Game Description Ship Handling Simulator is a comprehensive maritime simulator, the main goal of which is to hone your ship handling skills in a variety of conditions. The project involves facing changing weather conditions, changing times of day and obstacles such as icebergs. Particular attention is paid to the physical damage model, which includes visual deformation of the hull during collisions. Careless maneuvering can lead to the ship’s flooding, even to the point of spectacularly breaking it in half.

item.title: Founders' Fortune
item.description: Game Description Founders' Fortune is a fantasy sim where, in addition to building and defending a base, you need to monitor the psychological state of the heroes. The colonists reach the island empty-handed to settle in a new place. By collecting resources, they build houses and various objects. Construction begins with walls and floors, after which furniture is placed and the façade is put in order. Colonists are the main element of Founders' Fortune.

item.title: Bridge Constructor: The Walking Dead
item.description: Game Description Bridge Constructor: The Walking Dead is a collaboration between two famous franchises. “The Walking Dead” is a famous series based on a comic book, “Bridge Builder” is an arcade simulator of a construction worker using ragdoll animation and a realistic physical model that follows the laws of the real world. The gamer will have to join a group of survivors in a universe where an apocalypse has occurred due to the appearance of zombies due to an unknown disease.

item.title: The Falconeer
item.description: Game Description The plot of The Falconeer tells about the secrets of already forgotten gods and ancient civilizations. The game combines fantasy, action and role-playing elements in an ocean world located on the Great Ursi. Take control of an armed man and a huge bird to soar upward and explore a gradually crumbling and beautiful world. Battles constantly take place across vast territories between militant groups and factions fighting for the secrets and mysteries hidden in these places.

item.title: Mesmer
item.description: Game Description Mesmer is a revolution simulator that is a vibrant adventure in which you need to unite people and take a fortress by storm. Take on the role of the leader of a revolutionary uprising, influencing the consciousness of people and factions operating within the city. The secret police are monitoring every action, so be vigilant! The task is simple: to lead Mesmer and his people to a better life.

item.title: Matsuro Palette
item.description: Game Description Matsuro Palette is based on survival and mystery, in which gamers find themselves locked in a studio with a cursed painting. The story unfolds over seven days, during which the protagonist must navigate the complex and disturbing world created by the girl’s painting. To survive, the user must carefully paint her portrait, using notes left by previous victims as clues. However, there is a constant threat: if you anger the girl depicted in the painting, it can lead to fatal consequences.

item.title: EA SPORTS FIFA 21
item.description: Game Description FIFA 21 is a football simulator that uses the latest 3D scanning system, making players realistic and as close as possible to their prototypes. The main feature of FIFA 21 will be the development of the Volta mode - street competitions. The new mode is called FIFA Street. Teams will consist of several players in various futsal and outdoor sports fields. A separate script has also been written for this mode.

item.title: STAR WARS: Squadrons
item.description: Game Description STAR WARS: Squadrons takes place after the sixth episode of Return of the Jedi. Events unfold during the period when Imperial forces are defeated on Endor and lose the second Death Star. The game has two main characters. One serves on the Titan squadron of the Galactic Empire, and the second is at this time on the Defender and helps the rebels. Online modes in STAR WARS: Squadrons support up to 10 users.

item.title: Cauldrons of War - Barbarossa
item.description: Game Description Cauldrons of War - Barbarossa is a hardcore wargame set in the Second World War. Turn-based tactical strategy dedicated to the Second World War. There are 2 factions available in it: USSR and Nazi Germany. The period from the summer of 1941 to the winter of 1942 is covered. Gameplay for the Red Army and Wehrmacht troops differs. Both sides of the conflict are balanced with each other. The project emphasizes historical accuracy and realism.

item.title: Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game
item.description: Game Description Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game is an adventure game in which the player is invited to travel around the world by car. The universe around the main character experienced a terrible apocalypse, turning into a desert. Graphically, the project is made using low-detail textures to create its own style. The locations where the gamer is present are created randomly thanks to the use of artificial intelligence in the process of generating territories, which is responsible for randomizing the environment.

item.title: Root
item.description: Game Description Root is a strategy with simulator elements, offering to experience an asymmetrical type of combat. The action will take place in the forest where anthropomorphic creatures live. Create your faction and lead it to victory in this bloody forest war! The gameplay of Root is designed for both one player and a company of up to 4 people. The story begins with the vile Marquis de Cote taking over the area, trying to get rich with the help of natural resources and treasures.

item.title: Songs of Syx
item.description: Game Description Songs of Syx is a top-down city builder with roguelike elements. The progression system allows you to turn a small colony into a full-fledged settlement, from a village into a large city, and from a metropolis into an entire empire. When creating a state, to maintain the capital, you will need to build other settlements, castles, and ports. The maximum number of inhabitants in the village is 30,000 people.

item.title: Crusader Kings 3
item.description: Game Description Crusader Kings 3 is a global strategy that significantly expands the capabilities of the previous part. Crusader Kings 3 covers the time period from 1066 to 1453. Unlike the second part, you won’t be able to start the game at any time. The new map stretches from Spain to Burma and Mongolia, and from Scandinavia to Central Africa. The scale of the game is quadrupled. The points on the map represent not only counties, but also baronial possessions.

item.title: Factorio
item.description: Game Description The new planet should have everything to provide people with a comfortable, peaceful existence. Factorio is a sandbox in 2D graphics, where a new planet should be fully equipped for the future life of people. As soon as we arrive in a new place, we need to extract resources, assemble elements from them, and build structures so that people in the future can settle in and exist peacefully. Don’t forget that the planet reacts aggressively to colonizers.

item.title: There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension
item.description: Game Description There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is a humorous adventure game where you have to click on every element available in the locations. You are taken on an amazing adventure through different video game universes. The visual style of the game is made in a 2D pixel style. Each of the numerous characters in There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is voiced and played by professional actors. On your way there are many puzzles that need to be solved in an unconventional way.

item.title: The Battle of Polytopia
item.description: Game Description The Battle of Polytopia is a turn-based strategy game with city builder elements. The events of the game develop in the fictional world of Square. There are 12 factions to choose from, one of which you can start a campaign for. Lead your people to world domination by expanding your sphere of influence and exploring new technologies. You will explore the surrounding lands, develop various technologies and collect useful materials, on the basis of which your base will develop.

item.title: Wobbly Life
item.description: Game Description Wobbly Life is a bright and dynamic sandbox that relies on an open world and body physics. The gameplay is tailored for local and online co-op. Team up with friends to compete in various mini-games and competitions. There is a single-player game aimed at developing your hero. Earn money and spend it on new skins, clothes, equipment and much more. You will explore the vastness of Wobbly Island, controlling cute characters that resemble children’s toys.

item.title: Rival Stars Horse Racing: Desktop Edition
item.description: Game Description With Rival Stars Horse Racing: Desktop Edition, the player will have at his disposal a stable of horses from which he must create winners in the race. Here you need to raise and choose a potential champion in order to lead him to victory in horse racing. The desktop version has updated graphics and different game styles. The user inherited a farm from his grandfather that had fallen into disrepair.

item.title: Outer Wilds
item.description: Game Description Outer Wilds is a first-person action-adventure game based on the popular Groundhog Day theme. Events take place on the fictional planet Kamelok, which is destroyed by a star explosion 22 minutes after the start of the game. But the story is just beginning. The user finds himself in a “time loop”, which allows you to gradually develop the plot, travel through the planetary system and meet new characters. After a “reboot” of life, all accumulated information remains available.

item.title: Sims 4
item.description: Game Description The Sims 4 is a life simulator in which you take control of a Sim and control their life. Choose one of the families provided by the developers, or create your own character or several. You can choose your gender, hair and skin color, change your physique, facial expressions and much more, creating a unique hero. If you’re creating a single character, maturity is an important aspect. A child and an old person have fewer opportunities than a mature person or teenager.

item.title: Barn Finders
item.description: Game Description In the Barn Finders simulator, you need to explore abandoned warehouses, barns, bases and villages to find valuable items. Having discovered interesting things, you need to bring them to your pawnshop and put them up for sale, trying to get the highest possible price for your finds. Things can be very different: old watches, musical instruments, antiques, gold, weapons, vintage cars, motorcycles and much more. Auctions and sales are an important gameplay element.

item.title: Space Simulation Toolkit
item.description: Game Description Space Simulation Toolkit is a physics sandbox that offers a unique approach to simulating worlds using your graphics card as a supercomputer. This game goes beyond the traditional experience, allowing users to manipulate the laws of physics and create complex worlds with living creatures. This is a platform for experiments - from the development of artificial intelligence to the design of mechanisms and simulation of various physical environments.

item.title: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal
item.description: Game Description Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal - Pacific War Naval Warfare dives into the air conflicts that unfolded in the Pacific during World War II. This strategy game puts you in the middle of the historical battles between the US and Japan in 1942-1943. Using a system of hexes and counters, the title tasks you with outflanking your opponent while defending critical areas or attacking key enemy positions. It’s all about decision making: when to strike, when to retreat, how to preserve your carriers and prevent the enemy from gaining a foothold.

item.title: Cepheus Protocol
item.description: Game Description Cepheus Protocol is a real-time strategy game where you are given a large open world so that you have the opportunity to find patient zero. A terrible virus has taken over San Francisco, turning residents into bloodthirsty monsters. You will lead a squad of soldiers from the Center for Epidemic Research and Control (CERC) fighting on the streets of an infected city. The task is to find the zero infected person to defeat the epidemic.

item.title: Euphoria: Supreme Mechanics
item.description: Game Description Supreme Mechanics - Challenges out-of-the-box thinking and explores different genres and perspectives. It is a first-person puzzle game that combines elements of dystopian fantasy, crime-solving, and horror with deep philosophical questions. You’ll have to solve some dark and twisted cases as you explore the world around you, uncover your character’s hidden identity, overcome the boundaries of danger and logic, and create your own version of time and history.

item.title: Drug Dealer Simulator
item.description: Game Description Drug Dealer Simulator will allow you to create your own criminal empire without moral and legal consequences. The player starts in a shabby shelter and begins to develop his business. You can either become a dark genius or a cruel gangster. The player needs to purchase goods from the cartels, avoid the police and organize safe houses. You can sell goods both in small quantities and individually, and in large quantities to entire gangs.

item.title: Avorion
item.description: Game Description People have always been attracted to space. And Avorion is one of the embodiments of human desires. This game doesn’t have much of a story or great graphics. Like many indie games, Avoiron is built on a specific idea for which the creators consciously sacrificed everything else. The backstory is this: several hundred years ago, a cataclysm almost destroyed the entire galaxy. Since then, no one has been able to break into the central regions of the galaxy.

item.title: JEF
item.description: Game Description The protagonist of JEF is an alien who does not remember his name or how he even ended up in the place of the initial events. Soon, he discovers that his home planet has been taken over by a huge, evil spa cult. Now you need to find a way to escape and make your way through space and time to get to other colonies. And the main goal is to get to Earth.

item.title: The Test
item.description: Game Description The Test is a psychological horror with elements of a visual novel, role-playing adventure, and immersive sim with a lot of text monologues inside the protagonist’s head. The player gets the opportunity to directly influence what is happening using a decision-making system of varying degrees of importance. The isometric camera allows you to get the best view of the two-dimensional space where all the action of the single-player campaign takes place with a well-developed plot about mental suffering.

item.title: Peaceful Days
item.description: Game Description Peaceful Days immerses you in the atmosphere of a cozy town, where communication with local residents becomes an integral part of everyday life. Regular festivals allow you to get to know your neighbors, each with their own personalities and schedules, and take part in unique events. Behind the façade of outward hospitality there are numerous secrets waiting to be discovered. All this rich social life revolves around the main thing - the creation and development of their own prosperous economy, which has become the center of attraction for the entire community.

item.title: some convenience store
item.description: Game Description some some convenience store is a visual novel with a lot of sexual content related to naked female bodies, which quite often flash on the monitor screen. The user finds himself in a kind of dating simulator in an alternative reality, playing the role of a simple guy working as a half-time senior salesman in a small grocery store. The goal of the project from indie developers is to establish a relationship with a representative of the fair sex, choosing a companion to your liking from the proposed options and achieving her favor.

item.title: Plutocracy
item.description: Game Description Plutocracy is a strategy in which you will be transported to the Golden Age, to the time when the first rich people of the United States of America just appeared. The gameplay will begin in 1870 and continue until the present day. During this gap, you will need to buy out many companies and put your name on the highest line of the board. You will start from scratch and will earn and work to become a shadow ruler.

item.title: The Political Process
item.description: Game Description The Political Process is a political simulation game in which you create your own character and run for office to create and pass laws, handle budget issues, and move up the political hierarchy. You can side with the Republicans or the Democrats. Customize the hero’s appearance, select his age and set a name. There are over 40 political positions available that your character can represent. Any position reflects aspects of social and financial ideology.

item.title: Railroad Corporation
item.description: Game Description Railroad Corporation is a railway construction simulator. You have to build your own empire from numerous freight and passenger routes. The game takes place in North America in the 19th century. The gamer will have to master the road to new lands. The player needs to establish friendly relations with various foreign enterprises. Build your own factories and populate residential buildings. From the very beginning you will only have a small amount of money.

item.title: Command: Modern Operations
item.description: Game Description Command: Modern Operations returns with an updated interface, new features and content that immerses users in the military operations that took place after World War II. The player has submarines, infantry, aircraft, warships and strategic weapons at his disposal. Power and technique are provided at the start of the match and must be managed wisely. The process takes place with a view of a global map with elaborate and detailed terrain layers.

item.title: Unity of Command 2
item.description: Game Description In Unity of Command 2 you have to control your teammates, design routes and develop your own battle tactics. Transform from a novice into a seasoned commander and manage anti-Hitler coalitions on the Western Front, Africa, or take command of Allied divisions. With a dynamic campaign, you can write your own history of World War II. Non-linear paths will lead you to completely different endings. In combat you will need to clear the fog of war, one of the innovations in the sequel to the cult classic Unity of Command II.

item.title: Little Big Workshop
item.description: Game Description Little Big Workshop is a meditation game with calm, measured gameplay. The passage begins very strangely, someone left a game with figures of little human workers on his desktop. And this someone begins to fantasize that these little men come to life, and work is in full swing in their toy workshop. It is the fantasies of the mysterious protagonist that gamers will have to watch. The strategy will not give the player time to rest, because orders will immediately begin to arrive, and the virtual phone will be ringing off the hook with constant calls to it.

item.title: MX Bikes
item.description: Game Description MX Bikes is a motocross simulator that places a huge emphasis on transport physics. The engine accurately simulates the speed, weight, and dynamics of a motorcycle, while providing a wide window for individual settings and customization of vehicle parameters. Both single-player campaign and multiplayer mode are available. All completed races are collected into statistics and show your data, comparing results and personal achievements with players around the world. Support for virtual reality headsets is available, including HTC Vive and Valve Index.

item.title: FIFA 20
item.description: Game Description FIFA 20 allows you to play football without leaving your home. The team is made up of the best athletes in the world who play for Chelsea, Real Madrid, Liverpool, Borussia Dortmund, Tottenham Hostspur, Paris Saint-Germain. Not only professional stadiums will become venues for matches. In VOLTA FOOTBALL mode, players kick the ball in the tunnels of the Netherlands, in the courtyards of England, and on the rooftops of Japan.

item.title: Flotsam
item.description: Game Description A construction simulator with survival elements, Flotsam allows you to become the owner of a floating city. Imagine that the land has simply disappeared and you can only survive on a raft, and at the same time you also need to extract resources. According to the plot, at a certain point, humanity damaged nature so much that a global catastrophe eventually occurred, which led to the flooding of all continents.

item.title: A Legionary's Life
item.description: Game Description A Legionary’s Life is a life simulator of a Roman legionnaire. Here it is proposed to go from a 16-year-old teenager who took up arms for the first time to a centurion seasoned in battles. The project is made in the form of a text RPG with bagel elements. The game is built on constant checking of stats. Gameplay consists of reading information and making choices. First, the gamer creates a character by pouring points into strength, agility, endurance, physique, coordination, charisma, intelligence or knowledge.

item.title: eFootball PES 2020
item.description: Game Description eFootball PES 2020 is a realistic sports simulator in which you will take control of a football team, develop it and participate in grand championships. Fight against the champion of Spain, or play for world famous clubs: Juventus, Manchester United, FC Barcelona and many other teams. Here you can participate in battles against another player, go through a campaign, or play in custom mode against artificial intelligence. Enter the training process to learn new feints, improve your ball-striking skills, practice free kicks and learn many new skills.

item.title: Green Hell
item.description: Game Description Green Hell is a survival simulator that fans of real hero exhaustion in the wild jungle have been waiting for a long time! The main character will visit the dark forests of the Amazon with only a walkie-talkie from objects of “his time”, and he will be helped by his hands and head, which over time will begin to betray. Survival, exhaustion, mentally damaged health of the main character.

item.title: Dude Simulator 3
item.description: Game Description Dude Simulator 3 is a dude simulator that is characterized by absurdity and black humor. You play the role of a “friend” who is preparing for his friend’s birthday. The day begins with you buying him a gift. Now we need to deliver it, but my friend lives in another city. You are about to go on an adventure that promises many funny and exciting moments. Gameplay Dude Simulator 3 features an open world sandbox with a unique cubic visual style.

item.title: Shortest Trip to Earth
item.description: Game Description Shortest Trip to Earth, a futuristic spaceship control simulator, sends the character to the distant future, where he must conquer the Universe. The project is not tied to the plot and the gameplay is presented through the passage of a large number of procedurally generated levels. The developers did not focus on the story campaign, but did a good job on the ship control capabilities and real-time tactical battles.

item.title: Oxygen Not Included
item.description: Game Description The player’s task inOxygen Not Included is to obtain food, water, oxygen, valuable resources and happiness for the duplicates - the inhabitants of his colony. The world settled into different parts, because of this, half of the people went to other planets, and the second part called themselves duplicates and decided to travel through space, flying between asteroids. The idea of ​​the most hardcore survival simulator in a strategic shell - Oxygen Not Included - shows that maintaining your own base and several people on it is incredibly difficult.

item.title: People Playground
item.description: Game Description People Playground is an indie game, a kind of murder simulator in different ways. Here you can simply drag mannequins of creatures across the screen and throw them from a height, or create dangerous situations with your own hands - accidents, torture chambers, obstacle courses. There are 5 types of creatures available for destruction: a fragile person, a heavier and stronger robot, a gorse (spider), a regular and improved turret.

item.title: Cooking Simulator
item.description: Game Description A real cooking simulator - Cooking Simulator is an ambiguous opportunity to try yourself in the role of a real chef. You will be able to cook several hundred dishes, learn real recipes for most of the appetizers served, and much more. In order to give the game more realism, people who devoted themselves to cooking for several decades worked on the creation. The game itself has about 80 complex recipes, but there are also simple ones, like “cooking tomato paste” or “onion rings for baking.

item.title: TheoTown
item.description: Game Description TheoTown is a city building simulator in which you can build a huge metropolis, limited only by your resources and imagination. Take on the role of mayor and organize the lives of thousands of citizens. Build buildings, manage the economy, or provide resources to several cities at once. Be the best manager who can turn a small town into a real technological metropolis. Create various transport networks, including highways, highways, etc.

item.title: Assetto Corsa Competizione
item.description: Game Description The driving simulator at breakneck speeds - Assetto Corsa Competizione - will show you the real competition of racers in the Blancpain GT Series championship. In the cars that are used in the championships, we will compete against professional racers who will be controlled by artificial intelligence, but at the same time their actions were recorded from the actual behavior of the car on the road when it is driven by a professional.

item.title: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS
item.description: Game Description Total War: THREE KINGDOMS is the first game in the series that recreates epic conflicts in Ancient China. The game combines a turn-based campaign of empire building and conquest with epic real-time battles. 190 AD. A beautiful but fragmented country awaits a new emperor and a new life. The player will have to unify China, create the next great dynasty and leave a legacy that will endure for millennia.

item.title: Descenders
item.description: Game Description Descenders is a sports bike racing simulator. But as the creators themselves describe it: an extreme speed cycling downhill game. The developer was RageSquid studio, which developed the unusual indie racing game Action Henk. The player chooses a bike and a team for which he will take part in extreme races across the hills and plains. There are three teams in total, each of which has its own unique characteristics:

item.title: Train Valley 2
item.description: Game Description Strategic Train Valley 2 allows you to build a railway empire and become what will start the industrial revolution. By building a transport network, the condition of cities and factories improves. The railway fleet is replenished with the best locomotives and life in the valley only gets better. Gameplay includes puzzle elements. The player is given an area with several stations. You need to combine them wisely, laying out the most efficient route.

item.title: Construction Simulator 3
item.description: Game Description Construction Simulator 3 invites gamers into a detailed construction environment filled with tasks and responsibilities. An adventure game set in a quaint European town, you can participate in various construction projects. Gamers can choose from contracts to build roads, bridges, and even landscaping. The variety of contracts keeps the gameplay fresh and encourages you to explore different aspects of the construction industry. Construction Simulator 3 features over 50 vehicles and machines from 14 different brands, giving users plenty to choose from as they expand their operations.

item.title: Wushu Chronicles
item.description: Game Description Wushu Chronicles is an adventure role-playing game that invites you to explore the vast expanses of an open eastern world. Events take place during the early Ming Dynasty. The story begins in the 25th year of Hongwu’s reign and continues until the Battle of Jingnan. You have to explore the world of Ming Wushu, which is filled with numerous activities and interesting quests. There are two dozen factions that you are free to join.

item.title: Unheard
item.description: Game Description Unheard is a well-developed detective simulator with many implemented mechanics aimed at allowing the player to understand the crimes committed in various ways. A team of indie developers worked on the project, with a rather unusual idea and implementation, who decided to use the setting of detective fiction, because the protagonist uses devices that are not available in the real world. The devices make it possible to establish some kind of invisible connection between criminals and lawmen.

item.title: Intruder
item.description: Game Description Intruder is a multiplayer stealth action game in which two factions confront each other: spies and guards. One team plays on the side of the Intruders, who are trying to get into the vault. Various tactical gadgets are available to them. The second team attempts to lure the criminals into a trap, acting as representatives of the Guardians. The winner is the side that acts more competently and more organized.

item.title: Dawn of Man
item.description: Game Description A city planning simulator, civilization development and real-time strategy - Dawn of Man is one of the few games in the genre where human survival is presented in this form. For example, we start playing on behalf of the leader of a primitive tribe, and we need to get people to collect resources. Due to constant work, the brain begins to improve, and the first people appear in the world who think more or less intelligently.

item.title: Space Engineers
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofSpace Engineers is that you will build space stations, ships, and begin to study neighboring planets and passing asteroids, where you will find many useful resources. Control is carried out from the perspective of a person, a ship, a base, a flying station, and you can change the camera view from both the third and first person. When you create a world, the game automatically generates a random sequence of planets on which you can find valuable resources.

item.title: The Stillness of the Wind
item.description: Game Description The Stillness of the Wind is about loneliness and loss. The once noisy village has now turned into a quiet place where only Talma lives. Everyone left to look for a better life in the city. Only she, a woman of advanced years, remains to live in such familiar and familiar walls. Every day the grandmother manages the farm and herds the goats. It is necessary to monitor the area and animals.

item.title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
item.description: Game Description Insurgency: Sandstorm is a sequel to a multiplayer shooter built on deathmatches in confined spaces, with the ability to use light vehicles. The game has been significantly improved and expanded. The key to victory lies only through well-coordinated teamwork. The action takes place in the Middle East, on the ruins of settlements and military bases. You need to carefully choose your weapon and explore the territory, because without caution and tactics you can quickly catch a bullet in the forehead.

item.title: Kingdom Two Crows
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Two Crowns is a cooperative microstrategy that tells about the brave, who has become a king and now he needs to gather his army. Having saddled the right horse, he goes on a long journey to expand the kingdom. He will be opposed by the army of greed, trying to take everything from him that he has set up with his own labor. The game offers to rush not only in European medieval landscapes, but also to see many radically new ones.

item.title: Kenshi
item.description: Game Description Kenshi forces you to survive from the very first minutes of the game. An impressive RPG with an open world and the ability to create your own squad, the remaining player privileges are gradually revealed to us. For example, you can build your own buildings in any location, conquer them from other factions, create your own business, sell goods in peaceful settlements, craft whatever you want, explore the environment and do whatever you want.

item.title: RimWorld
item.description: Game Description A simulator of city planning and strategic base development on a planet unknown to the player. The player inRimWorld must build a base where the last forces of people are concentrated. To survive, get food, study the technology tree and understand what the planet wants from you is the main task of the player. The project itself is characterized by the enormous depth of built mechanics that you can apply to your buildings and the base as a whole.

item.title: Construction Simulator 2 US - Pocket Edition
item.description: Game Description An urban planning simulator, the basis of which is the construction of roads under contracts, introduces us to the business of a small construction company that purchases equipment, vehicles and materials for successful career advancement among other companies. What is required from the player? Following plot contracts, the completion of which leads to enrichment and the purchase of new equipment. Construction Simulator 2 US - Pocket Edition offers us more than 40 units of construction vehicles from the following companies: Kenworth, Caterpillar, Kipper, Liebherr, MEILLER, Palfinger, Mack Trucks, Bell and others.

item.title: Liftoff: FPV Drone Racing
item.description: Game Description Liftoff FPV Drone Racing is a training ground for quadcopter pilots. The game is a training ground for both beginners and an obstacle course for experienced gamers. Professionals can test their strength in a new environment, and people who have recently become interested in this sport can hone their skills before taking on real prototypes. In Liftoff FPV Drone Racing, users can take their first steps towards the sport of quadcopter racing.

item.title: Forged Battalion
item.description: Game Description In Forged Battalion, the entire Earth is destroyed due to global warming, making it simply impossible to exist on the surface of the planet. Miles Taymos is a brilliant inventor and comes up with his own system for transferring entire cities into the bowels of the earth. Now all factories, important technical centers, and indeed all living things, will be under a thick layer of soil. The scientist created his own movement called the Collective, supplying a large number of states around the world with underground colonies.

item.title: Star Traders: Frontiers
item.description: Game Description The role-playing video game Star Traders: Frontiers allows you to travel to the distant future and explore the vast expanses of the Universe as the captain of an independent ship. It also introduces elements of turn-based strategy and sandbox with the possibility of endless progression. According to the plot, which has virtually no effect on the gameplay, the action takes place in a world where people learned about the existence of other races and took their place among the dominant states in thirty galaxies.

item.title: The Crew 2
item.description: Game Description In The Crew 2 you can ride anything, as long as you have money for this equipment. The game includes several game modes in the genre of a sports racing simulator from a third/first person: free, cooperative, career, multiplayer mode. A free race usually takes place on a separate map. We choose one unlocked vehicle element and try to win the race. In this simulator you can sail on a boat, drive a fast, high-speed car, or fly on an airplane.

item.title: Football, Tactics & Glory
item.description: Game Description Football, Tactics & Glory is a football team management simulator with strategy elements. As a coach, the player will need to identify the weaknesses and strengths of his opponent in order to identify unique tactics. With the help of a well-chosen strategy, you can defeat even a stronger opponent. Each match is like a puzzle where you need to find the key that helps you win. Each athlete on the field is a unique character, and you can even develop a relationship with each of them.

item.title: House Flipper
item.description: Game Description A renovation crew simulator in which you take on the role of the boss and the only employee -House Flipper - allows you to destroy beautiful houses, but build beautiful apartments with amazing renovations in their place. In this game you can make rooms the way you see them in your life. The game also encourages you to use the latest repair tools, but one thing remains unchanged: you’ll have to take down walls with a sledgehammer!

item.title: Conan Exiles
item.description: Game Description Conan Exiles is an amazing multiplayer survival game with RPG and action elements. Employees of the Norwegian company Funcom worked on the project. The project was released at the end of spring 2018. Stunning graphics are a rare quality that developers of various MMORPG games pay attention to. But this time everything happened exactly the opposite. Funcom, 10 years before Conan Exiles, had already released a similar game called Age Of Conan.

item.title: Frostpunk
item.description: Game Description Frostpunk is an economic strategy game, a simulator of city construction in extremely harsh climatic conditions, where there are no wars, but there is a main enemy in the form of global cooling. The employees of the main office of 11 bit studios worked on the creation of this project. The official release of the game took place in April 2018. In technical terms, we have a three-dimensional strategy game, with a top-down view, a simulator of the leader of a surviving human population in the Arctic cold.

item.title: Pure Rock Crawling
item.description: Game Description Pure Rock Crawling is an SUV simulator, the main concept of which is built around a realistic simulation of tires and suspension. The developers set a goal to create the most realistic ride on rocky paths, deserts, hills, etc. A meditative ride through the stones is one of the best ways to experience the adventure of the wild lands of the entire planet. At first glance, the task in Pure Rock Crawling is extremely simple: drive through 10 gates consisting of cones to get along a designated route from one point on the map to another.

item.title: Ostalgie: The Berlin Wall
item.description: Game Description Ostalgie: The Berlin Wall is a political simulator that allows you to feel like the ruler of one of the socialist countries, such as East Germany, Romania, Poland and Bulgaria. The player’s main task is to survive until 1992. Each country has a set of problems and is driven by an individual goal. For example, the GDR wants to unite with West Germany, Romania wants to become a European version of North Korea, Bulgaria is determined to overthrow its ruler Zhivkov, and the Poles need to give a helping hand to General Jaruzelski.

item.title: Rust
item.description: Game Description Rust (Rust) An ideal first-person survival simulator is not a simple escape from a city or civilization, but a necessary measure based on the conditions of our player. In Rust we will have to kill people, animals, build houses, dwellings, try to make fire out of nothing and survive in a world where everything is trying to kill us. The gameplay begins with the fact that we find ourselves on an island.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Portal
item.description: Game Description The Bridge Constructor Portal project was made into one big puzzle. We play as an employee of the Portal Nature Research Laboratory. Having a constructor under our control, we will build bridges, ramps and other objects in 60 different levels. Each built bridge will help the little men achieve a result - exiting a level to move to another, so Bridge Constructor Portal perfectly combines logical planning and tactical construction of levels.

item.title: Airport Madness 3D: Volume 2
item.description: Game Description Airport Madness 3D: Volume 2 is a continuation of the airport simulator, adding 8 new airfields to the game: New York John F. Kennedy, Toronto Pearson, Miami London City, San Francisco, Lukla Nepal, Hong Kong and Chicago O’Hare. In addition, new types of aircraft are also presented. The gameplay invites you to take on the role of a dispatcher, studying air traffic, drawing up movement schedules, etc. One of the main tasks of a dispatcher is to prevent aircraft collisions in the air.

item.title: CarX Drift Racing Online
item.description: Game Description Arcade car simulatorCarX Drift Racing Online is a new word in the world of racing, where the main component is drifting! From the very beginning, you will have a huge number of opportunities that you can use in the world of real graphics and pumping up cars with modifications from famous manufacturers. From the first to the last minute in the game you will be able to upgrade your car so that it becomes a world prize-winner in the world of drifting!

item.title: VTOL VR
item.description: Game Description VTOL VR is a military flight simulator with a first-person view and in the surroundings of the near future. The game requires a VR headset and a motion controller. The title allows you to freely rotate your head while sitting in the virtual cockpit. Modes include training, campaign and free flight. There are a lot of tasks here. In addition to other aircraft, ships, tanks, anti-aircraft and artillery installations act as opponents and allies.

item.title: Slime Rancher
item.description: Game Description A funny open-world first-person shooter -Slime Rancher is a mixture of genres in one complex picture, which the developers called - Boundless Outland. We plunge into a special experimental environment. Our hero’s name is Beatrix LeBeau, and he is a farmer. Armed with courage, madness and a funny vacuum cleaner, he decides to stay on the planet of the Boundless Outlands, because a certain Hobson Twillgers left us his farm.

item.title: The Long Dark
item.description: Game Description A game about survival in a world without electricity. The Long Dark is eternal darkness in locations, gorgeous graphics from developers who love the sky and stars as their second home. Players were pleased that the entire gameplay is divided into two modes. The first is a story-based passage of 5 episodes, the total duration of which is 60-70 hours, depending on how the plot is followed. The second mode is survival in an excellent open world, where you will have to keep an eye on the contents of your backpack, check for items, collect skins, fry meat, take refuge in shelters, furnish your own house or a small corner in a house for survivors, where the owner of this establishment will shelter you.

item.title: Psebay
item.description: Game Description The journey to Psebay will be made while driving a motorbike, moving through atmospheric locations. The user will have to overcome difficult landscape obstacles, cutting through hills and rocks on a powerful motorcycle. There is an opportunity to feel the surface of the earth, which constantly strives to move away from under the wheels. It is important to feel and control your balance so as not to fall when crossing difficult terrain and to correctly calculate the acceleration and weight of the vehicle.

item.title: SAELIG
item.description: Game Description SAELIG (stylized as SÆLIG) is an RPG with strategy and management elements. The game focuses on managing the lives of the Anglo-Saxons in the kingdom of Wessex, extracting resources, managing life, and defending against attacks from warring savages from the Scandinavian lands. SAELIG is based on many simulation and role-playing elements, such as relationships, skills, health, needs, character interaction and constant control. Gameplay involves individual playthrough: live the life of a typical family man: get married, have children and work on a farm; start your own business: hire workers, produce goods and engage in trade; lead a criminal gang of thieves, terrorizing the area and stealing valuables from residents; become a monopolist and sabotage competitors; buy houses, rent them out, or live like a hermit without a roof over your head.

item.title: Ravenfield
item.description: Game Description The team-tactical shooterRavenfield will allow you to plunge into furious battles, where you have everything - from tanks to fleets. There is a complete lack of storyline and even multiplayer. The latter fact is extremely unusual for projects of this genre. It would seem that it is interesting to play against bots and when there are no real users on the map. This omission at first glance is more than compensated for by a fairly developed artificial intelligence - opponents and allies behave extremely intelligently and together with them you can perform a variety of tactics using numerous commands and options.

item.title: Idle Evolution
item.description: Game Description Idle Evolution is a strategic project in which the ultimate goal of achieving the highest stage of development is achieved through total control over atoms. The passage is built nonlinearly: gamers are asked to follow a certain path through a system of more than 200 missions, but at any time they can deviate from the proposed course to implement their own tactics. Instead of passive waiting, as in most similar products, there is an emphasis on active participation and making informed decisions.

item.title: Rain World
item.description: Game Description Rain World is a conceptually original indie video game created by just 4 people. Brings something new to the platformer genre, focusing on hardcore. You take control of an unusual creature - a slugcat. He had not yet grown up, and always lived under the supervision of adults. But an unfortunate incident occurs, and the protagonist ends up in the industrial areas of the city, where his race obtains provisions.

item.title: Tower!3D Pro
item.description: Game Description Tower 3D Pro is a simulator that immerses you in the intense work of an air traffic controller, managing air and ground traffic in a detailed 3D environment. To perform the assigned tasks, the specialist is provided with all the necessary tools, including flight strips, as well as radar screens that monitor the situation both in the air and at the airport. Real-time visualization allows you to monitor the movement of official vehicles and other vehicles, which creates the feeling of a living and functioning airfield.

item.title: theHunter: Call of the Wild
item.description: Game Description The Hunter’s Open World is now available intheHunter: Call of the Wild. This is not a simple hunter simulator, where we will have to climb trees and hide in the grass to kill the next deer, but a full-fledged world with smells, changing wind and weather; with the individual behavior of each animal that must be killed to complete the task. This is not a simple hunt, but a real one!

item.title: ASTRONER
item.description: Game Description New resources inASTRONEER are presented in the form of any discovery on other planets, and everything that a person could bring with him after a galactic expedition was bought up at a clean price. There was an explosion in the world. Humanity is again hunting for “gold”, sending its compatriots into space. However, in the 25th century, when humanity has fully explored space, they send people to distant planets, where all that is known is that the planets are just as round.

item.title: Sid Meiers Civilization 6
item.description: Game Description A turn-based strategy from famous developers -Sid Meier’s Civilization VI, where the player’s main goal is to develop his own settlement from a small group of people. They build cities, become diplomats, politicians, officials, and make scientific achievements. The population of your city, and then the state, is gradually increasing, and you are moving towards capturing the land around you. Together with allies or alone, you fight against opponents controlled by artificial intelligence.

item.title: Niche - a genetics survival game
item.description: Game Description Genetic survival game Niche - a genetics survival game will allow you to deal with the population of special foxes. To survive, you need to collect edible plants or hunt very nimble game that brings a large supply of meat. The gameplay feature is the gene. The game allows you to experiment with DNA and pair a dominant gene with a recessive one, and then observe the result. Then find a new nest of other creatures and hatch completely new individuals.

item.title: No Man's Sky
item.description: Game Description Travel on an intergalactic level has become too simple and ordinary. It’s becoming increasingly difficult to create a game that captivates with its graphics, but the developers ofNo Man’s Sky, an indie adventure game with an open world and a wonderful RPG base, were able to recreate the image of space. Distant, limitless, completely open and so human. We play as a character, but then our gameplay switches to an entire space station or ship.

item.title: Human: Fall Flat
item.description: Game Description Human: Fall Flat is an adventure puzzle game with amazing physics and engine. Take control of Bob, who every time has a dream from which he must find a way out. Usually such dreams are accompanied by colorful locations in which he needs to get to a certain point and solve many difficult problems. Explore the open world in your own way. Climb any building, rock, tree or other object, going through the same place differently each time.

item.title: Dead Age
item.description: Game Description Dead Age has an excellent and non-linear story, consisting of many choices that lead to 6 different endings. You will have to carefully study the text of the tasks, otherwise the members of your squad of survivors will inexorably dwindle. The point of the game is to survive as many days as possible, replenishing food supplies, tools and new survivors. But don’t think that everything is so simple, in addition to collecting, the game has daily events that will fill your every new day in the game with various difficulties or opportunities.

item.title: Firefight
item.description: Game Description Firefight is a real-time simulation game set during World War II. It throws gamers into the heart of intense military battles, where strategy and tactical decisions are the key to success. You will not just command units, but manage their strengths and weaknesses, monitor their movements and carefully orchestrate each action to tip the scales in your favor. Infantry, tanks, artillery - they are all under your command, and each has their own set of attributes that determine their behavior on the battlefield.

item.title: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
item.description: Game Description VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action is an adventure simulator of a bartender in the setting of a dystopian future, where humanity finds itself under the control of huge corporations dictating the rules of life, and nanorobots controlling every area of ​​human activity and the implementation of laws and regulations adopted new world government. Stylistically, this project refers to Japanese games of the last century. The gameplay consists of communicating with bar visitors and providing them with high-quality service in order to build warm, friendly relationships with them.

item.title: Hearts of Iron 4
item.description: Game Description Despite the fact thatHearts of Iron 4 is famous for its realism, the new part has completely redesigned the focus tree for individual countries and nationalities. The strategy, dedicated to the Second World War, invites you to play in countries such as Italy, Ethiopia, Spain, Japan and China. Two scenarios that differ in their dates: 1936 and 1939. In one of them you will take part in the Second Italo-Ethiopian War and the Spanish Civil War, and in the second you will see how Japan invaded China, and the Second World War was fought.

item.title: Stellaris
item.description: Game Description Real-time strategy -Stellaris - immerses us in outer space, where we become kings of the galaxy from the very first minutes. The gameplay surrounds you with a huge number of ships and their types. For example, merchant spaceships will travel between different planets and sell/buy resources, reconnaissance ships will be able to explore new distances, and construction ships will help occupy - for friendly purposes - a new planet and recreate an entire empire on it.

item.title: Street Legal Racing: Redline
item.description: Game Description Street Legal Racing: Redline is a car mechanic simulator that allows you to assemble a car completely from scratch. At the same time, street racing with assembled vehicles is available. New parts can affect the characteristics of the car, which are responsible for acceleration, handling and maximum speed. Street Legal Racing does not provide package upgrades. The rider must install each individual part himself. The game has many features:

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is a survival simulator in an unknown world, where our character, pre-selected in the editor, wakes up and immediately goes to look for firewood, because Maxwell said so. The game is cooperative, since the story passage is divided into 2 parts. The first is survival. It is built on three phases of the day: day, evening and night. During the day, your character calmly survives, collects items, crafts new ones, eats and carries out orders for Maxwell.

item.title: Twilight Struggle
item.description: Game Description Twilight Struggle takes place during the Cold War. The gameplay is presented in the form of a strategy, and you have to observe the world map and perform various actions. Each session provides you with original tasks and goals to accomplish. Move groupings of units and influence other factions to gain allies or increase your own power. The action covers historical moments that occurred from 1948 to 1967. Learn about and get involved in the Arab-Israeli conflicts, US peace rallies, the Cuban Missile Crisis and other similar incidents.

item.title: Hot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades
item.description: Game Description The gameHot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades can be called a full-fledged weapons simulator. You need to go to the training ground, which contains a huge selection of different firearms: pistols, machine guns, shotguns, rocket launchers, grenades, etc. You can use any available ammunition, training on targets and taking the highest positions on the leaderboard. Afterwards you can go and set off fireworks. Targets can be not only static within the walls of a gray pavilion, but also moving in open space.

item.title: Stardew Valley
item.description: Game Description Stardew Valley is a sandbox simulator with pixel graphics and multi-platform support, but with a well-thought-out system for earning money and maintaining game balance for the player. The beginning of the game shows how our hero first comes to an abandoned farm, which he received from a deceased relative. Since the protagonist does not mind making money by planting and selling vegetables and fruits, he decides not to sell the farm, but to start equipping it.

item.title: UnReal World
item.description: Game Description The plot of UnReal World takes place in the early period of the Iron Age in the northern regions of Europe, and more precisely in the territory of modern Finland. The game is a life simulator, and therefore does not have a main plot - the player gets complete freedom of action and determines the fate and career of the character under his care. The game’s mechanics focus on survival aspects.

item.title: American Truck Simulator
item.description: Game Description American Truck Simulator doesn’t have the typical pick-up-and-drop-off. This is a strategic and economic simulator rolled into one: we will upgrade our trucks, buy new ones, decide which contracts to take on and what to leave aside. An important component in the process is the driving itself, because it is done in the first person, from the driver’s cabin. Compliance with all traffic rules is the basis and responsibility of every driver.

item.title: Scrap Mechanic
item.description: Game Description Scrap Mechanic is a multiplayer engineering sandbox that offers you to design various mechanisms and compete with friends. The game world revolves around a mechanic who maintains robots on an agricultural planet. He makes sure that they are working properly: that they are cultivating the land on time, sowing, collecting raw materials, which the hero then sends to the central planets, where people live ordinary lives. But one day the spaceship crashed, and the robots around went crazy.

item.title: The Isle
item.description: Game Description The island on whichThe Isle takes place has a rich and varied environment that is randomly generated. All artifacts, items and events will be located in different places with each new launch. Players must team up to effectively explore the area, which contains many secrets, including various quest items that further advance the plot. The map contains an area of ​​16x16 square kilometers. Multiplayer survival game The Isle allows you to play with three different factions in three different modes:

item.title: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes
item.description: Game Description Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes is a cooperative sapper simulator. You are locked up with your friends. No one knows where the explosives are, but instructions are issued on how to disarm them.
